Ba wu man nee, nyem ɗi moo c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes, ɓe moo kat mbiise furu a nlu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes ni kas aa? Ki̶ ba wu man nee nyem ɗi moo wus mbiizughum a peewus mbiizughum mo, ɓe moo se a pak mbiizughum ni kas aa?
Ni aasi zak, ɓe Daa wuri satpo nee. Nyem ɗi moo satpo ɗiiret ngurum mo, ɓe ni ret ku mo kat mbiise furu a ɗiɓut zak.

Amma, ba wan ki̶n kyam c`in ɗak ki̶ iiko fi̶na ɗiisi kas, ki̶ ba wan ran wasika ɗiisi nwun, a mpeku wu cín mbii mo ɗi nwan kas. Ngyal ɗeesi ɓe wan muut, met a kuɗi mee ngo le mbii ɗi wan ki̶n canjagham nkaa ni ɗee a mbii ɗiibuu.

Mpeeɗi koo ɗi wan ki̶n satpo ɗiiret ni, ɓe ba wan ki̶ pee mpee canjagham kas. Amma ki̶n satpo ɗiiret ni a mpeeɗi, a Naan wuri ki̶ leting wan, mpeku wan satpo ni ɗi. Jeel ɗi mpee wan, katɗang ba wan satpo ɗiiret nin ngurum mo kas.
Katɗang ɗi wan ki̶n satpo ni a shi ɗyen fi̶na, ɓe ɗi wan nkat kwat. Amma wan ki̶n satpo ɗiiret ni ngurum mo, ba a shi ɗyen fi̶na kas, mpeeɗi a ɗak ɗi Naan wuri ki̶ le ni nsar fi̶na mmi̶ni.
Kwat fi̶na ni a meye? A kwat fi̶na nin nɗiisi, a peeɗi Naan wuri ki̶ cínpee nwan, mpeku wan satpo ɗiiret ni ngurum mo shi zughum, ba wan ki̶n c`in ɗak ki̶ iiko fi̶na mpee tang kwat pe wun ɗi kas.
Koo ɗi ba wan a ki̶rom ki̶ mee gurum kas, amma wan ki̶n ten nlesan a ki̶rom kì̵ gurum mo jir, mpeku wan j`i ɗi ki̶ gurum mo ɗes nDaa.

Mpee nyem Yahudi mo, ɓe wan ɗee a kaa mo si, mpeku wan j`i ki̶ mo ɗi nDaa. Ki̶ zak, nyem Yahudi mo, a nder kì̵ Waar kì̵ Mosis, ɓe wan ɗee a kaa mo si, koo ɗi ba wan shikáa fi̶na wan a nder kì̵ Waar kì̵ Mosis kas. Amma wan ki̶n ɗee a kaa nyem ɗi mon nder kì̵ Waar kì̵ Mosis ni si, mpeku wan j`i ki̶ mo ɗi nDaa.
Mpee nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ Waar kì̵ Mosis kas, ɓe wan ɗee a kaa mo si, mpeku wan j`i ki̶ mo ɗi nDaa. Amma ɓe wan ki̶n tap ki̶ Waar kì̵ Naan. Azeen-nzeen wan a nder kì̵ Waar mu Kristi.

Mpee nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen kas, ɓe wan fwang mo, mpeku wan j`i ki̶ mo nDaa. Wan ki̶n ten ɗee a mbii mo jir, pe gurum mo ɗi jir, mpeku koo ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe wan ɓam pak mo ɗi.
Wan ki̶n lesan ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, a mpee po ɗiiret ni, ki̶ mpeku wan kat pak ɗiiret mu po ɗiiret ni ɗi zak.
Ba wu man nee, ndi̶ghi̶n kaghan mu sushii, ɓe gurum mo ɗes moo swa, amma a ngumi̶ndong ki̶ lap zughum ni ɓejee ɗak kas aa? Ni aasi zak, ni ret ku wu swa, mpeku wu kat zughum ni ɗi.

Koo weye, ɗi wuri a ngusushii, ɓe wuri naa nkar shin fi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir. Wurii kar shin fi̶ri, mpeku wuri lap zughum ɗi nii ki̶lak ki̶ wat ɗi, amma mumun, muu lap a zughum ɗi ba nin nkyam wat kas.
Ba wan ki̶n su a buu-buu kas, ki̶ cutpee ɗi wan ki̶n c`in ni, ba wan ki̶n cut a buu kas.

Amma wan ki̶n c`in ki̶ san fi̶na, mpeku san fi̶na ni ɓal ɗi, ku ni ɗee ɗi nder fi̶na kaa ki̶rom si, mpeku taji aɓwoon ɗi wan ki̶ satpo ɗiiret ni ngurum mo, ɗangɓe mo yaghal baa ki̶ wan shikáa fi̶na mɓwoon kas.
Ɗyemnaa mo, wan riɓet ku wu man nee, gyet puun funu mo jir, mo a nder kì̵ nluu, ki̶ gyet mo jir mo can am bahar ɗiinaat mo ɗel riyang ndang Mosis zak.
Gyet mo c`in baptisma mmo jir a ndi̶ghi̶n nluu, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n am bahar kaaɗi gyet mo so ndang Mosis si.
Gyet mo jir, mo se mbiise ɗi gyet Naan cín mmo ɗi ni a mu Riin.
Gyet mo jir mo shwaa am ɗi Naan cín mmo. Mpeeɗi gyet mo shwaa am ɗi gyet ni j`i put mɓut jwak. Gyet jwak ɗiisi ni mwaan ndang mo. Gyet jwak ɗiisi a Kristi shikáa fi̶ri.
Jir ki̶si, ɓe ba gyet Naan wuri kat retnyit ki̶ pak mo kas. Mpeemi̶ni ɓe mo murap ɗes a naar yil.
Yaksi, ɓe mbii ɗiisi mo jir, mo ɗee a mbiikám mumun. Mo gwak mun, mpeku taji mu kyaghar mbii ɗiibish mo, kaaɗi gyet mo c`in si kas.

Taji wu ɗee a nyemk`um mo, kaaɗi gyet pak mo ndi̶ghi̶n mo, mo c`in si kas, kaaɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si nee: "Gurum ni mo tong nyil, mpeku mo se gwom k`um, ki̶ shwaa yughur, ki̶ mo yaghal a ting mpee c`in kook."
Taji mu c`in ngaa kas, kaaɗi gyet pak mo ndi̶ghi̶n mo, mo c`in si, har gurum mo duɓu laarvul baakun, mo murap parpuus mi̶ndong.
Taji mu kyam Daa kas, kaaɗi gyet pak mo ndi̶ghi̶n mo, mo c`in si, ɓe har gyet nw`oo mo, twa mo.
Taji mu kyakpo nɗagham-nɗagham kas, kaaɗi gyet pak mo ndi̶ghi̶n mo, mo c`in si, har mo murap nsar ki̶ ngulop mu muut.
Mbii ɗi gyet ni kat mo, ni ɗee a mbiikám pe mun ɗi. Mo kì̵ ten ran mo, a mpeku mo gwak mun ɗi, mun ɗi peekyes ki̶ ɓit ni mo kì̵ j`i a nkaa mun.
Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe koo a weye, ɗi wuri ki̶ pan ne wuɗi ki̶ ɗar ɓal-ɓal, ɓe wuri tap, taji wuri pal kas.

Ba mee jwaan ɗi nin nkat wun ɗi kas, see a ɗi nin nkat kaghar gurum mo jir zak. Naan wuri a nguzeen, ba wurin nyit ku mee jwaan kat wun, ɗi nin mmet mɓal fuu kas. Amma a shi jwaan ni, ɓe wurin nle ar put ni ɗi zak, mpeku wu mak gung jwaan ni ɗi.
Mpeemi̶ni ɗyemnaa mo, taji wu seyil nk`um mo kas.
Wan ki̶n katpo wun, a kaa nyem ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten kám ar ni wun si. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wu ɓeet ki̶ suk, nkaa mbii ɗi wan ki̶n sat ni.

Katɗang mu mang laaɗaa mu Tong Ashak ɗi muu pi̶lang Naan mpee ni, ɓe ba wu man nee, muu ɓàl a káa funu mo ashak ki̶ Kristi ndi̶ghi̶n toghom fi̶ri kas aa? Bred ɗi muu yilang si, ɓe ba wu man nee, muu ɓàl a káa funu ndi̶ghi̶n shin kì̵ Kristi kas aa?
Mpeeɗi bred ni a mi̶ndong, ɗi muu yilang ni mu se ashak. Ni aasi zak, mun ɗi ɗes, amma mun a nan ɗiimi̶ndong, mpeeɗi muu se a bred ɗiimi̶ndong.
Wu pan nkaa nyem Yahudi mo ndi̶ghi̶n nan, nyem ɗi moo se ndi̶ghi̶n mbiizughum ɗi mo wus ni, ɓe moo ɓal a káa furu kì̵ Naan ɗi moo c`in ni nwuri.
Wan ki̶n riɓet sat a meye? Kyet mbiise ɗi moo c`in nk`um, mi̶ni a mee mbii me? Koo a k`um ni a mee mbii ye?

Waash, wan ki̶n sat a nee, mbii ɗi nyemk`um moo fet mpee c`in zughum, ɓe moo c`in ni a riin ɗiibish mo, ba moo cín zughum ni a nNaan kas. Ba wan riɓet ku wu ɓàlkáa fuu mo ashak ki̶ riin ɗiibish mo kas.
Ba wun mmak shwaa mɓut laaɗaa mu Daa, ki̶ wu waa wu shwaa mɓut laaɗaa mu riin ɗiibish mo zak kas.
Taji mu c`in mee mbii ɗi nin nle ku Naan wuri c`in tughup kas. Kyet mun, mu ɓal met wuri wa?
Gurum mo sat nee, "Mu mak c`in koo meye, ɗi mu riɓet." Ni azeen, amma ba a mbii mo jir ɗi mo mak ɗik wun koo moo koghop ni mpee gurum kas.
Taji mee gurum tang mbii ɗi mo a mukáa fi̶ri kas. Amma ni ret ku wuri tang a mbii ɗi mo ret mpee niyee mo.
Wu se mbii ɗi moo si̶rep mo ndi̶ghi̶n kasuwa mu luwa mo. Taji wu talpo kas, mpee pan ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup.
Mpeeɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee. "Yil ɗiisi ni a mu Daa, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ni jir."

Katɗang mee gwar ɗi ba wuri kì̵ cínzeen nDaa Jesu kas, wuri pet wun mpee sese ashak ki̶ wuri. Katɗang wuu lap ii, ne wunn nso, ɓe wu se mbii ɗi wurin nle a kiyeen fuu. Taji wu tal kas, mpee pan ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu.
Amma katɗang mee ngo kì̵ ten sat nwun nee, "Mo kì̵ ten cín luwa ɗiisi ni nk`um." Ɓe taji wu se luwa ni kas, mpee gwar ɗi wuri satpo mi̶ni nwun, ki̶ mpee pan ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup.
Ba a mpee pan muu mo kas, amma a mpee pan kì̵ gwar ni. Mpeme ɗang pan ki̶ mee gurum nin ncíi nwan, mpee katpee ɗi wan ki̶ ni, mpee c`in mbii ɗi wan ki̶n riɓet ye?
Katɗang wan pi̶lang Naan mpee mbiise fi̶na. Ɓe cirang ɗangɓe gurum moo katpo ɗiibuu nkaa wan, mpee mbiise ɗi wan ki̶n ten pi̶lang Naan nkaa ni ye?
Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe koo a mbii ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wuu c`in, koo a se mbiise, koo a shwaa mbiishwaa, ɓe wu c`in mbii mo jir mpee le Naan a ɗiiɗes.
Taji wu le ku mee gurum canshii kas. Koo ɗi ngo ni a ngu Yahudi kas, koo ɗi a Eki̶lisya mu Naan.
Kaaɗi wan ki̶n gung mpeku wan c`in mbii ɗi mo shang ɗi ngurum mo jir. Ba wan ki̶n tang a ɗiiret mukáa fi̶na kas, amma wan ki̶n tang a ɗiiret mu gurum mo ɗes, mpeku mo kat ɓam ɗi.
Wu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan fi̶na, kaaɗi wan ki̶n mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan mu Kristi si.
Wan kwoop wun, mpeeɗi wuu pan wan ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, ki̶ wuu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n kám ɗi jí wan kám mo nwun zak.
Amma wan riɓet ku wu man nee, a Kristi wuri a káa kì̵ koo a mish ɗiiɗang ye, ki̶ a mish wuri a káa kì̵ mat fi̶ri, ki̶ Naan wuri a káa kì̵ Kristi.
Mpeemi̶ni koo mish ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wuri c`in aduwa, ki̶ satpo kì̵ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n ɗuu kì̵ gurum mo ki̶ káa fi̶ri a pi̶paa, ɓe wurii j`i ki̶ nashoop nkaa Kristi ɗi a wuri a káa fi̶ri mmi̶ni.

Koo mat ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wura c`in aduwa, ki̶ satpo kì̵ Naan ɗi ba wura paakáa fi̶ra kas, ɓe wuraa j`i ki̶ nashoop nkaa mish fi̶ra. Ɗi a wuri a káa fi̶ra, ki̶ zak, ɓe wura ɗee a kaa mat ɗi mo sak káa nwura ngau si mmi̶ni.
Katɗang ba mee mat paakáa fi̶ra kas, ɓe ni ret ku wura saa shoopkáa fi̶ra. Amma katɗang saa shoopkáa koo sak shoopkáa nin nj`i ki̶ nashoop mmat, ɓe ni ret ku wura paakáa fi̶ra.
Ba ni ret ku ngumish paakáa fi̶ri kas, mpeeɗi Naan ɗak mish a kaa shin si, ki̶ wurii kám a ɗiiɗes kì̵ Naan. Amma mat wura ki̶ kám a ɗiiɗes mu mish.
Ba gyet Naan ɗak mish a shi sat mu mat kas, amma gyet wuri ɗak mat a shi shin mu mish.
Ki̶ zak, ba gyet Naan wuri le mish a mpee mat kas, amma gyet wuri le mat a mpee mish.
Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe ni ret ku mat paakáa fi̶ra, ku ni kám ɗi nee, wura a nder kì̵ mish fi̶ra, ki̶ mpee nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo zak.
Jir ki̶si, ɓe seen funu ɗi mun ki̶ ni ndi̶ghi̶n Daa, ɓe ba mat wura ɗik kì̵ mish fi̶ra kas, ki̶ ba mish wuri ɗik ki̶ mat fi̶ri kas zak.
Mpeeɗi gyet Naan wuri ɗak mat a shi mee ɗyes kì̵ mish, ki̶ ni aasi zak, yaksi ɓe a mat wura kì̵ làa mish. Mbii moo pwat a pe Naan ɗi jir.
Wun shikáa fuu, wu ɓeetpo ɗiisi ni, kyet nin ndi̶re mpeku mat wura c`in aduwa nNaan ndi̶ghi̶n kuur kì̵ gurum mo, ɗi ba wura paakáa fi̶ra kas wa?
Koo a shi ɗyen, ɓe ni kám nwun kas aa? Nee ni a mbii nashoop ku mish wuri ɗyel shoopkáa shwal-shwal.
Amma katɗang ɓe mat wura ɗyel shoopkáa ɗiishwal-shwal, ɓe mi̶ni a mbii jwat nwura kas aa? Mpeeɗi mo cín shoopkáa ɗiishwal-shwal ni nwura, a mpeku wura paakáa fi̶ra ɗi.
Amma katɗang mee ngo ki̶ riɓet ɓeetshik nkaa po ɗiisi, ɓe ba mumun, koo Eki̶lisya mu Naan mo, ɓe ba mu loghot ki̶ mee ar ɗi ni a mu seyil nNaan ɗi ni ɗik ki̶ mi̶ni kas.

Ndi̶ghi̶n waar ɗiisi, ɓe ba wan kwoop wun kas, mpeeɗi kuur fuu ni ba nii koghop ni kas. Mpeeɗi katɗang wu j`i wu kaat ndi̶ghi̶n kuur fuu, ɓe mbii ɗi wuu c`in ni mo, ɓe ba mo ret kas. Nii waa wuwat gurum mo met aku ɗi nin mɓam mo.
To, ɗin nshee ni, katɗang wu kuur, kaa Eki̶lisya si, mpee seyil nNaan, ɓe ba po fuu moo so ndangshak kas, har kaaɗi jí wan ki̶lingpo mi̶ni, ɓe wan ɗoghom cínzeen nni.
Ba ni ki̶ mee kyetwa kas, ni a ting, ku mo kat ɓàkshak ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n wun, mpeku mo man nyemso ndang Naan ɗin ndi̶re ni mo ɗi azeen-nzeen.
Katɗang wu j`i wu kaat ashak, ɓe ba wuu se a Tong Ashak mu Daa ni kas.
Mpeeɗi katɗang wu ɗoghom se ni, ɓe koo weye wurii yaa se mbiise ɗi wuri j`i ki̶ni, har wuu le ku neenláa mpak mo, ku pak moo shwaayughur ɗi.

Kai! ba wun ki̶ tulu ɗi wun nse ki̶ shwaa ɗi kas aa? A me le ɗang wuu toklong nkuur mu Eki̶lisya ki̶ Daa ye? Ki̶ a me le ɗang wuu cín nashoop nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ mee mbii kas ye? Wan nsat a me nwun mpee mbii kaa ɗiisi si ye? Wan nkwoop wun aa? Waash, ba wan nkwoop wun kas koo diɓen.
Wan lap kám ɗiisi ni a pe Daa ɗi, ɗi wan ki̶n cín nwun si zak. Nee, mpar ɗi gyet mo seet Daa Jesu ɗi, ɓe Daa Jesu wuri mang bred.
Aɓwoon ɗi wuri ki̶ c`in aduwa mu pi̶lang Naan nkaa bred ni, ɓe wuri yilang ni, wuri sat nee: "Ɗiisi ni a san fi̶na, ɗi wan ki̶n cín ni mpee wun. Wu naa nc`in aasi, mpeku taji wu mander nwan kas."

Ni aasi zak, ɓe aɓwoon ɗi mo se mbiise, ɓe wuri mang laaɗaa, ɓe wuri sat nee, "Laaɗaa ɗiisi ni a ɓi̶lemcuk shi toghom kì̵ Naan ɗiipoo, ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n toghom fi̶na. Katɗang koo a pi̶rang ye ɗi wun nshwaa am anab ndi̶ghi̶n laaɗaa ni, ɓe wuu shwaa ni a mpeku taji wu mander wan kas."
Shii ki̶ ɗiisi ni a nee, koo a pi̶rang ye ɗi wuu se bred ni, ki̶ wu shwaa am anab ndi̶ghi̶n laaɗaa ni, ɓe wuu c`in a langting nkaa muut kì̵ Daa Jesu, har parɗi wurin mbaa j`i.
Katɗang mee ngo kì̵ se bred ni ki̶ shwaa am anab ndi̶ghi̶n laaɗaa mu Daa ni, ba a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗin ndi̶re kas, ɓe ngo mi̶ni kì̵ c`in a shikbish nkaa shin mu Jesu ki̶ toghom fi̶ri mmi̶ni.
Ni ret ku gurum shee kyamshin fi̶ri akuɗang wurii se bred, ki̶ shwaa am anab ɗi nin ndi̶ghi̶n laaɗaa mu Daa ni.

Mpeeɗi katɗang ba gurum manshii kì̵ shin mu Daa Jesu ki̶ toghom fi̶ri ni kas, ɗangɓe wuri ki̶ se bred ki̶ shwaa am anab ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n laaɗaa mu Daa ni, ɓe gwar mi̶ni ki̶ j`i aa ɗiyeel nkaa shin fi̶ri mmi̶ni.
A nii le, ɗangɓe pak fuu mo a gok, ki̶ ba pak mo ki̶ ɓal kas, har pak fuu mo ɗes, mo kì̵ murap.
Amma katɗang mu kyamsun funu mo azeen-nzeen, ki̶ mu c`in mbii mon ndi̶re-ndi̶re ɓe ba Naan tokɗiyeel mmun kas.
Amma Naan wurii tokɗiyeel mmun, ki̶ wurii kar mun, a mpeku taji wurin ncanɗiyeel ɗiibish mmun ashak ki̶ gurum ɗiibish, ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, parkyes kì̵ yil ni kas.
Mpeemi̶ni, ɗyemnaa mo, katɗang wu kuur ashak mpee se Tong Ashak mu Daa, ɓe ni ret ku wu kúmshak.

Katɗang neenláa mmemee fuu, ɓe ni ret ku gwar mi̶ni sese ntulu fi̶ri akuɗang wurii j`i kuur ni. Mpeku taji Naan wuri canɗiyeel ɗiibish nkaa wun jir, a peekuur fuu ni. Po nkaa kaghar mbii ɗi mo ɗee ɗi, ɓe see parɗi wan wul pe wun ɗi, ɗangɓe wan nsatpo nwun nkaa mo jir.
Ɗyemnaa mo, po nkaa zughum ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wurii cín ngurum. Ba wan riɓet ku wu nook manshii ni kas.
Wu man nee, kaaɗi gyet wu kuɗi a nyemseyil nk`um mo, ɓe wuu seyil nk`um ɗi ba mo ki̶ seen kas, shi ar mo shini-shini.

Wan riɓet ku wu man nee, ba mee ngo, ɗi wurii katpo shi Riin kì̵ Naan, wurin mmak sat ne Jesu wuri a mbii fulup kas. Ki̶ ba mee gurum mak c`in langting nee, "Jesu wuri a Daa." Katɗang ba wurii mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n Riin kì̵ Naan kas.
Zughum ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wurii cín ngurum mo, mo ɗi shini-shini, amma a Riin ɗiimi̶ndong wurii cín mo ngurum mo.
Ɗak mo ɗi shini-shini, amma Daa a mi̶ndong.
Man ɗi gurum moo c`in ɗak ɗishik mo shini-shini, amma a Naan ɗiimi̶ndong wurii c`in man ni ngurum mo, mpeku mo c`in ɗak ni ɗi.
Riin kì̵ Naan wurii kám shin ngurum mo ndi̶ghi̶n ar mo shini-shini, mpeku mo c`in ɗak ɗi nin mɓam niyee mo ɗi jir.
Mee gurum, ɓe Riin kì̵ Naan ni cín a zughum mu man satpo nwuri shi seen, ki̶ mee gurum ɓe Riin ni c`in a zughum mu man mbii nwuri.
Mee gurum, ɓe Riin ni cín a zughum mu cínzeen nwuri, ki̶ mee gurum ɓe Riin ni cín a iiko nwuri mpee bar nyemgok mo.

Mee gurum ɓe Riin kì̵ Naan ni cín a zughum mu c`in mbii aapo nwuri, ki̶ mee gurum ɓe Riin kì̵ Naan ni cín a iiko mu satpo Naan ngo ni. Mee gurum ɓe Riin wuri cín a man mu ɓàkyit nzughum ɗi mo put a pe Riin kì̵ Naan ɗi, ki̶ riin ɗi ba mo put a pe Naan ɗi kas zak. Mee gurum ɓe Riin wuri cín a zughum mu katpo shi li̶po mo shini-shini ngwar mi̶ni. Mee gurum zak, ɓe wuri cín a zughum ɗii mu manshii kì̵ pi̶ring ki̶ li̶po mu gurum mo shini-shini ngo ni.
A Riin kì̵ Naan ɗiisi wuri mi̶ndong, ɗi wuri cín zughum ɗiisi mo ngurum mo shini-shini zak, kaaɗi wuri naa ni ret nwuri nyit si.
Kristi wuri a kaa shin kì̵ gurum si. Kaaɗi wu man nee, shin kì̵ gurum ni ki̶ ɓeep mo ɗes, amma jir ki̶si ɓe shin kì̵ gurum ni a mi̶ndong ɓejee ɗak, koo ɗi ni ki̶ ɓeep mo shini-shini.

Mo c`in baptisma mmun jir a ndi̶ghi̶n Riin ɗiimi̶ndong, aasi ɓe mu ɗee a ɗiimi̶ndong, koo ɗi mun a nyem Yahudi mo, koo ɗi ba mun a nyem Yahudi mo kas, koo ɗi mun a ki̶rom mo, ki̶ koo ɗi mun a jeplu mo zak. Mun jir, ɓe muu ten mu lap a Riin kì̵ Naan ɗiimi̶ndong.
Ba shin kì̵ gurum ni ki̶ ɓeep a mi̶ndong ɓejee kas, amma ni kì̵ ɓeep mo a ɗes.
Katɗang shii sat nee; "Ba wan a sar kas, mpeemi̶ni ɓe ba wan a memee mɓut shin kì̵ gurum kas." Koo ɗi shii satpo mi̶ni, ɓe ba nin nnook ɗee a memee mɓut ɓeep mu shin kì̵ gurum kas.
Ki̶ zak, katɗang ɓe kom sat nee, "ba wan a yit kas, mpeemi̶ni ɓe ba wan a memee mɓut shin kì̵ gurum kas." Koo ɗi kom satpo mi̶ni, ɓe ba kom nin nnook ɗee a memee mɓut shin kì̵ gurum kas.
Katɗang ɗi shin kì̵ gurum ni a yit jir, ɓe ɗi gurum ki̶ ki̶lingpee a shi meye? Katɗang ɗi shin kì̵ gurum a kom jir ɓejee, ɓe ɗi cirang gurum nki̶ling ɗu kì̵ mbii mo ɗi ye?
Amma Naan wuri leɓeep mo shini-shini ndi̶ghi̶n shin kì̵ gurum, kaaɗi wuri naa ni ret nwuri nyit si.
Katɗang ɓe ɗi ɓeep ni a mi̶ndong ɓejee ɗak, ɓe ɗi shin kì̵ gurum ni a neye?
Kaaɗi ɓeep kì̵ gurum mo ɗi ɗes, amma ɓe shin kì̵ gurum ni a mi̶ndong ɓejee ɗak,
mpeemi̶ni, ɓe ba yit mmak sat nsar nee. "Ba wan ki̶n riɓet wii kas." Ki̶ zak, ba káa mmak sat nshii nee, "Ba wan ki̶n riɓet wii kas."
Azeen-nzeen, ba ni aasi kas, mpeeɗi rep ɓeep ɗi muu naa mo kaa ba mo ki̶ ɓal kas si, ɓe mo ki̶ koghop ni ɗes mpee shin kì̵ gurum.
Ki̶ muu tap ki̶ ɓeep ɗi muu ɓák mo ɗes zam. Ɓeep ɗi mo mɓut nsun funu mo, ɗi ba mo ret naa kas, ɓe muu tap ki̶ mo riret.
Amma ba muu cín ɗiiɗes mi̶ni mɓeep funu ɗiiret naa ni mo kas. A Naan wurii tap leshin kì̵ gurum aasi, mpeku ɓeep ɗi ba mo ki̶ ɓal kas, ɓe mu tap ɗi ki̶ mo riret zak.
Mpeku taji mee ɓàkshak yaghal ndi̶ghi̶n shin kì̵ gurum kas. Amma koo a ɓeep ɗiiɗang ye ɓe nii tap ki̶ gi̶ni̶ghi̶n.
Katɗang jeel taa nkaa mee ɓeep ni, ɓe kaghar ɓeep ni mo jir mon nshwaajeel ni. Amma katɗang mo kwoop mee ɓeep ni, ɓe kaghar ɓeep ni mo jir, mon nc`in retnyit ashak ki̶ ɓeep mi̶ni.
Wun jir wun a shin kì̵ Kristi, koo a weye ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɓe wuri a memee mɓut mɓeep fi̶ri.

Ndi̶ghi̶n Eki̶lisya, ɓe Naan wuri kì̵ bi̶lip gurum mo le shini-shini. Ɗin nshee, ɓe wuri kì̵ bi̶lip jeplop kì̵ Jesu mo, ɗiivul, ɓe wuri bi̶lip nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mo, ɗiikun, ɓe wuri kì̵ bi̶lip nyemkám mo. Ki̶ wuri bi̶lip nyem c`in ɗak mu mbii aapo mo. Ɗangɓe wuri kì̵ bi̶lip nyem bar gurum mo, ki̶ nyemɓam gurum mo, nyemnaa gurum mo, mpeku mo c`in ɗak ɗi ndi̶re-ndi̶re, ki̶ nyemkatpo mo shi liispo mo shini-shini zak.
Ba a gurum mo jir a jeplop kì̵ Jesu kas. Ba a gurum mo jir mo a nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan kas.
Ba a gurum mo jir, ɗi moo c`in ɗak ɗii mu aapo kas. Ba a gurum mo jir, ɗi mo mak yakshii kì̵ mbii ɗi moo sat shi liispo mo shini-shini kas.
Amma ni ret ku putughup fuu mo ɗee a nkaa zughum ɗi mo ki̶ koghop ni met ndi̶ghi̶n zughum ɗiisi ni mo. Yaksi, ɓe wan nkám wun mee mbii ɗi ni ret ku wu c`in met kaghar mbii mo jir.

Katɗang wan mak katpo shi li̶po mu gurum mo, ki̶ mu nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo, amma katɗang ba wan ki̶ wal ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶na kas, ɓe wan ɗee a kaa wal ki̶ garwa ɗi nin nfii si, koo kaa wal kì̵ kunguleng si.

Katɗang ɓe wan ki̶ zughum mu satpo kì̵ Naan nkaa mbii ɗi mon ndung j`i, ki̶ wan manshii kì̵ mbii ɗiisi̶sok mo, har ki̶ kaghar seen mo jir, ki̶ koo ɗi wan ki̶ cínzeen ɗi ni le ku wan sat njwak mo yaghal aku, a peeɗi mo ɗi, ɓe katɗang ba wan ki̶ wal ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶na kas, ɓe ba wan a mee mbii kas, koo diɓen.
Koo ɗi wan cín long fi̶na mo jir ngurum mo shi zughum, ki̶ koo ɗi wan cín san fi̶na mpeku mo wus ni ɗi, ɓe katɗang ba wan ki̶ wal kas, ɓe ba nii mee koghop pe wan ɗi kas, koo ɗiɓen.
Wal ni a gung mbii mo, ki̶ naajeel kì̵ gurum mo zak. Ba wal ni ki̶ c`in zughur koo canjagham kas koo wup nsat kas.
Ba wal ni ki̶ roghop, koo toklong ngurum mo kas. Ba wal ni ki̶ ɗar a nkaa mbii ɗi mo ret ni nyit ɓejee ɗak kas. Ba wal ni ki̶ langtughup, koo ni wet nyaa shikbish ɗi gurum kì̵ ni mputughup kas.
Ba wal ni ki̶ kat retnyit ki̶ mbii ɗiibish mo kas, amma wal nii kat retnyit a ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi mo azeen.
Wal ni ki̶ gung ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, ki̶ nii cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir zak. Wal nii canciin ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, ki̶ nii yaa sat ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir.

Ba wal nii kyam taa kat kas. Ba wal nii kyes kas, har ngaa-ngaa. Amma satpo kì̵ Naan nkaa mbii ɗi mon ndung j`i mon nɗel so, ki̶ zughum mu iiko mu katpo shi li̶po mo shini-shini, mon nɗel so. Manshii kì̵ mbii mo, ɓe mi̶ni nɗel so zak.
Azeen ba man funu ni a ɗi gi̶gam kas, ki̶ zak, satpo kì̵ Naan nkaa mbii ɗi mon ndung j`i, ba ni a ɗiigi̶gam kas.
Amma katɗang parɗi ngo ɗi wuri a ɗiigi̶gam wurin nj`i, ɓe mbii ɗi ba mo a ɗiigi̶gam kas, mon nɗel so si.

Kaaɗi gyet wan kuɗi a làa, ɓe wan ki̶n katpo a kaa làa si. Wan ki̶n c`in a pan kì̵ jep mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶na, ki̶ zak, wan ki̶n c`in mbii mo a kaa làa si. Amma, yaksi kaaɗi wan a ngunan, ɓe wan yit ɗak ɗi mo a mu jep mo jir.

Mbii ɗi muu naa mo yaksi, ɓe muu naa mo a shir-shir kaaɗi muu naa muriin ndi̶ghi̶n mbii naayit ɗi ba ni naapee riret kas si. Amma parmeeci ɓe mun nnaa mbii mo riret shi yit ki̶ yit. Yaksi ɓe mbii ɗi wan man mo akáa-akáa ɓejee ɗak, amma parpuus mi̶ni ɓe wan mman mbii mo ndi̶re-ndi̶re jir, kaaɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten man wan si.
Mbii mo ɗi kun, ɗi ba mon nkyam ɗel kas, mo a cínzeen, ki̶ canciin, ki̶ wal, amma wal ni ɗes met mmo jir.
Ni ret ku wu naa tong ndi̶ghi̶n wal, ki̶ zak, wu le putughup fuu mo nkaa zughum ɗi Riin wurii cín mo, met jir, ɓe a zughum mu satpo Naan nkaa mbii ɗi mon nc`in.

Koo a weye ɗi wuri ki̶ katpo a shi mee li̶po ɗiici, ɓe wurii katpo aa Naan, ba wurii katpo aa gurum mo kas. Mpeeɗi ba mee gurum man mbii ɗi wuri sat ni kas, wuri sat a mbii ɗi mo a si̶sok ndi̶ghi̶n ɓal kì̵ Riin.

Amma koo a weye, ɗi wurii sat a mbii ɗi Naan kì̵ cín nwuri, mpeku wuri sat ɗi ngurum mo, ɓe wurii katpo aa gurum mo jir mmi̶ni. Mpeku wuri ɓal kwak ɗi ngurum mo, ki̶ zak, mpeku wuri ɓam mo ɗi, ki̶ mpeku wuri caa mo ɗi.
Ngo ɗi wurii katpo a shi mee li̶po ɗiici, wurii ɓam a káa fi̶ri ɓejee. Amma ngo ɗi wurii sat a po ɗi Naan kì̵ cín nwuri, mpeku wuri sat ɗi ngurum mo, ɓe wurii ɓam a Eki̶lisya ni jir.

Wan riɓet ku wun jir, wu katpo shi li̶po mo shini-shini, amma ɗyen nwan nee, ɗi wun jir, wun nsat a po ɗi Naan kì̵ cín nwun, mpeku wu sat ɗi ngurum mo. Ngo ɗi wurii sat a po ɗi Naan kì̵ cín nwuri mpeku wuri sat ɗi ngurum mo, ɓe gwar mi̶ni met ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ katpo shii mee li̶po ɗiici, see koo katɗang ɓe mee gurum ɗi, ɗi wurin mmak pi̶ring ki̶ po ni akuɗang, mpeku ni ɓam Eki̶lisya ni ɗi.

Yaksi ɗyemnaa mo, katɗang wan so pe wun ɗi, ɗangɓe wan katpo ki̶ wun a shi li̶po mo shini-shini, ɓe kyet wan ki̶ mee koghop ni pe wun ɗi wa? Katɗang ba wan so aa mee lop ɗiipoo nwun pe Naan ɗi, koo mee man, koo mee po ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ cín nwan, mpeku wan kám ɗi nwun kas, ɓe ba ni ki̶ mee koghop ni pe wun kas.
Koo a mbii c`in kook ɗi ba mo ki̶ mee seen kas, kaa kuleet ki̶ nɗeng-nɗeng si, katɗang ba ngutaa ni, taa ɗoo ni riret kas, ɓe cirang ɗang gurum mmanshii kì̵ kook ɗi gwar nii taa ɗi ye?
Ki̶ zak, katɗang ba ngutaa feer wuri taa ɗoo ni riret kas, ɓe cirang ɗang gurum mon ɗak sut mpee lek ye?

Ni aasi zak ki̶ wun, katɗang wu sat mbii mo a shi li̶po ɗiici ɗi ba gurum mo manshii ni riret kas, ɓe cirang ɗang gurum mon mmanshii kì̵ mbii ɗi wuu sat ni ɗi ye? Katɗang ni aasi, ɓe po ɗi wuu sat ni, ɓe kut ki̶ mang ni ɗel so ki̶ ni si jaap.
Azeen li̶po mo ɗi shini-shini ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, ki̶ koo a ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe ni ki̶ shii kì̵ ni.
Amma katɗang ba wan man li̶po ɗi mee gurum ki̶ sat kas, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a mi̶zep pe wan ɗi, ki̶ wan ɗee a mi̶zep pe gwar mi̶ni ɗi zak.
Ni aasi zak ki̶ wuwun. Kaaɗi wun wuu fes wu kyaghar zughum mo ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wuri kì̵ cín mo, ɓe wu gung ku wu c`in ɗak ɗi, a shi zughum ɗi mon nc`in mɓam mpee ɗik Eki̶lisya ni.
Mpeemi̶ni, ngo ɗi wurii katpo shi li̶po mo shini-shini, ɓe wuri c`in aduwa, mpeku Naan wuri cín zughum mu man pi̶ring shii kì̵ mbii ɗi wurin nsat ni mo ɗi zak.
Mpeeɗi katɗang wan c`in aduwa nNaan shi mee li̶po ɗiiɗik, ɓe riin fi̶na nii c`in aduwa ni zak, amma ba pan fi̶na nii koghop ni kas.
Katɗang ni aasi, ɓe wan nc`in a meye? Wan nc`in aduwa shi riin fi̶na, ki̶ wan nc`in aduwa shi pan fi̶na zak. Wan nc`in kook ndi̶ghi̶n riin fi̶na, ki̶ wan nc`in kook ni shi pan fi̶na zak.

Katɗang wugha c`in aduwa mu pi̶lang Naan ndi̶ghi̶n kuur a shi riin fugha ɓejee, ɗi ba gurum mo ki̶ling mbii ɗi wugha sat ni kas, ɓe cirang mon nsat amin mpee aduwa mu pi̶lang ɗi wugha sat ni ye? Mpeeɗi ba gurum ni mo man mbii ɗi wugha sat ni kas.
Koo ɗi aduwa fugha mu pi̶lang Naan ni ret nNaan nyit, ɓe ba ni ɓam gi̶nang kas.
Wan pi̶lang Naan, mpeeɗi wan ki̶n katpo mo shi li̶po mo shini-shini met nwun jir.

Amma ndi̶ghi̶n kuur mu Eki̶lisya, ɓe ngyal wan satpo mo a paat ɓejee, ɗi gurum mon nki̶ling, ki̶ ni kám mbii mo zak, met ɗi wan nsatpo mo duɓu kaghapaat shi li̶po mo shini-shini ɗi ba gurum mo manshii ni kas.
Ɗyemnaa mo, taji wu c`in pan kaa jep mo si kas, wu ɗee kaa jep mo si ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiibish mo, amma wu ɗee kaa nyemnan mo si ndi̶ghi̶n pan fuu mo.

Mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee: "A shi gurum ɗi moo katpo ɗiici mo, ki̶ a shi li̶po kì̵ mi̶zep mo, ɓe wan nkatpo nyem ɗiisi mo, a ɗishik amma jir ki̶si, ɓe ba mon nki̶ling wan kas, Daa wuri sat aasi."

Katpo shi li̶po mo shini-shini, ni ɗee a alama mpee nyem ɗi ba mo cínzeen kas. Satpo ɗi Naan ki̶ cín mmee gurum, mpeku wuri sat mbii ɗi ngurum mo, mi̶ni a mpee nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten cínzeen mo, ba mi̶ni a mpee nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ cínzeen kas.

Mpeemi̶ni katɗang nyem Eki̶lisya mo kaat ashak, ɗangɓe koo weye wuri ɗoghom katpo shi li̶po mo shini-shini, ɓe katɗang nyem ɗi ba mo man mee mbii kas, koo nyem ɗi ba mo kì̵ cínzeen kas, mo j`i ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n kuur fuu ni, ɓe wu pan ne, mon nsat nee wun a nyemtar mo kas aa?

Amma katɗang ɓe koo weye wurii sat a po kì̵ Naan, ɓe katɗang mee gurum ɗi ba wuri kì̵ cínzeen kas, koo gwar ɗi ba wuri man mee mbii kas, wuri j`i ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n kuur fuu ni. Ɓe po Naan ɗi wuu sat ni, nin nle ku gwar mi̶ni man nee azeen-nzeen ɗi a ngushikbish, ɓe po ɗi wuri ki̶ling ni, nin mɓiyang putughup fi̶ri.
Mbii ɗi gwar mi̶ni ki̶ pan mo a si̶sok ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri, ɓe mon nkàa put agaak, ki̶ har wurin ntaa nyil, ku wuri seyil ɗi nNaan, ki̶ wurin nsat ɗi nee, azeen-nzeen Naan wuri ɗi nnaar fuu.

A mbii ɗi wan ki̶n riɓet sat ni nɗiisi, ɗyemnaa mo. Katɗang wu kuur ashak mpee seyil nNaan, ɓe memee fuu ki̶ kook mu kwoop Naan, ki̶ memee ki̶ mbiikám, ki̶ memee ki̶ po ɗi Naan kì̵ woo nwuri, ki̶ memee ki̶ satpo ndi̶ghi̶n li̶po ɗiici mo, ki̶ zak, memee ki̶ pi̶ring mbii ɗi moo sat shi li̶po ɗiici ni mo. Wu yit ku mbii ɗiisi mo jir, mo ɗee a mbii ɗi mon c`in ɓal Eki̶lisya ni.
Katɗang mee gurum mo man katpo shi li̶po ɗiici mo, ɓe gurum mo kaa vul koo kun si, mo katpo ni ndangshak-ndangshak, ɓe ni a ting mee gurum pi̶ring shii kì̵ mbii ɗi mo sat ni ngurum mo jir.

Amma katɗang ba mee gurum ɗi, ɗi wurin mmak yakshii kì̵ mbii ɗi ngukatpo shi li̶po ɗiici ni wuri sat kas, ɓe gwar mi̶ni ɗok titik ndi̶ghi̶n kuur kì̵ Eki̶lisya ni, ɓe see wuri katpo mi̶ni a ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri ki̶ Naan ɓejee ɗak.
Gurum mo kaa vul koo kun si, mo katpo ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ cín mo, mpeku mo sat ni ɗi ngurum mo. Ni ret ku kaghar ni mo ɓeetshii ki̶ mbii ɗi mo sat ni.
Amma katɗang Naan wuri cín mee po mee gurum ɗi wuri ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n kuur ni, mpeku wuri sat ɗi ngurum ni mo, ɓe ni ret ku gwar ɗi wuri nkaa katpo nshee si wuri ɗok titik.
Wu mak satpo kì̵ Naan ni ngurum mo ndangshak-ndangshak, mpeku koo weye ɓe wuri kám mee mbii ɗi ku ni ɓam putughup ɗi nwuri zak.
Zughum mu satpo kì̵ Naan, ni a nder ki̶ ngusatpo Naan ni.
Ba Naan wuri a Naan ɗi wurii c`in mbii mo a ɓurish kas, amma wuri a Naan ɗi wurii tap c`in mbii mo ndangshak-ndangshak ndi̶ghi̶n riyang. Moo c`in aasi ndi̶ghi̶n Eki̶lisya mu nyem ɗiiɓang mo jir.
Ni ret ku, mat mo ɗok titik ndi̶ghi̶n kuur mu Eki̶lisya mo. Ba mu riɓet mmo, ku mo katpo kas. Amma ni ret ku, mo sham ki̶ káa furu mo, kaaɗi Waar kì̵ nyem Yahudi mo sat si.
Katɗang mo riɓet man mee mbii, ɓe mo tal pu mish furu mo ntulu. Mpeeɗi ni a mbii shooppee, mpeku mat katpo ndi̶ghi̶n kuur kì̵ Eki̶lisya mo.
Mo shee po kì̵ Naan ni a shi wun aa? Koo a wun a nyem ɗi po kì̵ Naan ni wul pe wun ɗi ɓejee ɗak ye?
Katɗang mee gurum ki̶ pan nee, wuɗi a ngusatpo kì̵ Naan, koo wuɗi ki̶ zughum ɗi ni a mu Riin, ɓe ni ret ku gwar mi̶ni man nee, mbii ɗi wan ki̶n ran nwun ni a Waar kì̵ Naan.
Katɗang gwar mi̶ni kwar ki̶ling po ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe taji wu ki̶ling wuri kas.
Mpeemi̶ni, ɗyemnaa mo, wu le putughup fuu mo a nkaa satpo kì̵ Naan, ki̶ taji wu cíi katpo ndi̶ghi̶n li̶po mo shini-shini kas.
Amma wu c`in koo a meye ndi̶ghi̶n ɗyen, ki̶ ndangshak-ndangshak zak.
Ɗyemnaa mo, yaksi ɓe wan riɓet baa lepan ɗi nwun, nkaa po ɗiiret, ɗi gyet wan ki̶n sat ni nwun, ɗi gyet wuu lap ni, ki̶ ɗi wu cínzeen, ɗi wuu ɗar a nkaa ni zak.
A shi po ɗiiret ɗiisi ni, ɓe wuu kat ɓam katɗang ɓe wu yaa po ɗi wan ki̶n sat ni nwun ɓal-ɓal. Katɗang aasi kas, ɓe cínzeen fuu ni a ɗiibuu.
Mbii ɗi gyet wan ki̶n lap ni, ɓe wan kì̵ cín a ni nwun, ɗi ni ki̶ koghop ni hakyeng nee; Kristi wuri muut mpee shikbish funu mo, kaaɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si.
Mo wum wuri, ɓe wuri yaghal a peemúut par shii ɗiikun, ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si.
Wuri shee kámshin fi̶ri mPita, ɗangɓe wuri kámshin fi̶ri njeplop fi̶ri ɗiikaghapaat baavul si mo.
Aɓwoon mi̶ni, ɓe wuri kámshin fi̶ri nyemcínzeen mo, ɗi mo met ɗaripàat a pee mi̶ndong. Pak nyem ɗi j`i mo naa wuri, mo ɗi ɗes ɗi mo kuɗi ki̶ seen, amma pak mo kì̵ ten murap.
Wuri kámshin fi̶ri nJemis zak, ki̶ jeplop fi̶ri ni mo jir.
Ɗangɓe a peekyes ni, ɓe wuri kámshin fi̶ri nwan zak, wan ɗi wan a kaa làa ɗi mo kì̵ ten taa làa, ɓe ba tar làa ni ki̶ wul kas si.
Mpeeɗi wan a ɗiilee mɓut jeplop kì̵ Jesu ni mo. Ba ɗi ni ret ku mo pet wan a memee mɓut jeplop kì̵ Jesu mo kas, mpeeɗi gyet wan ki̶n cín jeel Eki̶lisya kì̵ Naan.

Amma mpee ɗiiret ki̶ kussuk kì̵ Naan, ɓe wan ɗi, kaaɗi wan ɗi yaksi si. Ɗiiret ki̶ kussuk ɗiisi ɗi Naan wuri cín nwan, ni kì̵ c`in ɗak ɗes ndi̶ghi̶n wan. Har wan ki̶n c`in ɗak shiɓal met jeplop fi̶ri ni mo jir. Amma jir ki̶si, ɓe ba a wan c`in ɗak mi̶ni mo kas, amma a ɗiiret ki̶ kussuk kì̵ Naan ɗi ni c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶na.
Ni aasi, koo ɗi gyet, a wan satpo ni, koo ɗi gyet a mo satpo ni, ɓe muu sat a mbii ɗiimi̶ndong, ki̶ wun wuu cínzeen a po mi̶ni.
Katɗang moo satpo nee, Kristi wuri kì̵ yaghal a peemúut, ɓe a me le ɗang pak fuu moo sat ne, ba mee yaghal a peemúut ɗi mpee nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap mo kas ye?
Katɗang ba mee yaghal a peemúut ɗi, mpee nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap kas, ɓe ni kám nee, ba Kristi wuri ki̶ yaghal a peemúut kas mmi̶ni.
Katɗang ɓe ba ɗi Kristi wuri kì̵ yaghal a peemúut kas, ɓe po ɗiiret, ɗi muu sat ni ɗee a ɗiibuu, ki̶ ɓe ɗi cínzeen fuu ni ɗee a ɗiibuu zak.

Ɓe ɗi mu ɗee a nyem c`in langting mu ɗung mo nkaa Naan, mpeeɗi muu c`in langting nkaa Naan nee, a Naan wuri yaghal ki̶ Kristi a peemúut. Amma katɗang ɗi ni azeen-nzeen ne, ba nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap mon nyaghal a peemúut kas, ɓe ba Naan wuri kì̵ yaghal ki̶ Kristi a peemúut kas mi̶ni zak.
Katɗang ba nyem ɗi mo kì̵ murap mon nyaghal kas, ɓe ba Kristi wuri kì̵ yaghal kas zak.
Katɗang ɗi ba Kristi wuri kì̵ yaghal a peemúut kas, ɓe cínzeen fuu ni ɗee a ɗiibuu, ɓe ɗi har yaksi, wuu tong ɗi a mɓut shikbish fuu mo vit.
Ɓe ɗi nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap mɓut Kristi, mo kì̵ ɗee a ɗiili̶lagham mo mmi̶ni zak.
Katɗang ɗi canciin funu ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi ni a mpee seen ɗii mu yil ɗiisi ɗak, ɓe ɗi mu ɗee a mbii naajeel, met kaghar gurum mo jir.
Yaksi Naan wuri kì̵ yaghal ki̶ Kristi a peemúut azeen-nzeen. A wuri a ɗin nshee, mu yaghal a peemúut, mu nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap mo jir.
Kaaɗi gyet, muut ni ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, a mpee ngumi̶ndong, ni aasi zak, ɓe a mpee ngumi̶ndong, ɓe Naan wurin nyaghal ki̶ gurum ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap mo a peemúut zak.
Mpeeɗi a mpee Adam ɓe gurum mo jir mo murap, ni aasi zak, a ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi ɓe gurum mo jir mon nyaghal a peemúut ki̶ seen.
Amma koo meye ɓe mo a ndangshak-ndangshak. A Kristi wuri a ɗin nshee mu yaghal a peemúut akuɗang. Katɗang wurin mbaaj`i, ɗangɓe nyem fi̶ri mon nyaghal a peemúut zak.
Ɗangɓe peekyes kì̵ yil nin nj`i wul, ɓe Kristi wurin ncín mulki ni nNaan puun, aɓwoon ɗi wuri kì̵ ten twa koo a mulki, ki̶ iiko, ki̶ koo a ɓal ɗiiɗang ye.
Mpeeɗi ting Kristi wurin nc`in mulki ni har parpuus ɗi Naan wurin nle shaarlek kì̵ Jesu mo ɗee nder shii fi̶ri.
Shaarlek ɗi wurin ntu ni a pee kyes ni, a muut.

Mpeeɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten le mbii mo jir nder shii fi̶ri. Kaaɗi mo ki̶ sat si nee, "mo kì̵ le mbii mo jir nder shii fi̶ri". Ɓe ni ɗee agaak ne, ba a Naan ɗee nder fi̶ri kas, amma Naan wuri kì̵ le mbii mo jir nder kì̵ Kristi.

Amma, aɓwoon ɗi mo kì̵ le mbii mo jir, nder kì̵ mulki mu Naan, ɓe Làa ni wuri shikáa fi̶ri, wurin nleshin fi̶ri nder kì̵ Naan. Naan ɗi wuri le mbii mo jir nder kì̵ Kristi, mpeku Naan wuri se mulki ɗi nkaa mbii mo jir.

Yaksi, katɗang ɓe ɗi ba mee yaghal a peemúut ɗi kas, ɓe ɗi nyem ɗi moo c`in baptisma mmo a koppee kì̵ nyem ɗi mo ki̶ murap, ɓe mon nkat a meye? Katɗang ɗi ba mee yaghal a peemúut ɗi kas, ɓe a me le ɗangɓe gurum moo c`in baptisma a koppee kì̵ nyemmuut mo ye?
Ki̶ zak, ɓe ɗi a me le ɗangɓe muu lappee, ku muu shwaajeel ɗi ki̶si shidaar-shidaar ye?
Ɗyemnaa mo, wan ki̶n naa muut, koo a puus ɗiiɗang ye. A roghop ɗi wan ki̶ni ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɗi ni a seen funu ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi Jesu, Daa funu, a ni le ɗang wan satpo mi̶ni.

Katɗang ɗi gyet wan c`in lek ashak ki̶ luwayil mo nyil Afisus a mpee pan mu gurum ɗak, ɓe li̶ɓet ɗi wan nkat ni a meye? Katɗang ɓe ba mo yaghal ki̶ nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap a peemúut kas, "Ɓe wu yit ku mu se, mu shwaa, mpeku daɗaar ɓe mu murap ɗi."
Taji wu yit ku mee gurum num wun kas. Katɗang gurum ki̶ mwaan ashak ki̶ nyemɗiibish mo, ɓe mi̶se fi̶ri nin nɗee a ɗiibish zak.
Wu baa wu j`i ndi̶ghi̶n pan fuu mo kaaɗi ni ret ku wu c`in si, ki̶ wu nook c`in shikbish. Wan ki̶n sat nwun nee, ba pak fuu mo man Naan kas. Wan ki̶n sat ɗiisi a mpeku ni shoop wun ɗi.
Meeɓe, mee gurum ntal nee, "Cirang ɗangɓe nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap, mon mbaa yaghal ɗi a peemúut ki̶ seen ye? Mon nyaghal a shi kiyeet kì̵ sut ɗiiɗang ye?"
Wugha mwen! A man nee, katɗang a kop cirem ndi̶ghi̶n yil, ɓe see cirem nin nwam, ɗangɓe àas kì̵ mbii ɗi a kop ni kàa put.
Katɗang a kop mee cirem nyil, ɓe ba wugha ki̶ iiko nkaa ni kas, amma wugha ki̶kop a àas ni ɓejee ɗak. Bishmee ɓe, ni a àas kì̵ shwaa, kas meeɓe mee cirem ɗiiɗik.
Amma Naan wurin ncín mee shin ɗi nni, kaaɗi wuri kì̵ ten le ni si. Koo àas cirem ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe Naan wurin ntap cín shin ki̶ ni ɗik.
Ba nan mo a ntiit-ntiit jir kas. Gurum mo ki̶ nan muru ɗik, ki̶ luwa mo ki̶ nan muru ɗik, ki̶ ny`er mo ki̶ nan muru ɗik, ki̶ pupwap mo ki̶ nan muru ɗik zak.
Mun ɗi ki̶ sun ɗi mo a mu ɗengnaan, ki̶ mun ɗi ki̶ sun ɗi mo a mu yil ɗiisi zak. Amma sun funu ɗi mo a mu ɗengnaan, ret ki̶ ɗiiɗes kì̵ mo ni ɗik zak ki̶ sun funu ɗi mo a mu yil ɗiisi.
Ret kì̵ ɗiiɗes mu puus ni ɗik, ret kì̵ ɗiiɗes mu tar ni ɗik, ki̶ mu zar mo ɗik zak, jir ki̶si, ɓe pak ret kì̵ ɗiiɗes, mu zar ni moo met nshak zak. Mo ɗi ki̶ ɗiiɗes furu mo shini-shini.

Nin nɗee aasi zak, parpuus ɗi nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap, mon nyaghal a peemúut. Kaaɗi mo wum gurum, ɓe shin fi̶ri ni wam, amma kaaɗi Naan wurin nyaghal ki̶ gurum a peemúut, ɓe ba shin fi̶ri nin mbaa wam ɗi zak kas.
Kaaɗi mo wum gurum, ɓe nii bish naa, ki̶ ba ni ki̶ ɓal kas, amma parpuus ɗi Naan wurin nyaghal ki̶ ni a peemúut, ɓe nin yaghal a ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiɗes, ki̶ nin nret naa zak.

Kúm gurum ɗi moo wum ni aa shin mu nan ɓejee ɗak, amma parpuus ɗi Naan wurin nyaghal ki̶ gurum a peemúut, ɓe ni ɗen a shin mu riin. Kaaɗi sun ɗi ni a mu nan ni ɗi si, ɓe azeen-nzeen sun ɗi ni a mu riin ni ɗi zak.
Mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee; "Naan wuri shee le Adam wuri a gurum ɗiiseen." Amma Adam ɗii mu kyes ni, wuri a Riin mu seen, ki̶ wuri cín seen ngurum mo.
Ba gyet a ngo mu riin wuri shee j`i kas, amma gyet a ngo mu nan shee j`i ɗangɓe ngo mu Riin kì̵ baaj`i.
Gwar ɗi gyet Naan shee le wuri, ɓe gyet Naan ɗak wuri a shi yil, amma gwar ɗiivul ni wuri tong aɗeng sham ɗi.
Nyem ɗi mo a mu yil ni, ɓe mo a kaa gwar ɗi gyet Naan shee ɗak wuri shi yil ni si. Amma nyem ɗi mo a mu ɗeng, ɓe mo a kaa gwar ɗi gyet wuri tong a ɗeng sham ɗi si.
Kaaɗi muu lop a sun ɗi ni a kaa mu gwar ɗi gyet Naan ɗak wuri a shi yil si, ɓe mun nyaghal mu lop a sun ɗi ni a kaa mu gwar ɗi wuri tong aɗeng sham ɗi si zak.
Ɗyemnaa mo, wan ki̶n sat nwun agaak nee, ba gurum ndi̶ghi̶n mi̶se mu nan ki̶ toghom, mak sekop mu mulki kì̵ Naan kas. Ki̶ ba mbii ɗiiwam, nin mmak sekop a koppee kì̵ mbii ɗi ba nii kyam wam kas, zak.
Wu lekom, ku wan sat mee mbii ɗi ni a si̶sok ɗi nwun. Ba mun jir mun mmurap kas, amma Naan wurin ncighi̶r ki̶ sun funu ni mo jir.
Ki̶lak kaa ɗyaghapyit si, parpuus ɗi mon ntaa feer ɗii mu kyes ni, ɓe nyem ɗi mo kì̵ ten murap, mon nyaghal ki̶ seen. Ba mon mbaa wam ɗi zak kas. Ɗangɓe mon ncighi̶r ki̶ sun funu ni mo jir.
Mpeeɗi ni a ting parpuus mi̶ni, ɓe sun funu ɗi mo a mu wam, mon nlop sun ɗi ba mi̶ni mon nkyam wam kas zak, ki̶ sun funu ɗi mo a mu muut, ɓe ba mon nkyam murap kas zak.

Aɓwoon ɗi sun funu ɗi mo a mu wam, mo lop sun ɗi ba mon nkyam wam kas, ki̶ sun funu ɗi mo a mu muut, mo lop sun ɗi ba mon nkyam murap kas zak. Ɗangɓe sumpo ɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ni ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nin ngam ɗi, ɗi ni sat nee: "Mo kì̵ tu muut hakyeng ki̶n ndi̶ng-ndi̶ng.
Muut, koghorong fii ni a neye? Muut, ɓal fii ɗi wii twa gurum mo ɗishik si ni a neye?"
Ɓal mu twapee kì̵ muut ni a shikbish, ki̶ a mpee Waar ɗangɓe shikbish ni kat iiko.
Amma yaksi, mu pi̶lang Naan, ɗi wuri cín se koghorong mmun ndi̶ghi̶n Daa funu Jesu Kristi.

Mpeemi̶ni ɗyemnaa mo, wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal. Taji wu le ku mee mbii tup wun kas. Amma wu sat a nc`in ɗak mu Daa shidaar-shidaar, mpeeɗi wu man nee, koo a ɗak ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wuu c`in ni mpee Daa, ɓe ba nin nkyam ɗee a mbii ɗiibuu kas, koo diɓen
Yaksi, ɓe po nkaa kyak shaghal ɗi wun ntul ni mpee ɓam nyem kì̵ Naan ɗi mo nyil nJudiya, ni ret ku wu c`in kaaɗi gyet wan ki̶n sat nEki̶lisya ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil nGalati mo c`in si.
Koo a puus Láadi ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe ni ret ku koo weye wuri le mee shaghal mpee cín zughum ntiit-ntiit ki̶ ɓal fi̶ri, mpeku katɗang parpuus ɗi wan nso pe wun ɗi, ɓe taji wu ɗee nkyak mee shaghal kas.
Katɗang wan nso wul pe wun ɗi, ɓe wan ncín wasika nyem ɗi wuu ten wu bi̶lip mo, mpeku mo so ɗi ki̶ shaghal ni nyil nJerusalem.
Katɗang wan naa ni ret, ku wan so nJerusalem, ɓe mon nso ashak ki̶ wan zak.
Wann nj`i pe wun ɗi, aɓwoon ɗi wan ki̶n so nyil mMasidoniya, mpeeɗi wan ki̶n riɓet yaa ar ni ɗel so a nyil mMasidoniya ni.
Meeɓe wan mpan nyém pe wun ɗi mpee rep pee mo lee ɗak, ki̶ meeɓe wan ntong pe wun ɗi mpee tar kut, mpeku wu ɓam wan ɗi, a ar mwaan fi̶na, koo pee ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wann nso ɗi.
Ɗyen nwan nnaa wun zam, ba a ɗi wan nnaa wun, ɓe wan a ar ɗel so ki̶lak-ki̶lak kas. Katɗang Daa wuri riɓet, ɓe wan ncanciin mpee so tong pe wun ɗi panpoong.
Amma wan ntong mpesi nyil Afisus, har see parpuus mu seriɓet mu Pentikos.
Mpeeɗi, peeɗi nwan ɗes mpee ɗiisi, mpeku wan katpee c`in ɗak ɗiiret, ki̶ ɗi nii koghop ni ndi̶ghi̶n nyil Afisus ni zak. Koo ɗi gurum mo ɗes moo kwar ɗak fi̶na ni.
Katɗang Timoti wuri so wul pe wun ɗi, ɓe wu kaat wuri riret nnaar fuu. Taji wu le mee ki̶i̶rmuut yaa wuri kas, mpeeɗi wurii c`in a ɗak kì̵ Daa, kaaɗi wan ki̶n c`in si zak.

Taji mee gurum ɓák wuri kas, amma ni ret ku wu ɓam wuri ndi̶ghi̶n mwaan fi̶ri, mpeku wuri sekiyeen ɗi ki̶ mwaan fi̶ri ni ndi̶ghi̶n riyang, ki̶ mpeku wuri baaj`i ɗi pe wan ɗi zak, mpeeɗi wan ki̶n leyit mpee naa baaj`i fi̶ri ashak ki̶ pak ɗyemnaa mo zak.

Yaksi, po nkaa ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu, Apolos, jí wan ki̶n satpo nwuri shiɓal nee, ni ret ku wuri so naa wun ashak ki̶ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n mo. Ba gyet ɗyen nwurin nso pe wun ɗi ntiit ki̶ mi̶ni kas, amma katɗang wurin nkatpee, ɓe wurin nso pe wun ɗi.
Wu tong shi gongpee, ki̶ wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fuu. Wu ɗee a nyemgung mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup, ki̶ nyemɗiiɓal mo.
Wu c`in mbii mo jir ndi̶ghi̶n wal.

Wu man nee, gyet a nyemtulu ki̶ Stifenas mo a nyem ɗi gyet mo shee cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n nyil Akaya, ki̶ mo cín sut furu mo mpee c`in ɗak ɗi mo ɓam nyem kì̵ Naan mo ɗi zak. Wan ki̶n ɗang pu wun ɗyemnaa fi̶na mo.
Ku wu mwaan ndang mi̶se kì̵ gurum mo kaa mi̶ni mo si, ki̶ wu mwaan ndang koo weye ɗi wuri cín káa fi̶ri, mpee c`in ɗak mu ɓam, ashak ki̶ mo.
Ni fes ret nwan nyit zam, mpee j`i ki̶ Stifenas ki̶ Fortunatus, ki̶ Akaikus, mpeeɗi mo j`i ki̶ mbii mo nwan a koppee fuu, mbii ɗi ba jí wan ki̶ mo kas.
Ki̶ zak, mo caa wan, kaaɗi jí moo caa wuwun si. Gurum mo kaa mo si, ni ret ku wu cín ɗiiɗes mmo.

Eki̶lisya ɗi mon nkoghop nyil mu Eshiya moo lop tokshik furu mo so pe wun ɗi. Akwila ki̶ Priskila, ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi moo kaat ashak ndi̶ghi̶n tulu furu, mo lop tokshik mu nyemso ndang Jesu mo so nwun ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Daa.
Ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu, ɗi mo mpesi, moo lop tokshik furu mo so pe wun ɗi jir. Wu tok ki̶ shak ndi̶ghi̶n wal kaa mu nyemso ndang Naan mo si.
A wan Pool, ki̶n ran tokshik ɗiisi nwun, shi sar fi̶na.
Koo ngo ɗiiɗang ye ɗi ba wuri wal nDaa kas, ɓe wu yit ku gwar mi̶ni ɗee a mbiifulup. Daa funu wurin ndung baaj`i.
Ɗiiret kì̵ Daa funu Jesu ni tong ashak ki̶ wun jir.
Wal fi̶na ni tong ashak ki̶ wun jir ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Kristi Jesu. Amin.

Wasika ɗiisi ni put a nsar kì̵ Pool laalop mu Kristi Jesu, shi riɓet kì̵ Naan, ki̶ nsar kì̵ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu Timoti. Wan ki̶n lop wasika ɗiisi ni so pee Eki̶lisya kì̵ Naan ɗi mon nKoronti, ki̶ nyemso ndang Jesu ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n yil Akaya jir.
Ɗiiret, ki̶ riyang mu Naan puun funu, ki̶ mu Daa funu Jesu Kristi mo tong ashak ki̶ wun.
Wan ki̶n pi̶lang Naan puun kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi. Puun ɗi wuri gam ki̶ kussuk mu naajeel. Naan ɗi wuri a nguɓam mun jir.
A wurii ɓam mun mɓut njeel funu mo jir, mpeku mu katpee ɓam nyem ɗi moo shwaajeel mo shini-shini shi ɓam ɗi mun mu kat ni pe Naan ɗi si zak.
Katɗang ɓe mu shwaajeel ɗes, kaaɗi Kristi wuri shwaajeel si, ɓe Naan wurin mɓam mun ɗes ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi zak.

Katɗang mu shwaajeel, ɓe ni a mpee gang putughup fuu mo, ki̶ ni a mpee ɓam fuu zak. Katɗang Naan wuri ɓam mun, ɓe ni a mpee ɓam wun zak, ɗi nin nle ku wu gung kiyeet kì̵ jeel ɗi wuu shwaa ni mo, kaa mun si zak.
Mpeemi̶ni ɓe canciin funu ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ba ni mak yoghon kas, koo diɓen. Mpeeɗi mu man nee, kaaɗi wuu shwaajeel ashak ki̶ mun si, ɓe wun nkat ɓam ashak ki̶ mun aasi zak.

Ɗyemnaa mo, muu riɓet ku mu lepan nwun, nkaa jeel ɗi mu shwaa ni ndi̶ghi̶n yil Eshiya. Gyet jeel ni fes ten mun toghon-toghon hakyeng, har gyet ni met mmun mɓal, ki̶ har gyet muu pwat ki̶ putughup funu mo nee, baa mun mbar kas.

Ki̶ gyet mu naa kaa mo kì̵ can a ɗiyeel tukáa mmun si, amma ni c`in aasi, a mpeku taji mu gangkáa funu a nkaa sun funu mo kas, amma see mu gangkáa funu mo a nkaa Naan ɓejee ɗak. Naan ɗi wurii yaghal ki̶ gurum mo a peemúut.
Naan wuri kì̵ ten put ki̶ mun ndi̶ghi̶n muut ni, ki̶ wurin ndung put ki̶ mun ndi̶ghi̶n muut ni zak. Mun mu cínzeen nee, wurin mbaa put ki̶ mun ndi̶ghi̶n muut ni riyang zak.
Wu ɓam mun shi aduwa fuu mo, mpeku gurum mo ɗes mo pi̶lang Naan ɗi mpee mun, mpee ɓam ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ c`in ni mmun. Mpeeɗi Naan wurin nlap aduwa ɗi gurum mo ɗes moo c`in ni mpee mun.

A mbii ɗi muu canjagham ɗiki̶ nɗiisi, pan ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo ki̶ c`in langting nee, tong funu ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi ni a shi putughup mi̶ndong, mpee Naan, ki̶ pe wun ɗi zak. Ba a shi mee seen ɗi ni a mu gurum mo kas, amma a shi ɗiiret mu Naan.
Ba mu ran a mee po ɗiiluk nwun ndi̶ghi̶n wasika ni kas, amma a po nkaa mbii ɗi wun mmak tang ni, ɓe wun mmanshii kì̵ ni zak. Wan canciin nee, wun mmanshii kì̵ ni riret.
Kaaɗi wuu ten wu manshii kì̵ ni lee si nee, wun mmak canjagham shi mun, kaaɗi mumun ncanjagham shi wun si zak, parɗi Daa funu Jesu wurin nj`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi zak.
A mpeeɗi gyet wan naa ni ret aasi, a ni le ɗang gyet wan ki̶ riɓet so pe wun ɗi nshee, mpeku wu kat ɗiiret ɗi kaa yit vul si.
Wan ki̶n riɓet taa pe wun ɗi, a ar so mMasidoniya, ki̶ katɗang wan so mMasidoniya ni, ɓe wan nj`i taa pe wun ɗi zak, mpeku wu sel wan ɗi a ar so nyil nJudiya.

Ashee! kaaɗi jí wan riɓet c`in ki̶si, ɓe wan c`in a mbii ɗin nkan mmi̶ni aa? Aa koo, wu pan ne wan ki̶n c`in mbii a buu-buu, kaaɗi gurum mu yil ni moo c`in si ye? Ɗi wan nsat nee, "Ii" ɗangɓe aɓwoon, ɓe wan waa baa sat ne, "waash" zak aa?
Kaaɗi Naan wuri a nguzeen si, ɓe po ɗi muu sat nwun, ba ni a "Ii" ki̶ "waash" kas.
Po ɗi gyet Silas ki̶ Timoti ki̶ wan, mu sat nwun nkaa Jesu Kristi làa kì̵ Naan, ɓe ba po mi̶ni a Ii, koo waash kas. Amma ndi̶ghi̶n Naan, ɓe koo a pi̶rang ye, ɓe po mi̶ni a "Ii"
Mpeeɗi po ɗi Naan wuri tuwoorpo mo jir, ɓe mo gampo mi̶ni mo a ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu, ki̶ a mpee Jesu ɗangɓe muu sat nee, "Amin" zak mpeku mo le Naan ɗi a ɗiiɗes.
A Naan ɗi wuri bi̶lip mun leɗik, a wuri le mun ashak ki̶ wun ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
Wuri las alama fi̶ri nkaa mun, nee mun a mi̶ri mo. Wuri cín Riin fi̶ri ɗiiɓang mmun ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo, mpeku Riin ni kám ɗi mmun mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ le ni mmun akiyeen.
Amma wan pet Naan a langting fi̶na nee, mbii ɗi jí ni le ku wan nook so nKoronti ni, a mpeku taji wan lejeel nwun kas.
Ba muu gung a mpeku mu leting ɗi nwun nkaa mbii ɗi wu cínzeen nni kas koo diɓen, mpeeɗi wuu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen ni. Amma muu c`in ɗak ashak ki̶ wun, mpeku wu kat retnyit ɗi.
Wan kì̵ lepan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶na nee, ba wann mbaaso pe wun ɗi kas, mpeku taji wan wat putughup nwun.
Katɗang ɓe wan wat putughup nwun, ɓe a we ɗee ɗi a ɗi wurin nle retnyit nwan ye? A wun nyem ɗi wan wat putughup nwun, ɓe a wun ncaa nwan.

A mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan ran wasika ni nwun, mpeku katɗang wan j`i pe wun ɗi, ɓe taji wan kat mee mbii wat putughup mɓut nwun, nyem ɗi wu le retnyit nwan kas. Wan cínzeen nwun jir nee, retnyit fi̶na ni a muu jir zak.

Wan ran wasika ni nwun a shi putughup ɗiiwuwat hakyeng, ki̶ shi yitmwaan, ki̶ jeel ɗes zak. Wan ran wasika ɗiisi, ba a mpeku wan wat putughup ɗi nwun kas, amma a mpeku wu man ɗi nee, wan wal nwun zam.

Katɗang ɓe mee ngo kì̵ wat putughup mmee gurum, ɓe ba ngo mi̶ni wat a putughup mi̶na ɓejee ɗak kas, amma wuri wat a putughup muu, koo a putughup mu pak fuu mo. Ba ɗyen nwan nsatpo shiɓal nkaa ngo mi̶ni kas.
Mpee kiyeet kì̵ ngo mi̶ni, ɓe kar ɗi wun kì̵ ten cín nwuri, ni mak.
Amma yaksi, ɓe ngyal wu fwo ɗi ngwar mi̶ni, mpeku wu ɓam wuri ɗi, mpeku taji putughup ɗiiwuwat fi̶ri ni waa si̶ghi̶t daampee nwuri hakyeng.
Mpeemi̶ni wan ɗang pe wun, wu si̶ghi̶t wu kám wal fuu mon nwuri.
Gyet wan ran wasika ni nwun, a mpeku wan kyam wun ɗi, ku wan man ɗi nee, kyet wun a nyem c`in mbii mo, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗyen jir wa?
Koo ngo ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wu fwo nwuri, mpee mee ɗiibish ɗi wuri c`in, ɓe wan nfwo ngo ni aasi zak. Katɗang ɓe mee mbii mu fwo ni ɗi, ɓe wan nfwo ngo mi̶ni a mpee wun, mpee ɗiiret kì̵ Kristi.
Mpeku taji Shetan kat mee li̶ɓet ndi̶ghi̶n mun kas, mpeeɗi ba seen fi̶ri ɗiibish mo a ɗiisi̶sok mmun kas.
Kaaɗi wan baaj`i nTrowas mpee satpo nkaa Kristi ngurum mo, ɓe wan kat Daa wuri kì̵ wang ar mpee wan.
Jir ki̶si, ɓe ba putughup fi̶na ni kat retnyit kas, mpeeɗi ba wan kat ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶na Titus ɗi mpeemi̶ni kas. Mpeemi̶ni ɓe gyet wan sat ɗang-mukaat mmo, ɓe wan ɗel so nyil Masidoniya.

Wan pi̶lang Naan, ɗi a wurii sel mun shidaar-shidaar, ku mu ɗee ɗi a koghorong mo, mpee ɗiiret kì̵ Kristi. A shi mun, ɓe wuri pweer man kì̵ Kristi ɗi ni a kaa mbii ɗiiɗu shang-shang si, koo a mpee ɗiiɗang ye.
Mpeeɗi pe Naan ɗi, ɓe mun a kaa ɗu ɗiishang mo, mu Kristi, mpee nyem ɗi mo kat ɓam, ki̶ nyem ɗi mo a ar lagham.

A mu peekyes ni nɗiisi, ɗu ɗiivul ni a ɗu ɗii mu wam, mu muut ɗi nii so a peelagham. Amma a mu ɗin nshee ni nɗiisi, ni a fuwaap ɗiishang mu seen ɗi nii so a peeseen. A we mmak mang toghon kì̵ mbii ɗiisi mo ye?
Mpeeɗi ba mun a kaa pak gurum ɗi moo satpo Naan ni a mpee kat li̶ɓet mu shaghal kas. Po munu ni a mi̶ndong, mbii ɗi Naan wuri sat mmun, ɓe muu sat a po mi̶ni ntoghom kì̵ Naan aasi, ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
Yaksi, ɓe mun nwaa mu ɗoghom kwoop a káa funu zak aa? Kyet muu riɓet mee wasika ɗi mun nkwoop wun ɗishik, koo ɗi wuwun nkwoop mun ɗishik, kaaɗi pak gurum moo c`in si wa?
Wun shikáa fuu, a wun a wasika funu, ɗi mon nkwoop mun ɗishik ni. Mo kì̵ ran ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo, mpeku koo weye wuri man ni ɗi, ki̶ ku wuri tang ɗi zak.

Ni kám agaak nee, a Kristi shikáa fi̶ri wuri ran wasika ɗiisi ni mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo, ɗangɓe wuri lop ni nsar funu. Ba mo ran wasika ɗiisi ni a shi ing kas, ki̶ ba mo ran ni a nkaa sulet mu jwak kas. Amma mo ran ni a ndi̶ghi̶n putughup kì̵ gurum mo, shi Riin kì̵ Naan ɗi wurin mmeen har ngaa-ngaa.
Muu satpo mi̶ni, a mpeeɗi mu cínzeen nNaan ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi.
Ba mee mbii ndi̶ghi̶n mun, ɗi ni mak le ku mu sat nee, mu c`in mbii ɗiisi mo a shikáa funu kas. Ɗak ɗiisi ni a iiko ɗi muu mak c`in pak mbii mo, put a pe Naan ɗi.
Mpeeɗi a wuri le ku mu ɗee a nyem c`in ɗak mu ɓi̶lemcuk shi toghom kì̵ Naan ɗiipoo, ba a shi Waar ɗiiriran mo kas, amma a shi Riin. Waar ɗiiriran nii j`i ki̶ muut, amma Riin mu Naan wurii cín seen.

Gyet mo ran Waar kì̵ Mosis ni mo a nkaa sulet mu jwak mo, ki̶ kaaɗi gyet Naan cín Waar ni mo mMosis, ɓe ɗiiɗes mu Naan j`i put agaak. Koo ɗi gyet mi̶lep mu yit kì̵ Mosis nii kyes, ɓe ba gyet nyem Yahudi mo mak ti̶ghi̶r yit furu mo nkaa yit kì̵ Mosis kas, mpee peeɓang ɗi ni ɗes ni. Katɗang ɓe gyet Waar mu Mosis ɗi nii j`i ki̶ muut ni j`i aa ɗiiɗes aasi.
Ɓe ni a ting ɗak mu Riin mu Naan nin nɗes met mu Waar ni.
Mpeeɗi katɗang ɓe mo le ɗak mu Waar ɗi nii j`i ki̶ lagham a ɗiiɗes, ɓe azeen-nzeen ɗak mu Riin ɗi nin nj`i ki̶ ɗiiret mu Naan, ni a ɗiiɗes met ɗak mu Waar ni hakyeng.
Ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiisi, ɓe mu naa nee, mbii ɗi gyet ni a ɗiiɗes, ɓe mbii ɗi nin ntong ɗi har ngaa-ngaa ni fes met ɗi gyet yam ni.
Katɗang ɓe mo kám ne, mbii ɗi nin ndung ɗel so a ɗiiɗes, ɓe mbii ɗi nin ntong ɗi har ngaa-ngaa nin nɗen ki̶ ɗiiɗes met ɗi nin ndung ɗel so ni, ɗes hakyeng.
Mpeeɗi mun ki̶ canciin ndi̶ghi̶n po ɗiiret ni aasi, ɓe muu satpo funu shiɓal agaak hakyeng.
Ba mun a kaa Mosis si kas, ɗi gyet wuri paa yit fi̶ri shi fuwaat, mpeku taji nyem Yahudi mo naa kyes kì̵ ɗiiɗes, mu mi̶lep mu yit fi̶ri ɗi nin nɗel so si kas.

Mpeeɗi gyet pan furu ni mo a ɗiidudughur har mpee cicinsi. Katɗang ɓe mo ɗoghom tang po Naan ɗiisi̶ghi̶r, ɓe fuwaat paapee ɗiisi ni paa ni, ki̶ ni kuɗi, a ɗiipi̶paa pe mo ɗi. See katɗang gurum cínzeen nKristi ɓejee, ɗangɓe mon mmak mang fuwaat ni baa ki̶ ni.
Azeen-nzeen har cicinsi, katɗang mo ɗoghom tang Waar mu Mosis ni mo, ɓe fuwaat ɗiisi, nii paa putughup furu mo ɗi vit.
Amma katɗang mee gurum cighi̶r pe Daa ɗi, ɓe abet, mo mang fuwaat ni baa ki̶ ni aku pe ngo ni ɗi.
Daa wuri a Riin, ki̶ peeɗi Riin kì̵ Daa ni ɗi, ɓe gurum mo ɗee a mukáa furu.

Yaksi, mun nyemso ndang Jesu mo jir, ɓe mo kì̵ mang fuwaat ɗi ni paa yit funu mo baa ki̶ ni aku. Yaksi ɓe gurum moo naa a ɗiiɗes kì̵ Daa ndi̶ghi̶n tong funu mo, ki̶ wuri cighi̶r ki̶ mun, ku mu ɗee ɗi kaa wuri si, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiɗes fi̶ri ɗi ni nkaa wurang. Ɗiisi ni put a pe Riin mu Naan ɗi wuri a Daa.
A Naan wuri cín ɗak mu satpo fi̶ri ɗiiret mo mun ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiret mu kussuk fi̶ri. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe taji ni waam wun kas.

Mu kwar c`in ɗak ɗiibish mo, ki̶ mbii naashoop ɗii a si̶sok, ki̶ mbii ɗi moo le naashoop ngurum mo jir. Ba mun nc`in ɗung ngurum mo, koo sat ɗung nkaa po kì̵ Naan kas. Amma mu sat zeen ni agaak, mpeku koo weye, ɓe wuri naa zeen funu ni ɗi, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗyen fi̶ri, nyit kì̵ Naan.
Katɗang ɓe po kì̵ Naan ɗi muu sat ni a ɗiipi̶paa, ɓe ni a pi̶paa a mpee nyem ɗi mo a ar lagham ɓejee ɗak.
Ba mo cínzeen kas, a mpeeɗi mishkagham ɗiibish mu yil ɗiisi wuri kì̵ paa yit furu mo, mpeku taji mo naa peeɓang mu po ɗiiret mu Kristi kas, ɗi wuri a ɗiimi̶ndong kì̵ Naan.
Mpeeɗi ba muu satpo ni ngurum mo a nkaa sun funu kas, amma muu sat a po nkaa Jesu Kristi, ɗi wuri a Daa, ki̶ mun shikáa funu ɓe mu ɗee a ki̶rom fuu mo mpee sum kì̵ Jesu.

Naan wuri kì̵ ten sat nee, peeɓang ni put a ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo, ku ni ɓangpee ɗi. A wuri le ku ni ɓang putughup funu mo, mpeku ni cín peeɓang ɗi mmun, ki̶ mpeku mu man ɗiiɗes kì̵ Naan ɗi, ndi̶ghi̶n yit kì̵ Jesu Kristi.
Mun ki̶ long ɗii mu Riin kì̵ Naan ni, a ndi̶ghi̶n tughulwan. Shii kì̵ mi̶ni, a sun funu mo, mpeku mo kám iiko ɗiiɗes ɗiisi ni ɗi, agaak nee, ni a mu Naan, ki̶ ba ni a munu kas.
Moo ti̶reng mun koo a nkoghop ɗiiɗang ye, jir ki̶si, ɓe ba mo mpyan mun kas. Moo wuk mun, jir ki̶si ɓe ba ki̶i̶rmuut yaa mun kas.
Gurum mo lejeel mmun, jir ki̶si, ɓe pak gurum moo wal mmun. Moo hi̶r mun car nyil, jir ki̶si, ɓe ba mu murap kas.
Koo a pi̶rang ye, ɓe mun a ndi̶ghi̶n jeel mu muut, kaa kiyeet kì̵ muut ɗi gyet Jesu c`in si, mpeku gurum mo naa mi̶se kì̵ Jesu ni ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n sun funu mo.
Kaaɗi mun ɗi mmeen si, ɓe muu tong a tong mu muut mpee Jesu, mpeku mo kám mi̶se kì̵ Jesu ni ɗi, ndi̶ghi̶n sun funu, ɗi mo a mu muut si.
Ɗiisi ni kám nee, muut ni nkaa c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n mun, amma seen ni nkaa c`in ɗak ndi̶ghi̶n wun.
Mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan nee, "Wan cínzeen, a ni le ɗangɓe wan katpo". A mpeeɗi mun mu cínzeen nNaan aasi, a ni le ɗang muu katpo zak.
Mu man nee, ngo ɗi wuri yaghal kì̵ Daa Jesu a peemúut, wurin nyaghal ki̶ mun ashak kì̵ Jesu aasi zak, ki̶ wurin nj`i ki̶ mun ashak ki̶ wun ntoghom fi̶ri zak.
Mbii ɗiisi mo jir a mpee wun, mpeku ɗiiret kì̵ Naan ni wul ɗi mɓut ngurum mo ɗes, ki̶ mpeku gurum mo ɗes mo pi̶lang Naan ɗi mpee ɗiiɗes fi̶ri.
Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe ba ni waam mmun kas. Koo ɗi mun ki̶ sun ɗi ni a mu gurum, ɗi nii wam, amma jir ki̶si, ɓe koo puus ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe moo le riin funu mo ɗee a ɗiipoo.
Mpeeɗi rep jeel ɗi muu shwaa ni a mpee rep pee lee ɗak, nin nki̶lak ki̶ ɗel so, ki̶ nin nj`i ki̶ ɗiiɗes ɗi ni so ngaa-ngaa, ɗi ni met mu sat, ni met jir.

Ba muu leyit funu mo nkaa mbii ɗi gurum moo naa ni yaksi kas, amma muu leyit funu mo a nkaa mbii ɗi ba mu mak naa ni yaksi si kas. Mpeeɗi mbii ɗi gurum mo mak naa mo shi yit yaksi, ɓe a mo a mbii ɗi mon nki̶lak ki̶ ɗel so. Amma mbii ɗi ba gurum mo mak naa mo yaksi shi yit kas, a mo a mbii ɗi moo tong ɗi har ngaa-ngaa.

Yaksi ɓe mu man nee, katɗang ɓe sun funu ɗi mun ki̶ mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, mo wam, ɓe Naan wuri kì̵ ɗak mee sun funu ɗi mon ntong ɗi har ngaa-ngaa ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan. A Naan wuri ɗak sun mi̶ni mo shikáa fi̶ri.
Ndi̶ghi̶n sun funu, ɓe muu gwaar gwan, ki̶ muu kyaghar, mpeku Naan cín sun funu ɗi mo a mu ɗengnaan si ɗi mmun.
Mpeeɗi katɗang Naan cín sun funu mi̶ni mo mmun, ɓe ba mo mmak kat mun ngum kas.

Kaaɗi mu kuɗi muu tong ndi̶ghi̶n sun funu ɗi ni a mu yil ni, ɓe muu gwaar gwan mpee jeel ɗi muu shwaa. Ba a mpeeɗi ne, muu riɓet a ɓàkshak ki̶ sun funu ɗi mo a mu yil ɗiisi kas. Amma muu riɓet ku Naan cín sun funu ɗi mo a mu ɗengnaan si mmun. Ɓe sun funu ɗi mo ki̶ seen si, mon nɗee ɗi a koppee kì̵ sun funu ɗi mo a mu muut yaksi.
A Naan wuri ɗak mun, mpee cighi̶r ɗiisi mo, ki̶ wuri kì̵ ten cín Riin fi̶ri mmun, ɗi ni ɗee a alama mu mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ ɗak mo le mpee mun.
Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe koo a pi̶rang ye, ɓe mun ki̶ cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu, ki̶ mu man zak nee, kaaɗi mu kuɗi ndi̶ghi̶n sun funu ɗii mu yil ɗiisi, ɓe ba mun ashak ki̶ Daa kas. Mu jong ki̶ wuri.
Muu tong ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi ni a shi cínzeen, ba a shi mbii ɗi muu naa mo shi yit kas.
Azeen-nzeen mun ki̶ cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu, ki̶ ɗyen mmun mɓàkshak ki̶ sun ɗiisi ni mo, mpeku mu tong ɗi ashak ki̶ Daa ntulu.
Mpeemi̶ni ɓe koo ɗi mun ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, ki̶ koo a ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗi nin ndung j`i, ɓe ɗyen mmun ku mu cín a mbii ɗi mo ret nNaan nyit.

Mpeeɗi ting, mun jir, mun nɗar ntoghom kì̵ mbiitong mu tokɗiyeel kì̵ Kristi, mpeku koo weye ɓe wurin nlap kwat mu ɗak ɗi wuri kì̵ cín mo, ɓe wuri kuɗi ndi̶ghi̶n shin mu yil ɗiisi. Kyet kwat ni a ɗiiret aa? Aa koo a ɗiibish ye?

A mpeeɗi mu manshii mu ki̶i̶r Daa, a ni le ɗang muu gung mpee dul gurum mo j`i pe Kristi ɗi. Ndi̶ghi̶n tong funu, ɓe Naan wuri man riret hakyeng, ki̶ muu canciin nee, wun wu man mun aasi zak, ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo.

Ba muu gung a mpeku mu waa mu baa mu sat mee ɗiiret ɗi nkaa sun funu mo pe wun ɗi kas. Amma muu kám a ar nwun, mpeku wu c`in retnyit ɗi shi mun, ki̶ mpeku wu katpee lappo ɗi nyem ɗi moo canjagham a shi ɗiiɗes furu mo. Ba a shi mi̶se furu mo kas si.
Mpeeɗi koo ɗi ba mun ɗi mɓut mi̶se funu mo kas, ɓe mi̶ni a mpee Naan, ki̶ katɗang mun ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n mi̶se funu mo, ɓe mi̶ni a mpee wun.
Yaksi, ɓe wal kì̵ Kristi nii se mulki ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo mpee wun, ki̶ mu man azeen nee, mee ngo mi̶ndong wuri kì̵ muut mpee gurum mo jir. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe gurum mo jir mo kyam muut zak.

Wuri muut a mpee gurum mo jir, mpeku nyem ɗi mo kì̵ lap seen fi̶ri, ɓe taji mo waa baa tong ɗi a mukáa furu zak kas. Amma see mo tong amu ngo ɗi wuri kì̵ muut mpee mo, ki̶ wuri waa baa yaghal a peemúut mpee mo zak.

Mpeemi̶ni, yaksi, ɓe ba mu kuɗi muu naa tong kì̵ gurum a shi yit ɗi mu yil ɗiisi kas. Jí muu naa Kristi a shi shin ɗi mu yil ɗiisi, amma yaksi, ɓe ba mu kuɗi muu naa wuri a shi shin ɗii mu yil si kas.
Koo ngo ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wuri tong ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi, ɓe ngo mi̶ni kì̵ ɗee a ɗiipoo. Mpeeɗi mi̶se fi̶ri ɗiisi̶ghi̶r mo kì̵ ɗel so jee, ki̶ koo meye ni kì̵ ɗee a ɗiipoo zak.

Mbii ɗiisi mo jir, a c`in kì̵ Naan, ɗi wuri cighi̶r ki̶ mun shaarlek fi̶ri mo, mpeku mu ɗee ɗi a shaar fi̶ri mo shi Kristi. Wuri cín ɗak ɗiisi mmun, mpeku mu cighi̶r ki̶ gurum mo, ɗi mo a shaarlek fi̶ri mo, mpeku mo ɗee ɗi a shaar fi̶ri mo zak.

A po ɗi mun nkaa sat ni ɗiisi nee, Naan wuri nkaa le gurum ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni, ku mo ɗee a shaar fi̶ri. Ba Naan wuri tang shikbish kì̵ gurum ni mo nkaa mo kas, ki̶ wuri kì̵ lepo mu cighi̶r ki̶ gurum ɗi mo a shaarlek fi̶ri mo, ku mo ɗee a shaar fi̶ri mo nsar funu zak.
Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe yaksi mun a jeplop mu Kristi mo, ɗi Naan wurii pi̶rep gurum mo a shi mun. Mu ɗang pu wun a koppee kì̵ Kristi, wu yit ku Naan wuri cighi̶r ki̶ wun, ku wu ɗee ɗi a shaar fi̶ri mo.
Wuri ɗi ba wuri man c`in mee shikbish kas, ɓe Naan le wuri mang shikbish funu mo, mpeku ndi̶ghi̶n wuri ɓe mu ɗee ɗi a nyem ɗin ndi̶re mo, nyit kì̵ Naan.
Kaaɗi mun muu c`in ɗak ashak ki̶ Naan zak, ɓe mu ɗang pe wun, mpeku taji wu lap ɗiiret kì̵ Naan wu le ni a mbii ɗiibuu kas.

Wu ki̶ling mbii ɗi Naan wurii kì̵ sat nee: "Kaaɗi pee mu c`in ɗiiret ni wul, ɓe wan nc`in ɗiiret nwugha. Kaaɗi puus ɓam ni j`i wul, ɓe wan mɓam wugha zak." Azeen-nzeen wan sat nwun nee, cicinsi ni a pee mu lap ɗiiret mu Naan! Ki̶ zak, cicinsi ni a puus mu kat ɓam pe Naan ɗi.
Ba mu le mee mbii canshii mmee gurum kas, mpeku taji mo ɓees ɗak funu ni kas.

Amma koo a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe muu kám ngurum mo azeen-nzeen nee. Mun a ki̶rom mu Naan mo, ki̶ muu kám nee, mun a ki̶rom kì̵ Naan mo shi gung ki̶ shwaajeel ɗes, ki̶ mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n mbii lejeel mo.
Muu shwaanas, ki̶ mo naa mɓwaghat mun, ki̶ muu tong mɓut nyemyaghal ki̶ ɓi̶lep mo, ki̶ ɗak mo ɗes, ki̶ tong shi gongpee, ki̶ tong ki̶ neen, ki̶ ciin saam zak.
Muu kám zeen funu shi mi̶se ɗiiret ki̶ man, ki̶ gung shi mi̶se ɗii mu naajeel ndi̶ghi̶n Riin Ɗiiɓang, ki̶ shi wal ɗiiɗes zak,
ki̶ shi po ɗi mo azeen-nzeen, ki̶ shiɓal kì̵ Naan. Mun ki̶ zeen ni, kaa leelek ɗin ndi̶re mo si, nsarse ki̶ nsarkul funu mo.
Gurum mo le mun a ɗiiɗes, amma pak moo waa lejeel mmun zak. Pak gurum moo kwoop mun, amma pak moo waa ɓees mun zak. Moo le mun a kaa nyemɗung mo si, amma mun a nyemsat zeen mo.
Gurum mo le mun a kaa ba mo man mun kas si, amma mun a ɗii mi̶man pe mmo. Mu ɗee kaa muu mumurap si, amma mun ɗiki̶ seen. Mo ni̶ram mun, jir ki̶si, ɓe ba mo twa mun kas.

Mu ɗee kaa mun aa putughup ɗiiwuwat si, amma ɓe mun a mɓut nretnyit shidaar-shidaar. Mu ɗee kaa nyemjeel mo si, amma jir ki̶si, ɓe muu le ku gurum mo ɗes mo kat long. Mu ɗee kaa ba mun ki̶ mee mbii kas si, amma jir ki̶si, ɓe koo mbii ɗiiɗang ye ɓe ni a munu.
Wun nyem Koronti mo, wu man nee, ba mu sok mee mbii nwun kas. Gyet muu satpo nwun agaak mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu jir.
Ba gyet mu nook sat nwun mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu kas. Gyet a wun wu nook sat mmun mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo.
Wan ɗang pu wun kaa jep fi̶na mo si, mpeku wu woo mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo mmun.
Taji wu ɓàlsuk ashak ki̶ nyem ɗi ba mo cínzeen nNaan kas. Mpeeɗi a me ɓàl ɗak ɗiiret ki̶ ɗak ɗiibish ye? Ki̶ a me ɓàl peeɓang ki̶ peenkoo ye?
Ba mee shaar ashak ɗi nnaar kì̵ Kristi ki̶ Shetan kas. A me ɓàl ngucínzeen, ki̶ ngo ɗi ba wuri cínzeen kas ye?

A me ɓàl Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes ki̶ lu k`um ye? Putughup funu mo a peeɗi Naan wurii tong ɗi, kaaɗi wuri kì̵ ten sat si nee: "Wan ntong ashak ki̶ mo, ki̶ wan mmwaan nnaar furu zak. Wan nɗee a Naan furu, ki̶ mon nɗee a nyem fi̶na mo zak.
Mpeemi̶ni ɓe wu pwat aku, mɓut nyem ɗi ba mo cínzeen kas, ki̶ wu ɓàkshak ki̶ mo zak, Daa Naan wuri sat aasi. Taji wu tung mee mbii ɗi ni a ɗiirap kas, ɗangɓe wan nlap wun.
Wan nɗee a puun fuu, ki̶ wun nɗee a jep fi̶na ɗiimish mo, ki̶ ɗiimat mo. A Daa ɗiiɓal met jir, wuri satpo mi̶ni."

Shaar fi̶na mo ɗi wan wal nwun, kaaɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten tuwoorpo mbii ɗiisi mo mmun aasi, ɓe ni ret ku mu lesun funu mo ɗee a ɗiiɓang, ndi̶ghi̶n koo a mbii ɗiibish ɗiiɗang ye, ɗi nii wat nan funu mo, ki̶ riin funu mo zak. Ni ret ku mu ɗee a nyem ɗiiɓang mo riret ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan funu mo, mpee cín ɗiiɗes nNaan.
Wu wang putughup fuu mo mmun, mpeeɗi ba jí mu c`in mee mbii ɗiibish mmee gurum kas, ki̶ ba mu wat mee gurum kas zak. Ba jí mu seen a mee gurum kas.

Ba wan sat ɗiisi ni a mpeku wan le wun ɗi a nyemshikbish mo kas, amma wan satpo ɗiisi ni a mpeeɗi jí wan ki̶n ten sat nwun nee, mu wal nwun zam. Ki̶ koo ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n muut, ki̶ koo ɗi mun ɗi ki̶ seen, ɓe mun ɗi ashak vit ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo.
Wan cínzeen nwun azeen-nzeen, ki̶ wan ki̶n c`in roghop ɗes a shi wun zak. Har wu fes wu caa putughup fi̶na ni riret hakyeng. Jir ki̶ jeel ɗi muu shwaa ni, ɓe wan nkaa c`in retnyit ɗes zam.

Kaaɗi gyet mu so mu wul nyil mMasidoniya si, ɓe ba gyet mu kat mee pee ɓwot sun kas. Gurum mo cín jeel mmun ɗes, koo a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɗang ye. Gurum mo ɓi̶lep ki̶ mun, ki̶ gyet ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo, ɓe ki̶i̶rmuut ni ɗi zak.
Amma Naan wurii cínɓal ki̶ wurii caa putughup mu nyem ɗi ba moo ɓal mputughup kas. Gyet wuri c`in ɓal putughup funu mo shi j`i kì̵ Titus.

Ba a j`i kì̵ Titus ni ɓejee ɗak kas, amma ashak ki̶ ɗi gyet wu c`in caa putughup fi̶ri, har wuri sat mmun nee, wu kyaghar mpee naa wan, ki̶ wuu naajeel fi̶na, ki̶ ne, wun mɓwoon fi̶na zak. Po ɗiisi ni mo si̶ghi̶t le retnyit nwan ɗes hakyeng.

Koo ɗi gyet wan wat putughup nwun shi wasika ɗi wan ran nwun si, ɓe ba gyet ni daampee nwan, mpeeɗi wan ran wasika ni nwun kas. Gyet yam ɓe ni wat putughup nwan, mpeeɗi gyet wan naa nee, wasika nin wat putughup fuu mo zam. Koo ɗi gyet ni wat putughup nwan a mpee rep pee lee ɗak.

Amma yaksi wan kat retnyit. Ba ne mpeeɗi wasika ni le putughup fuu mo wat kas, amma a mpeku wu tuwap ɗi, mpee mbii ɗi mo le ku putughup fuu mo wat. Daa Naan wurii riɓet a kiyeet kì̵ wat kì̵ putughup mi̶ni, mpeeɗi nin nle ku wu tuwap. Mpeemi̶ni ɓe ba mu c`in a mee mbii ɗiibish nwun kas.

Mpeeɗi kiyeet kì̵ putughup ɗiiwuwat ɗi a Naan le, nii j`i ki̶ tuwap, ki̶ nii j`i ki̶ kat ɓam zak. Ba nii le ku gurum mak sat nee, "katɗang ɗin man oo!" kas. Amma putughup ɗiiwuwat mu yil ɗiisi, mi̶nii ki̶ j`i aa muut.

Wu naa, mbii ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ c`in ki̶ putughup ɗiiwuwat ni, ni le ku wu ɗak mi̶se fuu mo azeen-nzeen. Ki̶ ni le ku wuu riɓet kám agaak nee, ba gyet wu man mee mbii ɗiibish kas, har ni kì̵ le ku wu kat canciin. Nii le ku wu kat ɓal, ki̶ nii le ku wu kat gung ndi̶ghi̶n kar fuu zak. Mɓut mbii ɗiisi mo, ɓe koo a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe nii kám azeen-nzeen nee, wuu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiret.

Koo ɗi gyet wan ki̶ ran wasika nwun, ɓe ba ni a mpee mee ngo ɗi wuri kì̵ c`in shikbish kas. Ki̶ ba ni a nkaa mee ngo ɗi mo c`in ɗiibish nwuri kas. Amma wan ran wasika ni, a mpeku ni kám ɗi nwun agaak ntoghom kì̵ Naan, wal fuu mpee mun.

A mpee mbii ɗiisi mo, ɗangɓe gyet putughup funu mo kat ɓal. Ba gyet ni ɓal a kwak funu mo ɓejee ɗak kas, amma mu kat retnyit ɗiki̶ ɗes, mpee retnyit kì̵ Titus, mpeeɗi gyet wun jir wuu kaat wuri shi retnyit.
Gyet wan ki̶n ten canjagham fuu nwuri, ɓe ba gyet mee naashoop yaa wan mpeemi̶ni kas. Mbii ɗi mu sat mo nwun si, mo azeen-nzeen. Canjagham funu ɗi mu sat nTitus nkaa wun, ni azeen aasi zak.

Wuri le putughup fi̶ri nkaa wun jir met ɗiiyam hakyeng. Kaaɗi gyet wuri pan nee, wun jir, wun a nyem ɗi wu lappo ɗi wuri sat mo nwun. Ki̶ wun kì̵ kaat wuri shi retnyit, ki̶ gyet wu c`in mbii ɗiiret wuri zak.
Wan kat retnyit mpeeɗi wan ki̶k nkaa wun riret hakyeng.
Ɗyemnaa mo, muu riɓet ku wu man po nkaa ɗiiret ɗi Naan wuri cín ni Eki̶lisya ɗi mon nyil mMasidoniya.

Koo ɗi jí mo kì̵ kyam mo shi jeel ɗiinaat, ki̶ mo nkaa shwaajeel mu mbii mo zak, ɓe jir ki̶si, retnyit furu ni ɗes. Ɓe ni le ku mo c`in mbii ɗiiret mpeeɗi mo cín mbii furu mo shi zughum, koo ɗi ba mo ki̶ mee mbii ɗes kas.
Wan man azeen nee, mbii ɗi mo cín ni a ntiit ki̶ ɓal furu, har ni met ɓal furu, mpeeɗi mo cín ni a shi riɓet kì̵ putughup furu mo.
Moo ɗang pu mun ɗes hakyeng nee, mu cín pee nɗun ki̶ mu leɗun mɓut nyem ɗi moo c`in ɓam mpee nyem Jesu mo si.
Har mo cín mbii mo ɗes met mbii ɗi muu lepan. Amma mo shee cín a putughup furu mon nDaa, ki̶ mun zak, ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi Naan ki̶ riɓet ku mo c`in.
Kaaɗi mu naa ni ret, ɓe mu lop Titus so pe wun ɗi, mpeeɗi jí a wuri shee c`in ɗak ɗiiret ɗiisi ni ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɓe ni ret ku a wurin nsi̶ghi̶t sekiyeen ki̶ ɗak ni.

Wun kì̵ sekiyeen ndi̶ghi̶n koo a mbii ɗiiɗang ye, har ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen, ki̶ katpo, ki̶ man, ki̶ gung mbii mo ɗes, ki̶ wal ɗi wun ki̶ ni mpee mun. Ni ret ku wu sekiyeen ki̶ c`in ɗak ɗiiret mu cín zughum shi putughup mi̶ndong.
Ba wan ki̶n le a mee waar pe wun ɗi kas, amma ni a mpee kám gung ɗi nwun, mpeku wan man ɗi azeen nee, wal ɗi wun ki̶ ni, mpee ɓam niyee mo, ni azeen.
Mpeeɗi wun kì̵ man ɗiiret mu Daa funu Jesu Kristi, koo ɗi gyet wuri a ngulong, jir ki̶si, ɓe wuri lekáa fi̶ri ɗee kaa ngujeel si mpee wun. Mpeku ndi̶ghi̶n jeel fi̶ri ni, ɓe wu ɗee ɗi a nyemlong mo.
A pan mi̶na nkaa mbii ni nɗiisi, nin nret ku yaksi ɓe wu si̶ghi̶t kaghar mbii ɗi gyet wuu yaa c`in ni doghontagham si. Gyet a wun shee cín mbii, ki̶ wun kì̵ putughup mu cín mbii hakyeng.
Ni ret ku wu kyes kaghar ɗak ni shi riɓet kì̵ putughup fuu mo, ntiit ki̶ ɓal fuu, kaaɗi gyet wu shee c`in ni si.
Katɗang ɓe mee gurum ki̶ putughup ɗii mu cín mbiizughum, ɓe Naan nlap mbiizughum kì̵ ngo ni ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi ngo ni cín nNaan. Ba Naan wurin ntang a mbii ɗi ngo ni nɗin nni kas.
Ba wan satpo mi̶ni a mpeku pak gurum mo nook cín mbiizughum, mpeku ni toghon ɗi wuwun kas.

Amma a mpeku mo le mbii mo ɗee ɗin ndi̶re, ɓe wu ɓam mo yaksi, shi mbii ki̶kat fuu mo, mpeeɗi ba mo ki̶ mee mbii kas. Mpeku katɗang parpuus ɗi wu táa njeel, ɓe mo ɓam wun ɗi zak. Ɗiisi ni a mpeku mo ɓàk mbii mo ɗi ntiit-ntiit.
Kaaɗi mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si nee: "Ngo ɗi wuri kyak ɗes, ɓe ba nin ngyar ɗes a wuri kas, ki̶ ngo ɗi wuri kyak lee, ɓe ba nin ngyar kat wuri kas."
Wan pi̶lang Naan, ɗi wuri lepan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup kì̵ Titus, mpeku wuri ɓam wun ɗi, kaaɗi wan ki̶n c`in wun si.
Ba wuri lap ii a mpee ɗang funu ɓejee ɗak kas, amma wuri kì̵ fes lepan fi̶ri, mpeku wuri so pe wun shi pan mukáa fi̶ri.
Muu lop wuri so pe wun ɗi ashak ki̶ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗi gurum moo fes cín ɗiiɗes nwuri, mpee satpo kì̵ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n Eki̶lisya mo jir.

Ba a mi̶ni ɓejee ɗak kas, amma Eki̶lisya mo bi̶lip wuri, mpeku wuri so ɗi ashak ki̶ mun, mpee so ki̶ mbiizughum ɗi muu cín ni, mpee le Daa a ɗiiɗes, ki̶ kám agaak nee, mun ki̶ putughup ɗi ni a mu ɓam zak.
Ba muu riɓet ku mee gurum kàss mun nkaa mbiizughum ɗiisi, ɗi gurum moo cín ni shi putughup mi̶ndong, ɗi mun nkaa c`in ni si kas.
Mbii ɗi muu riɓet nɗiisi, ku wu c`in mbii mo ɗi ndi̶re-ndi̶re, ba a ntoghom kì̵ Daa ɓejee ɗak kas, har ki̶ ntoghom kì̵ gurum mo jir zak.

Muu lop ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ashak ki̶ mo zak. Mun kì̵ kyam ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu wuri yit mo ɗes, ɓe mu kat wuri a nguɗak zam ndi̶ghi̶n ar mo shini-shini. Yaksi ɓe wurii c`in ɗak ni waa met ɗiiyam zak. Wuri kì̵ c`in ɗak ɗiiret ni ɗes mpee ɓam wun.
Titus wuri a shaarmwaan fi̶na, ɗi wuri c`in ɗak ashak ki̶ wan mpee ɓam wun zak. Mpee ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗiisi mo, ɓe mo a nyem ɗi Eki̶lisya mo lop mo, mpeku mo lesum kì̵ Kristi ɗi a ɗiiɗes.
Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wu kám wal fuu mmo, mpeku Eki̶lisya ni mo man ɗi azeen-nzeen nee, jagham ɗi muu can ni mpee wun, ni a ndi̶re azeen-nzeen.
Po nkaa cín ɓam mpee nyemso ndang Jesu mo, ɓe ba ni a ting ku wan ran mee po nwun nkaa ni kas.

Mpeeɗi wan man sekiyeen fuu, har wan ki̶ canjagham shi wun ntoghom ki̶ nyem Masidoniya mo. Wan sat mmo nee, gyet doghontagham ɓe Eki̶lisya ɗin Akaya wura kì̵ ten ɗak sat mpee cín ɓam. Riɓet fuu mpee cín mbiizughum ɗi wu cín ni ɓalkwak ngurum mo ɗes ndi̶ghi̶n mo zam.

Amma wan lop ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗiisi mo so pe wun ɗi, mpeku taji canjagham ɗi mu sat shi wun, nkaa mbii ɗiisi ni ɗee a mbii ɗiibuu kas, amma mpeku wu tong ɗi shi ɗak suk, ki̶ mbiizughum ni, kaaɗi gyet wan ki̶n sat nwun nee, wu tong shi ɗak suk si.
Mpeeɗi katɗang pak nyem Masidoniya ni mo yaghal j`i ashak ki̶ wan, ɗangɓe mo j`i kat ba wuu ɗak suk kas, ɓe naashoop nyaa mun, ki̶ nin nsi̶ghi̶t yaa wun met nwan zak, mpeeɗi muu cínzeen nwun.

Ni aasi ɓe wan naa nee, ni ret ku wan ɗang ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗiisi mo, mpeku mo shee so pe wun ɗi nwan nti̶leng, mpeku mo kyak mbiizughum ɗi gyet wuu tuwoor ne, wun ncín niɗi. Katbaa wan ki̶n so wul pe wun ɗi, ɓe mo kì̵ ten kyak mbiizughum ni mo. Ɓe ni kám nee, wu cín mbiizughum ni a shi riɓet ki̶ putughup fuu mo, ba a mee gurum leting nwun kas.
Taji wu mander kas nee, ngo ɗi wuri kop cirem ɗiɓen lee ndi̶ghi̶n maar fi̶ri, ɓe wurin nɗiip ɗiɓen ni a lee ɗak. Ngo ɗi wuri kop cirem ɗiɓen ɗes, ɓe wurin nɗiip ɗiɓen ni ɗes aasi zak.

Koo weye ɓe wuri cín mbii ɗi wuri ki̶ pan mputughup mpee cín ni, ba a shi putughup vul-vul kas, ki̶ ba a gurum mo le ting nwuri kas. Mpeeɗi Naan wurii riɓet a ngo ɗi wurii cín mbiizughum, a shi retnyit ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri.

Naan wuri ki̶ iiko ɗi wurin ncín mbii mo nwun ɗes met mbii ɗi wuu riɓet mo. Mpeku koo a pi̶rang ye, ɓe wu kat mbii ɗi wuu riɓet mo, ɗi mpee suk fuu mo, ki̶ mpeku wu katpee cín mbiizughum ɗi shi putughup mi̶ndong mpee ɗak ɗiiret mo jir.
Kaaɗi mo ki̶ ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si nee: "Wurii cín mbii nyemjeel mo shi zughum ɗes, ki̶ shi putughup mi̶ndong. Ɗiiret fi̶ri nin ntong ɗi har ngaa-ngaa."
A Naan wurii cín cirem ngumaar, ki̶ a wurii cín mbiise mu se zak. A wurin ncín cirem nwun wu kop, ki̶ a wurin nle ku ni kàa wurang. Wurin nle ɗiiret nkaa ɗak fuu ɗin ndi̶re, ku ni ɗes ɗi hakyeng.
Wurin nle ku wu ɗee a nyemlong mo koo a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɗang ye, mpeku wu naa ncín mbiizughum ɗi shi putughup mi̶ndong. Mbiizughum ɗi wun ncín ni, nin nɗee ngurum mo a mbii pi̶lang pe Naan.
Mpeeɗi ɗak fuu ɗiiret ɗiisi ni, ba ni ɓam a nyem kì̵ Naan mo ɓejee ɗak kas, amma ni waa si̶ghi̶t le ku gurum mo pi̶lang Naan ɗes zam.

Ɗak fuu ɗiiret ɗiisi ni kám nee, cínzeen fuu ni ɗar ɓal-ɓal hakyeng. Nin nle ku gurum mo le Naan a ɗiiɗes, mpee mbiizughum ɗi wu cín mo ashak ki̶ kaghar gurum ni mo shi putughup mi̶ndong. Ɓe ni kám agaak nee, wuu lappo ɗiiret mu Kristi ni azeen-nzeen.
A mpee wal ɗi gurum mo ki̶ ni mpee wun, ɓe mon nc`in aduwa mpee wun, mpeeɗi mo man nee, Naan wuri ki̶ cín ɗiiret nwun ɗes zam.
Wu yit ku mu pi̶lang Naan mpee zughum ɗi wuri cín mmun. Zughum ɗi ni met mɓal mu sat.

Wan Pool shikáa fi̶na, wan ɗang pu wun, mpee mi̶se mu puɗok ki̶ ɗiiret mu Kristi. Wan ɗi moo sat ne, wan a nguɗokpo titik, katɗang wan ashak ki̶ wun, amma ne wan ki̶n sat mbii mo nwun agaak, katɗang ba wan ashak ki̶ wun kas.

Wan ɗang pu wun, mpeku taji wu leting nwan satpo nwun shiɓal kas, katɗang wan j`i pe wun ɗi. Mpeeɗi wan man azeen nee, wan mak satpo shiɓal nyem ɗi moo sat ne, mbii ɗi muu c`in si ɓe ni a ɗak mu yil ɗiisi.
Koo ɗi muu tong a ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni, ɓe mbii ɗi mun nkaa c`in lek mpee ni, ba ni a mu yil ɗiisi kas.
Leelek ɗi muu c`in lek ɗishik, ba ni a mu yil ɗiisi kas. Amma leelek funu ni a iiko mu Naan, ɗi nin mmak shirip fwang ɗiiɓal mo.

Muu shirip po ki̶ nyem ɗi moo j`i ki̶ mbii langkáa nkaa man kì̵ Naan, ki̶ zak, muu shirip koo a fwang mu roghop ɗiiɗang ye ɗi nii daam man Naan ngurum mo. Ki̶ muu le ku koo a pan kì̵ weye, ɓe ni c`in ɗyen kì̵ Kristi ɗi zak.
Aɓwoon ɗi wun nkám agaak azeen-nzeen nee, wuu ki̶lingpo funu, ɓe mun ɗak sun funu riret mpee kar nyemcíi ki̶lingpee mo.
A me le ɗang wuu leyit fuu mo nkaa mbii ɗi mo a ɓwoon ye? Katɗang mee gurum ki̶ leshin ne, wuɗi a mu Kristi, ɓe ni ret ku wuri pan riret, ki̶ wuri man ne mun a mu Kristi zak.
Mpeeɗi koo ɗi wan canjagham ɗes shi iiko ɗi Daa wuri cín mmun, ɓe ni a mpeku mu ɗak wun ɗi, ba a mpeku mu shirip wun ɗi kas. Ba mee naashoop yaa wan kas.
Taji wu pan nee, wan ki̶n gung a mpeku wan leki̶i̶rmuut ɗi nwun shi wasika fi̶na ni mo kas.

Mpeeɗi pak gurum moo sat nee, mbii ɗi wurii ran ndi̶ghi̶n wasika fi̶ri ni mo toghon, ki̶ mo ɓal zam, amma katɗang gurum naa wurin nyit, ɓe ba shin fi̶ri ni ki̶ mee ɓal kas. Po ɗi wurii sat ni, ɓe ba nii koghop ni kas.
Ni ret ku nyemsatpo mi̶ni mo man nee, mbii ɗi muu sat ndi̶ghi̶n wasika, ɓe ba ni ɗik ki̶ mbii ɗi muu sat nwun nyit ki̶ yit kas, katɗang mu kaat ashak ki̶ wun.
Ba mu mak lekáa funu, koo mu kámkáa funu mo ntiit ki̶ nyem ɗi moo canjagham a shi sut furu mo kas. Mpeeɗi moo kám sut furu mo ki̶ shak, ki̶ moo kyamsut furu ki̶ shak zak. Nyem mi̶ni mo a mwen mo.
Ba mun ncanjagham ɗel peeɗi ni ret ku mu ɗar ɗi kas. Amma mu ɗar a nkaa pee ɗak ɗi Naan wuri ki̶ can ni mmun, ɗiisi ni ɓàl ki̶ ɗak funu ndi̶ghi̶n wun.
Wun a ndi̶ghi̶n pee ɗak ɗi Naan wuri ki̶ can mun, aasi ɓe ba jí mu canjagham mpee ɗak funu ɗik kas, kaaɗi gyet mu so ki̶ po mu Kristi ni nwun si.
Ba canjagham funu ni ɗel met mbii ɗi ni ret kas, ki̶ ba ni tuwaas ɗak ki̶ mee gurum mo kas. Amma mu canciin nee, a cínzeen fuu ni ɓul hakyeng, ɓe ɗak funu ndi̶ghi̶n wun, nin mɓul ɗes hakyeng zak.
Mpeku mu katpee satpo kì̵ Naan ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗi mo a kiyeen fuu. Ba mu canjagham a shi peeɗi mee gurum ki̶ kyam c`in ɗak ɗi kas.
Amma kaaɗi mo kì̵ ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si nee, "Jir ngo ɗi wuri canjagham, ɓe ni ret ku wuri canjagham ni a shi mbii ɗi Daa wuri ki̶ c`in."
Mpeeɗi ba Naan wuri riɓet ngo ɗi wurii kwoop a shin kas, amma see a ngo ɗi Daa wurii kwoop ɓejee.
Wan canciin nee, wun gung ki̶ wan mpee rep mwen fi̶na si. Kussuk wu gung ki̶ wan!
Wan ki̶n c`in zughur nkaa wun mpee Naan. Wun a kaa reep ɗi ba wura ki̶ man mish kas. Wan ki̶n tuwoorpo mpee cín wun nɗik, kaa matpoo si pe mish fi̶ra ɗi, a Kristi wuri a mish fuu ni.
Amma wan ki̶n ki̶i̶r, taji ni yaghal ɗee a kaa gyet nw`oo num Iif shi seen fi̶ri ɗii mu ɗung si kas. Taji mo yaghal num wun, ki̶ mo mer ki̶ pan fuu mo nkaa wal ɗiiret, ɗi wun ki̶ ni mpee Kristi kas.

A me le ɗang katɗang mee gurum j`i satpo nkaa mee Jesu ɗi ɗik ki̶ po ɗi mun mu sat ni nwun ɓe wuu ki̶ling po mi̶ni ye? Wu pan nee riin mi̶ni ɗik ki̶ Riin kì̵ Naan ɗi wuu kat ni me? Ki̶ wu pan nee, mee po kì̵ Naan ni ɗi ɗik waa met po Naan ɗi wuu lap ni me?
Wan man azeen nee, ba wan a ɗiikat met jir ndi̶ghi̶n jeplop ni mo kas.
Meeɓe, ba wan man satpo riret kas, amma ɓe wan man satpo ɗiiret ni. Muu kám man ni nwun agaak koo a pi̶rang ye mɓut mbii mo jir.
Ashee, gyet wan c`in a mbii ɗiibish, mpeeɗi gyet wan sham ki̶ káa fi̶na, mpeku Naan wuri ɗiyeep wun ɗi kaaɗi wan satpo kì̵ Naan ni nwun shi zughum si wa?
Wan lap ɓam pu pak Eki̶lisya mo, mpeku wan c`in ɗak ɗi nnaar fuu. Wan mak sat nee, gyet wan hi̶r a long furu mo, mpeku wan ɓam wun ɗi.

Kaaɗi gyet wan ɗi ashak ki̶ wun, ɓe ba gyet wan ki̶ mee mbii kas, ki̶ zak, ba gyet wan lejeel mmee gurum kas. Mpeeɗi ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu ɗi mo tong mMasidoniya j`i ɗi, a mo j`i cín wan mbii ɗi wan ki̶n riɓet mo. A mpeemi̶ni, ɗangɓe koo a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiɗang ye, ɓe ba wan le mee jeel wun kas. Kaaɗi ba gyet wan lejeel wun kas si.
Mpeeɗi wan man nee, po ɗi wan ki̶n sat ni a po mu Kristi azeen, ɓe ba mee ngo mak cíi canjagham nwan ndi̶ghi̶n yil Akaya kas.
A me le ɗang wan sat ki̶si ye? A mpeeɗi ba wan wal nwun kas aa? Naan wuri man nee, wan wal nwun zam.
Ɗak ɗi wan nkaa c`in ni, ɓe wan sat a nc`in a ni, mpeku wan shaghatpo mu canjagham ɗi jeplop ɗi moo sat ne, ɗak furu ni a ntiit ki̶ munu.
Kiyeet ki̶ nyem mi̶ni mo a jeplop mu ɗung mo. Moo c`in a ɗak ɗii mu numpee mo. Moo lekáa furu kaa mo a jeplop mu Kristi mo si, amma ba mo a jeplop Kristi kas.
Ba ni ɗee a mbii aapo kas, mpeeɗi koo a Shetan shikáa fi̶ri, ɓe wurii leshin kaa wuri a ngulop mu peeɓang si.
Mpeemi̶ni ɓe ba ni ɗee a mbii aapo kas, katɗang ɓe ki̶rom mu Shetan mo lesut furu, kaa mo a nyem c`in ɗak ɗiiret mo si zak. A peekyes ki̶ ni, ɓe mon nlap kwat furu mo ntiit ki̶ ɗak furu mo zak.
Wan ki̶n baa sat ɗi zak nee, taji mee gurum pan ne, wan a mwen kas. Amma katɗang wu pan ne, wan a mwen, ɓe wu lap wan ɗiisi kaa mwen ni si, mpeku wan kat pee can rep jagham ɗi diɓen.
Po ɗi wan sat si, ɓe ba wan sat a mee po ɗi Daa wuri lop wan kas, amma wan ki̶n satpo ni a kaa mwen si, wan ki̶n satpo mi̶ni a kyap.
Kaaɗi gurum mo ɗes moo can a jagham ɗii mu yil ɗiisi ɓejee ɗak si, ɓe wan canjagham ni aasi zak.
Wun nyem ɗi wu seen ɓe wuu gung ki̶ nyemmwen mo shi retnyit.

Mpeeɗi katɗang, ɓe mee gurum le wun kaa ki̶rom mo si, koo wuri hi̶hi̶r wun, koo wuri se li̶ɓet nkaa wun, ki̶ koo wuri kám a ɓal mu tughur nwun, ki̶ koo wuri ni̶nas wun, jir ki̶si ɓe wuu gung ki̶ ngo mi̶ni.
Ni shoop wan mpee lap ii, ne gyet mun ki̶ ɓal mpee c`in mbii ɗiisi mo kas, amma katɗang mee gurum ki̶ canjagham nkaa mee mbii, ɓe wan ki̶n satpo ni a kaa mwen si. Wan ncanjagham aasi zak.
Katɗang ɓe, mo a nyem Hiburu mo, ɓe wan a ngu Hiburu zak. Katɗang ɓe, mo a nyem Yahudi mo, ɓe wan a ngu Yahudi zak. Katɗang ɓe mo a dang ki̶ Abraham, ɓe wan a dang ki̶ Abraham zak.

Katɗang ɓe mo a ki̶rom mu Kristi mo, ɓe wan a ki̶rom mu Kristi zak. Wan katpo ni a kaa ngutar si! Mpeeɗi wan c`in ɗak ɗi ni ɗes met mumo ni. Mo ki̶ ɓwaghat wan le lushaghat, ki̶ wan shwaanas met mo sat zak. Wan ki̶n shwaajeel mo shini-shini har kus ki̶ muut zak.
Gyet yit paat, ɓe nyem Yahudi mo fwo ngwam nwan laarkun baapofeer.

Nyemnan-nan mu Rom mo si̶ram wan shi kám yitkun. Nyem Yahudi mo car wan shi ndi̶ng yit mi̶ndong, mpeku mo tu wan ɗi. Yitkun ɓe jirgi am, ni taa pyan ki̶ mun. Wan ki̶n kyam teer ki̶ wet nkaa am bahar.

Shidaar-shidaar ɓe wan a ar mwaan mo ɗes, ki̶ wan ki̶n naa muut shi yit fi̶na mɓut ndung mo. Wan ki̶n naa muut nsar kì̵ nyemwat mo, ki̶ wan naa muut nsar kì̵ dang funu mo zak. Wan ki̶ naa muut nsar kì̵ nyemk`um mo. Wan ki̶n naa muut ndi̶ghi̶n birni mo, ki̶ zak, wan ki̶n naa muut a naar yil mo. Wan ki̶ naa muut nkaa am bahar mo. Wan ki̶n naa muut nsar kì̵ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n ɗii mu ɗung mo.
Wan ki̶n shwaaɗak mo, ki̶ wan ki̶n shwaajeel mo, ki̶n nnaa nteer mmeen, ki̶ wan ki̶ shwaaneen zak, ki̶ neen am tu wan zak. Yit mo ɗes ba wan kat mee mbiise kas. Wan ki̶n shwaakut, mpee ciin mbiisup,
ki̶ pak mbii mo ɗes ɗiki̶ zak. Mbii ɗi mo daampee nwan, koo puus ɗiiɗang ye, ni a mpeeɗi wan ki̶n tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya mo jir si zak.
Katɗang ba mee ngo kat ɓal kas, ɓe ni le ku ba wan kat ɓal kas zak. Katɗang mee ngo taa pal ndi̶ghi̶n shikbish, ɓe ni shwal nwan zam.
Katɗang ɓe ni a ting ku wan canjagham, ɓe wan canjagham ni a nkaa mbii ɗi nin nkám agaak ne ba wan ki̶ ɓal kas,
Naan puun kì̵ Daa Jesu ɗi sum fi̶ri ni kat ɗiiret har ngaa-ngaa. Wuri man azeen-nzeen nee, ba wan ki̶n sat a ɗung kas.
Ndi̶ghi̶n yil nDamaskus, ɓe gofna ɗi wurin nder kì̵ mishkagham Aretas wuri shaghatpo fwang ɗin nDamaskus mo, mpeku mo yaa wan ɗi.
Mo le wan sham ndi̶ghi̶n kacik ɗiiɗes mmee fung mu fwang mu birni ni, har wan put kagham nsar fi̶ri.
Wan ncanjagham a ting, koo ɗi ba wan kat mee li̶ɓet ndi̶ghi̶n ni kas. Amma yaksi ɓe wan nsekiyeen ki̶ satpo nkaa sughun mo, ki̶ mbii ɗi Naan wuri woo mo nwan.

Wan man mee gurum ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi ɗi gyet Naan mang wuri kàa ki̶ wuri ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan ɗiikun. Ni wul a ɓit mo kaghapaat baafeer yaksi. Kyet, gyet Naan kàa ki̶ wuri a ndi̶ghi̶n nan mu yil ɗiisi aa? Ɓe ba wan man kas, amma Naan man.

Wan man nee, mo mang gwar ni kàa ki̶ wuri a mparadayis. (Shii kì̵ mi̶ni a peeɗi Naan ɗi). Kyet a shi nan mu yil ɗiisi aa? Koo ba a shi shin mu yil ɗiisi kas aa? Ɓe ba wan man kas, amma Naan wuri man.
Wuri ki̶ling mbii mo, ɗi ba mon mmak sat mo shi po kas, ki̶ mbii ɗi ba gurum mo mak sat shi li̶po kas zak.
Wan ki̶n canjagham a shi gwar ɗiisi. Ba wan ki̶n canjagham a shi káa fi̶na kas. Amma wan ki̶n kám a ciin ɓal fi̶na agaak.

Koo ɗi wan riɓet canjagham ni, ɓe ba wan ɗee a mwen kas, mpeeɗi wan ki̶n sat azeen. Amma ba wan canjagham kas, mpeku taji mee gurum lepan nkaa wan, waa met mbii ɗi wurii naa wan ki̶n c`in mo, ki̶ mbii ɗi wurii ki̶ling pu wan kas.

Mpeku taji wan ɗiyeep káa fi̶na mpee sughun ɗiiɗes ɗiisi ɗi Naan kì̵ kám mo nwan kas. Amma mo le mee hi̶r ndi̶ghi̶n san fi̶na, ɗi ni ɗee a mee shwal pe wan ɗi, ngulop kì̵ Shetan wurii daampee nwan, mpeku taji wan canjagham ki̶ san fi̶na kas.
Wan ki̶n ɗang pu Daa yit mo kun, mpeku wuri shang mbii ɗiisi ni baa ki̶ ni aku.

Amma Daa wuri sat nwan nee, "Ɗiiret fi̶na ni mak wugha. Mpeeɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n ciin ɓal mu gurum, ɗangɓe mon naa gam ki̶ iiko fi̶na." Mpeemi̶ni ɓe wan si̶ghi̶t canjagham ndi̶ghi̶n ciin ɓal fi̶na ni. Mpeku iiko mu Kristi ni tong ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n wan.

Aasi ɓe wan ki̶n kat retnyit ndi̶ghi̶n sum mu Kristi, mpee ciin ɓal fi̶na ni, ki̶ kàss ɗi moo c`in nwan, ki̶ mbii daampee mo, ki̶ jeel mo, ki̶ luk mo shini-shini, mpee Kristi. Mpeeɗi katɗang ba wan ki̶ ɓal kas, ɓe wuri cínɓal nwan.

Wan ki̶n lesan ɗee a kaa mwen si, amma ɓe a wun wu le ku wan ɗee a mwen ni. Gyet ni ret ku a wun, wun nkwoop wan, mpeeɗi ba wan a ɗiikat met jir ndi̶ghi̶n jeplop ni mo kas, koo ɗi ba wan a mee mbii kas.
Naan c`in mbii lukshik ki̶ mbii aapo mo, ki̶ ɗak ɗiinan-nan mo shi wan, kaaɗi wan gung mpee c`in ɗak fi̶na mo shidaar-shidaar. Ɗak mu mbii aapo ɗi mo kám agaak nee, wan a ngulop azeen-nzeen.
