A Silas ɓam wan mpee ran rep wasika ɗiisi ni, nwun. Wan ki̶n naa wuri a kaa ɗyemni̶ghi̶n ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi si, ɗi wurii koghop ni hakyeng, ɗi gurum mak gangkáa nkaa wuri. Wan ki̶n ran po ɗiisi mo nwun, a mpeku wan caa putughup fuu mo ɗi. Wan a nkaa sat zeen ni nwun agaak nee, Naan wuri le ɗiiret nkaa wun.
Eki̶lisya ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n pee ɗiisi nyil mBabilon, ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten bi̶lip ni, kaaɗi wuri bi̶lip wun si, moo tok ki̶ wun jir. Làa fi̶na Maak wuri tok ki̶ wun zak.

Wun zak, wu tok ki̶ shak ndi̶ghi̶n wal, ku ni kám ɗi nee, wuu wal nshak kaa ɗyemni̶ghi̶n ɗi moo so ndang Jesu ashak si. Wu yit ku riyang kì̵ Daa Jesu Kristi ni tong ashak ki̶ wun jir, wun ɗi wun a mu Jesu Kristi mo. Amin.

A wan Simon Pita, ki̶rom ki̶ laalop kì̵ Daa Jesu Kristi, wan ran wasika ɗiisi so pe wun ɗi jir, wun nyem ɗi wun kì̵ lap cínzeen ɗi nin ntiit ki̶ munu, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiret kì̵ Naan funu, ki̶ Nguɓam funu Daa Jesu Kristi.
Ɗiiret ki̶ riyang mo ɗee a muu ɗes hakyeng, ndi̶ghi̶n man Naan ki̶ Jesu Daa funu.

Naan ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiɗes mu man fi̶ri, ɓe wuri kì̵ ten bi̶lip mun, mpeku mu tong ɗi ashak ki̶ wuri ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiɗes fi̶ri, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiiret fi̶ri zak. A ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiisi, ɓe wuri c`in ɗak ki̶ ɓal fi̶ri ɗiiɗes, mpeku wuri cín mbii mo ɗi mmun jir. Mbii ɗi ba mun ki̶ mo kas, ku mu kat seen ɗi, ki̶ mpeku mu mwaan ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗi ni shang wuri nyit.

A ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiisi, ɓe wuri cín mbii mo mmun ɗes, mbiizughum ɗi gyet wuri kì̵ ten sat ne, wuɗin ncín mmun. Wuri cín mbii ɗiisi mo jir, a mpeku ndi̶ghi̶n mbiizughum ɗiisi mo, ɓe mu pwat aku ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiibish, ɗi mo ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, ɗi gurum mo fes riɓet mo. Amma wuri kì̵ ten pi̶rep wun, mpeku wu tong ɗyen ɗi nNaan.
Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan ki̶n sat nwun nee, kaaɗi wuu ten wu cínzeen nJesu Kristi, ɓe wu gung, mpeku shiimwaan fuu mo ɗee ɗi a ɗiiret hakyeng, ki̶ zak, wu gung ku wu man mbii mo ɗi.
Taji wu yit ni ɗee a man mbii mo ɓejee kas, amma wu gung ku wu yaasuk fuu mo ɗi. Kaaɗi wuu gung mpeku wu yaasuk ɗi, ɓe wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiiret mo jir, ki̶ wu cín ɗiiɗes nNaan.
Kaaɗi wuu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗi ni shang nNaan si, ɓe ni ret ku wu tap ki̶ shak a kaa ɗyemni̶ghi̶nshak mo si. Wu wal ngurum mo jir.
Katɗang wuu sat a c`in mbii ɗiiret ɗiisi mo ɗak, ɓe ba man fuu ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi nin nɗee a ɗiibuu kas, amma seen fuu ni mon nlàa-làa ɗiiret mo.
Amma nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ ɗyen ɗi ni a mu Naan kas, mo a kaa vum ɗi ba moo naapee kas si. Mo mander nee, Naan wuri kì̵ ten fwo ɗi mmo mpee shikbish ɗi kì̵ mo c`in.

Mpeemi̶ni, ɗyemnaa mo, wan ki̶n ɗang pe wun, mpeku wu ɗar ɗi ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiisi mo, mpeeɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten pi̶rep wun, ki̶ wuri bi̶lip wun, mpeku wu ɗee ɗi a nyem fi̶ri mo. Katɗang wuu c`in mbii ɗiiret ni mo, ɓe ba wun nkyam taa pal kas.
Ni aasi ɓe, Naan wuri wang polu ni nwun, mpeku wu ɗel ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n mulki kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi. Wuri ɗi wuri a Nguɓam funu. Mun ntong ashak ki̶ wuri har ngaa-ngaa.
A Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan ki̶n sat nwun shidaar-shidaar, mpee lepan nwun nkaa mbii ɗiisi mo jir, koo ɗi wuu ten wu man mo, ki̶ kaaɗi wuu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n zeen, ɗi wu man mo.
Kaaɗi wan kuɗi ki̶ seen ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, ɓe wan naa ni ret, mpeku wan lepan ɗi nwun nkaa mbii ɗiisi mo shidaar-shidaar, mpeku taji wu ɗee nsaam kas.
Wan man nee, ndi̶ghi̶n rep pee lee, ɓe yak wan nyit nan mu yil ɗiisi ni ɗi, kaaɗi gyet Daa funu Jesu Kristi wuri kám nwan ne, wan c`in aasi.
Wan ngung hakyeng, mpeku wan lepan ɗi nwun nkaa mbii ɗiisi mo koo pi̶rang ye, koo aɓwoon ɗi wan ki̶n muut.

Gyet yam ɓe mu satpo nwun nkaa j`i kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi ndi̶ghi̶n ɓal fi̶ri. Mbii ɗi gyet mun nkaa sat ni nwun, ba ni a mee po tongɗirem ɗi mo put a ndi̶ghi̶n pan mu gurum mo kas, amma mumun shikáa funu, ɓe muu ten mu naa ɗiiɗes fi̶ri shi yit funu mo.

Kaaɗi, gyet Jesu wuri lap ɗiiɗes ki̶ ɗiihai, pu Naan ɗi, ɓe mun ɗi gyet mu ki̶ling, kaaɗi Naan ɗiiɗes met jir wuri katpo nee: "Ɗiisi a Làa fi̶na, ɗi wan wal nwuri. Ɗi wuri c`in mbii ɗi mo ret nwan nyit zam."
Mun shikáa funu, gyet mun ɗi ashak ki̶ Daa funu Jesu Kristi nkaa ɗengjwak kì̵ Naan, gyet mu ki̶ling ɗoo ɗi ni tong a ɗeng sham.

Po kì̵ nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mo si̶ghi̶t kám mmun agaak nee, mbii ɗiisi mo azeen-nzeen. Ni ret ku wu lekáa fuu mo nkaa po kì̵ mo ni mo, mpeeɗi po mi̶ni, ni a kaa fitila ɗi nii ɓangpee ndi̶ghi̶n nkoo ne si, har kus ki̶ ɓitmang mu puus mmi̶ni. Parpuus mi̶ni, kaaɗi zar mangɓit ni kàa put, ɓe wu naa mbii mo agaak ndi̶re-ndi̶re ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo aasi.
Mbii ɗi ni ki̶ koghop ni met jir, ɓe wan ki̶n sat nwun nee, po ɗi gyet nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mo kì̵ ten sat ni, ɗi mo a riran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda mu Naan, ba mo put a ndi̶ghi̶n pan mu gurum mo kas.

Mpeeɗi po ɗi gyet nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mo sat, ba gyet ni put a ndi̶ghi̶n pan mu gurum mo kas, amma gyet a Riin Ɗiiɓang mu Naan, wuri ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n putughup furu, ɗangɓe wuri le ku mo katpo ɗi ni put a pe Naan ɗi.

Amma gyet yam, ɓe nyemsatpo mu ɗung mo yaghal ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n gurum ni mo, kaaɗi nyemsatpo mu ɗung mon nɗel ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n wun si. Mon nc`in kám ɗiibish, ɗi nin nwat cínzeen kì̵ gurum mo, har mon nciipo nkaa Daa Jesu Kristi nee, ba wuɗun man wuri kas. Wuri ɗi gyet wuri ang mo ndi̶ghi̶n shikbish furu mo, mpee mbii ɗiibish ɗi mon nkaa c`in ni. Ɓe ndi̶ghi̶n rep pee lee, ɓe kwat ɗi ni a mu jeel ɗiiɗes nin nj`i taa nkaa mo, har nin ntwa mo.
Gurum mo ɗes mon mmwaan ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan furu ɗi ni a mu naashoop. Har mon nle ku gurum katpo ɗiibish nkaa zeen mu ar kì̵ Naan.

Nyemsatpo mu ɗung ni mo, moo riɓet mbii kì̵ gurum mo aasisi, ki̶ mon nc`in ɗung mpeku mo num wun, ku mo kat mee li̶ɓet ɗi. Pugyet ɗi yam-yam, ɓe Naan ɗi wurin ntokɗiyeel ngurum mo jir, wuri kì̵ ten ɗak shin, mpeku wuri cín kwat ɗi mo mpee mbii ɗiibish ɗi moo c`in mo. Peeɗi seen furu nin nkyes ɗi azeen-nzeen, ɓe ni kì̵ j`i wul kus.

Gyet nyemlop kì̵ Naan ɗi mo c`in shikbish, ɓe ba Naan wuri kyee mo kas. Wuri yak mo ɓe wuri fwo mo ndi̶ghi̶n tughun ɗi ni a mu aawus, a ɓuɓwaghat shi ti̶sek ɗi ni a mu shaghal, ndi̶ghi̶n pee ɗin nkoo ɗi ni rap. Mon ntong a ndi̶ghi̶n peemi̶ni har puus ɗiyeel.

Nyemɗiiyam, ɗi gyet mo c`in shikbish, ɓe ba Naan wuri kyee mo kas. Naan wuri le ku am ɗiiɗes ni j`i twa nyem ɗi gyet mo kwar ki̶ling ɗoo fi̶ri jir. Gyet a Nowa ɓejee, ɗi Naan tap ki̶ wuri, mpeku taji mee mbii tung wuri kas, mpeeɗi gyet Nowa wuri kì̵ satpo ngurum mo ne, mo c`in mbii ɗiiret. Nowa wuri bar, ki̶ gurum mo povul.
Gyet Naan wuri twa yil nSodom ki̶ nGomora shi wus, har mo ɗee a fwat. Yil ɗiisi mo ɗee a mbiikám ngurum mo, nkaa mbii ɗi ni nkat nyem ɗi ba mo kì̵ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup furu mo kas.
Gyet ntiit ki̶ mi̶ni, ɓe wuri ɓam Lot ɗi gyet wuri a ngo ɗi̶n ndi̶re. Gyet shikbish ɗi gurum mo c`in, ni fes daampee mputughup fi̶ri zam, mbii ɗiibish ɗi gyet nyemɗiibish ɗiisi moo c`in.

Lot wuri a ngo ɗin ndi̶re. Gyet wuri tong ashak ki̶ nyemshikbish ɗiisi ni mo, wuri naa mbii ɗiibish ɗi moo c`in shidaar-shidaar, ki̶ gyet wurii ki̶lingpo kì̵ mo ɗiibish ni mo shidaar-shidaar zak. Shikbish ɗi das mi̶ni mo c`in ni, ni fes wat putughup nwuri zam, mpeeɗi gyet wuri a ngo ɗin ndi̶re.

Mbii ɗi mo kì̵ ten ɗel gyet yam ni mo, mo kám mmun nee, Naan wuri man ar ɗi wurin mɓam nyem fi̶ri mo ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n jwaan. Mbii ɗiisi ni mo waa kám zak nee, Naan wuri man ar ɗi wurin nkwat nyem c`in shikbish mo, ɗi wurin nle mo nder kì̵ kar, har parpuus ɗiyeel.

Met jir, ni a mpee nyem ɗi moo sat a nc`in mbii ɗiibish ɗak, ɗi nan furu nii naa nkyaghar ni, ki̶ mo waa kwarpo kì̵ Naan. Nyemkám ɗii mu ɗung ɗiisi mo, mo ɓal mputughup, ki̶ cíishik zam. Ba mee ki̶i̶rmuut ki̶ yaa mo mpee satpo ɗiibuu nkaa riin ɗiiɗes ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan kas. Moo sat a nkàss mmo ɗak.
Nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo met nyemɗung ɗiisi mon mɓal, ɓe ba mo kàss mo ki̶si ntoghom kì̵ Naan kas.

Nyem ɗiisi ni mo, moo satpo ɗiibish nkaa mbii ɗi ba mo manshii kì̵ ni ndi̶re-ndi̶re kas. Moo c`in mbii mo a kaa nyem ɗi ba mo man mee mbii kas si. Moo c`in mbii mo a kaa luwayil mo si. Ɗi mo làa mo a mpeku gurum mo yak mo twa ɗin nluwa. Azeen-nzeen moo twa mo a kaa luwayil mo si, ɗi ba gurum mo kuɗi ki̶ ki̶ling sum furu mo kas.

Naan wuri kwat mo shi jeel, mpee jeel ɗi gyet mumo ki̶ cín ngurum mo. Nyem ɗiisi ni mo riɓet a ki̶ling shang mu seen ɗiisi ɓejee, har moo c`in pak mbii ni mo a nnaar puus. Shiimwaan kì̵ mo ni mo, mo a mbii yitluwaan pe wun ɗi. Moo tong ashak ki̶ wun mpee se mbiise, amma moo tap cighi̶r mɓwoon fuu, ku mo c`in mbii ɗiibish ɗi mo shang mmo ɗi.

Mo lepan furu mo a nkaa mat mo, mpeku mo c`in ngaa ɗi ki̶ mo shidaar-shidaar. Ba c`in shikbish ni kyam mak mo kas. Kat mo naa nyem ɗi ba mo ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n ar kì̵ Naan kas, ɓe mo num nyem mi̶ni mo, mpeku mo c`in mbii ɗiibish ɗi. Koo pi̶rang ye, ɓe moo leyit a nkaa mbii mu gurum mo. Gurum kaa mi̶ni mo si, ɓe mon ntaa nder kì̵ ɗiyeel mu Naan.
Mo yit ar ɗin ndi̶re ni, ku mo waa mwaan ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n ar kì̵ Balam làa kì̵ Beyor. Gyet Balam wuri a ngo ɗi wuri fes ki̶ling shang mpee c`in mbii ɗiibish, mpeku wuri kat shaghal ɗi.

Amma ɓe mo gwak wuri mpee shikbish fi̶ri, har ntiit ki̶ mi̶ni, ɓe jaaki fi̶ri ɗi ba ni kì̵ kyam katpo kas, ɓe ni katpo nwuri kaa gurum si, har njaaki ni le ku wuri nook c`in kiyeet kì̵ shikbish mi̶ni.
Das ɗiisi ni mo ɗee a kaa dung ɗi ba moo am kas si. Mo ɗee a kaa nluu ɗi kut ki̶ mang ni ɗel so ki̶ ni si, mpeku taji ni j`i ki̶ fwan kas. Naan wuri tap ɗak mee pee ɗin nkoo le ɗi mpee mo.

Moo canjagham shi ɗoo ɗiiɓal nkaa po ɗi ba mo ki̶ mee koghop ni kas koo diɓen. Mo gung mpeku mo num nyem ɗi mo nkaa pwat ndi̶ghi̶n nyem ɗi ba mo man zeen ni kas. Mo gung ku mo dul nyem mi̶ni mo j`i c`in shikbish, ɗi mo a mu ngaa, kaaɗi moo c`in si.

Mo nkaa tuwoorpo shi sum mo nee, mo katpee mpee c`in mbii ɗi moo riɓet, amma mumo nyem ɗi mo satpo mi̶ni, mo a ki̶rom mu shikbish. Mpeeɗi koo a meye ɗi ni ɗee a mishkagham nkaa ngurum, ɓe ngo mi̶ni ɗee a ki̶rom kì̵ mbii ni.

Katɗang gurum mo kì̵ ten put ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiibish mu yil ɗiisi, ɗi moo wat, mpeeɗi mo kì̵ cínzeen Jesu Kristi, ɗi wuri a Nguɓam furu. Ɗangɓe katɗang mo waa cighi̶r putughup, har ku mbii ɗiibish mo waa yaa mo, ku mo se koghorong nkaa mo, ɓe ni ɗee nee, ndi̶ghi̶n peekyes ni, ɓe mbii nin mbish aki̶ mo met ɗin nshee ni.
Katɗang ni ɗee aasi, ɓe gyal gyet mon nnook man ar ɗin ndi̶re ni, mpeeɗi ba ni ki̶ koghop ni, ku gurum mo man ar ni hakyeng, ɗangɓe mo waa cighi̶r putughup furu mo, har mo yit Waar kì̵ Naan ni kas.
Mbii ɗi ni kat mo, ɓe ni kám mmun nee, sumpo ɗiisi mo azeen ɗi mo sat nee: "As waa baaso se mbii ɗi ni kì̵ fuut, ki̶ tughus ɗi gurum ki̶ vwang, ni waa baaso ɓi̶ring ndi̶ghi̶n ɓook."

Wun ɗi wan wal nwun si mo, ɗiisi ni a wasika ɗiivul, ɗi wan ki̶n ran ni nwun. Ndi̶ghi̶n wasika ɗiivul si ni mo, ɓe wan ki̶n lepan nwun nkaa mbii ɗiisi mo, ɗi wuu ten wu man mo, mpeku ni mii wun ɗi, ku wu so ɗi ndang Naan shi putughup ɗiimi̶ndong.

Wan ki̶n ran mbii ɗiisi ni mo, a mpeku wan lepan ɗi nwun, ku taji wu mander kas po ɗi pugyet nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan ɗiiɓang mo kì̵ sat ni, ne nin nc`in. Taji wu mander Waar ɗi Daa funu Jesu Kristi, ɗi wuri a Nguɓam funu wuri sat nee, wu c`in mo kas. Gyet a wuri nkaa satpo ni nwun shipo kì̵ jeplop fi̶ri mo, ɗi wuri lop mo pe wun ɗi.
A po ɗin nshee ɗi wan ki̶n riɓet sat ni nwun nɗiisi. Wu man nee, kus kì̵ kyes mu yil ni, ɓe gurum mon nyaghal yaa c`in mbii ɗi ni shang mmo nyit. Nyem ɗiisi ni mon nyaa shwar mu ɓákpee,

ki̶ mon nsat nee: "A me le ɗangɓe ba Jesu Kristi wuri j`i, kaaɗi gyet wuri kì̵ ten sat si kas ye? Puun funu mo kì̵ ten murap, amma mbii mo ɗi a kaa pugyet mo ɗi si, ntiit ki̶ shee kì̵ yil ni, ba mee mbii kì̵ shee ɗi kas koo ɗiɓen."
Nyem ɗi moo satpo ɗiisi, mo fes kwar a nyang. Mo man nee, gyet yam ɓe Naan wuri le ɗeng ki̶ yil ɗiisi a shi po ɗi wuri sat. Wuri ɗak yil ni shi am, ɓe ni ɗee nee, yil ni put a ndi̶ghi̶n am.
Ni aasi ɓe, gyet Naan wuri tu yil ɗin mɓít mi̶ni a shi am, kaaɗi gyet am ɗiiɗes, ni j`i paa yil ni jir si.

Naan wuri kì̵ ten sat nee, ɗeng ki̶ yil ɗiiyaksi mo, mon ntong ɗi har parpuus ɗi wus j`i caan mo jir hakyeng. Naan wuri yit yil ni ki̶ mbii ɗi mo ɗi jir, see puus ni wul ɗi wurin ntokɗiyeel ngurum mo jir, ki̶ wurin ntwa nyemɗiibish ɗi mo kwar ki̶ling ɗoo fi̶ri jir zak.

Wun ɗi wan wal nwun mo, mee mbii mi̶ndong ɗi ni ki̶ koghop ni, ɗi ba ni ret ku wu mander nni kas. Ni a nee, pe Naan ɗi, ɓe teer mi̶ndong ni a kaa ɓit mo duɓu si, ki̶ zak, ɓit mo duɓu, ɓe ni a kaa teer mi̶ndong si. Mo a ɗiimi̶ndong pe Naan ɗi.

Pak gurum moo pan nee, Naan wuri ɓes zam, mpeeɗi ba wurin nkaa c`in mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ ten sat ne, mbii mi̶ni mon nc`in kas. Ba ni aasi kas, koo diɓen, Naan wurii gung ki̶ wun, a mpeku wuri cínpee ɗi ngurum mo, mpeku mo katpee tuwap ɗi. Ba ni a ɗyen kì̵ Naan ku mee gurum lagham kas. Wurii riɓet ku gurum mo jir, ɓe mo tuwap.

Jir ki̶si, katɗang pee ni wul, ɓe Daa Jesu Kristi wurin mbaaj`i. Wurin mbaaj`i a nɗin mman! Kaa j`i ki̶ wat, ɗi ba gurum mo lepan ne, mee wat nj`i kas si. Ntiit ki̶ mi̶ni, ɓe gurum mon nki̶ling mee ɗoo ɗiiɓal, ki̶ ɗengnaan nin nlagham. Jir mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ki̶ ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, mon ncaan jir. Ɗangɓe yil ɗiisi ki̶ mbii ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n ni jir, mon nlagham.

Kaaɗi wun kì̵ man nee, mbii mo jir mon nlagham aasi, ɓe ni ret ku wu ɗak tong fuu mo, ki̶ wu tap ɗi ki̶ shiimwaan fuu mo. Ni ret ku seen fuu mo ɗee a ɗiiɓang, ki̶ wu lesuk fuu mo ndi̶ghi̶n sar kì̵ Naan ki̶n ndi̶ng-ndi̶ng. Ki̶ wu ki̶ling ɗoo fi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir.

Wu leyit nkaa parpuus ɗi Naan wurin mbaaj`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi zak, ki̶ wu c`in mbii mo ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiret, ɗi nin nle ku puus mi̶ni j`i wul ɗi ki̶lak-ki̶lak. A puus mi̶ni, a ɗi ɗengnaan nin ncaan. Ɗangɓe nin nlagham zak, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan jir ki̶ ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, mon nɗee a fwat, ba mee mbii nɗee ɗi kas koo ɗiɓen.
Amma Naan wuri kì̵ ten sat mmun nee, wuɗin mbaa ɗak mee ɗengnaan ki̶ yil ɗiipoo mo ɗi, a peeɗi mbii mo jir mon nɗee ɗi ndi̶re-ndi̶re. A mbii ɗi muu leyit nkaa ni mmi̶ni.
Wun ɗi wan wal nwun mo, wan ki̶n sat nwun nee, kaaɗi wuu gong puus mi̶ni, parɗi Jesu Kristi wurin mbaaj`i, ɓe wu gung ku mwaan fuu mo ɗee ɗi a ɗiiret, mpeku wu tong ɗi riyang ndi̶ghi̶n wuri.

Wu man nee, mbii ɗi ni le ɗangɓe Daa funu Jesu Kristi wuri gung, a mpeku wun wu katpee ɗi mpee bar. Ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu Pool, ɗi mu wal nwuri, wuri c`in ɗak ki̶ seen ɗi Naan cín nwuri, mpeku wuri kám mbii mo ɗi nwun, kaaɗi wuri ran wasika fi̶ri nwun.

Ndi̶ghi̶n wasika fi̶ri mo jir, ɓe wuri kì̵ sat mbii ɗiisi mo nwun jir. Ndi̶ghi̶n pak wasika fi̶ri ni mo, ɓe ni luk mpeku gurum manshii kì̵ pak po ni mo. Nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ seen kas, nyem ɗi ba mo ɗar ɓal-ɓal kas, moo cighi̶r ki̶ mbii ɗi wuri sat ni mo. Kaaɗi mo cighi̶r ki̶ po ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan si. Mbii ɗi moo c`in ɗiisi mo, moo ɗul a ɗiyeel kì̵ Naan j`i nkaa káa furu mo.

Amma wun, ɗi wan wal nwun mo, wuu ten wu man mbii ɗiisi mo. Mpeemi̶ni, wan ki̶n sat nwun nee, wu tap ku taji nyem ɗi mo kwar Naan, mo le ku wu táa wu pal ndi̶ghi̶n shikbish furu mo kas. Taji wu cínpee mmo, ku mo le ku wu yaghal wu yit peeɗar fuu ɗiiret ni kas.

Amma ni ret ku wu sekiyeen ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiret, mpeku Daa funu Jesu Kristi, ɗi wuri a Nguɓam funu wuri kám ɗiiret fi̶ri ɗi nwun, ɗiki̶-ɗiki̶, mpeku wu sat a nwurang ndi̶ghi̶n wal fi̶ri. Mu yit ku gurum mo cín ɗiiɗes ɗi nwuri yaksi ki̶ har ngaa-ngaa. Amin.
Mbii ɗi pugyet ni ɗin nshee, ɗi muu ki̶ling, ɗi muu naa shi yit funu mo, har mu naa ni hakyeng, ki̶ zak, muu tuwaas shi sar funu mo, muu sat a po nkaa Po seen.
Seen ni j`i put agaak ki̶ muu naa ni, har mun a langting mu seen ni. Muu sat a ni nwun shiɓal, po nkaa seen, seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa, ɗi gyet ni ashak ki̶ puun, har ni j`i put mmun agaak.
Mbii ɗi mu naa, ki̶ mbii ɗi mu ki̶ling, muu satpo nwun shiɓal a nkaa ni, mpeku wu ɗee ɗi a shaarshak, ki̶ shaar ashak funu ni ashak ki̶ Naan puun ki̶ Làa fi̶ri Daa Jesu Kristi.
Mu ran mbii ɗiisi mo nwun a mpeku retnyit funu ni gam ɗi hakyeng.
A po ɗi mu ki̶ling nin nshee pu wuri ɗi nɗiisi, ki̶ mu sat ni nwun zak nee, Naan wuri a peeɓang, ki̶ ba mee peenkoo ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n wuri kas koo diɓen.
Katɗang mu sat nee, muu shaar ashak ki̶ wuri, ɗangɓe muu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo, ɓe mu ɗee a nyemɗung mo, ki̶ ba muu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n zeen ni kas.
Amma katɗang muu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang, kaaɗi wuri ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang ni si, ɓe mun ki̶ shaar ashak ki̶ niyee funu mo, ɗangɓe toghom kì̵ Làa fi̶ri Jesu, ni vwang mun mɓut shikbish mo jir.
Katɗang mu sat nee, ba mun ki̶ shikbish kas, ɓe muu num a káa funu, ki̶ ba zeen ni ndi̶ghi̶n mun kas.

Katɗang mu woo shikbish funu mon nNaan, ɓe Naan wurii ɗar nkaa mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ ten sat, ki̶ wurii c`in mbii ndi̶re, wurin nfwo shikbish funu mo jir, ki̶ wurin nvwang mun ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiibish mo jir.
Katɗang mu sat nee, ba mun kì̵ cín shikbish kas, ɓe mu le Naan wuri ɗee a nguɗung, ɓe ba po fi̶ri ni ndi̶ghi̶n mun kas zak.

Jep fi̶na ɗiiɗween mo, wan ki̶n ran mbii ɗiisi mo nwun, a mpeku taji wu c`in shikbish kas, amma katɗang mee ngo c`in shikbish, ɓe mun ki̶ Nguɓam ɗi wurin nkatpo mpee mun pe Naan puun ɗi. Ngukatpo ɗiisi a Jesu Kristi ngo ɗin ndi̶re.
A mpeeɗi Jesu Kristi wuri cín káa fi̶ri, ɗangɓe Naan fwo shikbish funu mo mmun. Ba a shikbish munu ɓejee kas, amma shikbish mu yil ni jir.
Katɗang mu tap ki̶ waar kì̵ Naan mo, ɓe mu man Naan azeen.
Ngo ɗi wuri sat ne, wuɗi man Naan, amma katɗang ba gwar mi̶ni tap ki̶ waar kì̵ Naan kas, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a nguɗung, ki̶ zak, ba zeen ni ndi̶ghi̶n gwar mi̶ni kas.
Amma ngo ɗi wuri tap ki̶ po kì̵ Naan, ɓe a gwar mi̶ni gam ki̶ wal kì̵ Naan hakyeng.
Koo a weye ɗi wuri sat nee, wuɗii tong a ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu, ɓe ni a ting ku gwar mi̶ni mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan kì̵ Jesu Kristi.
Shaar fi̶na mo, waar ɗi wan nkaa ran ni nwun si, ba ni a ɗiipoo kas, ni a ɗiisi̶ghi̶r, ɗi wun ki̶ ni pugyet ɗin nshee. Waar ɗiisi̶ghi̶r ni a mbii ɗi wuu ten wu ki̶ling.
Jir ki̶si, wan a nkaa ran waar ɗiipoo wun, mbii ɗi ni azeen ndi̶ghi̶n seen kì̵ Kristi, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n wun zak, mpeeɗi peenkoo ni nkaa ɗel so, peeɓang ɗi ni azeen-nzeen ni nkaa ɓangpee.
Ngo ɗi wuri sat nee, wuɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang ni, amma katɗang wurii kwar ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe gwar mi̶ni ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo har yaksi.
Gwar ɗi wuri wal ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a ndi̶ghi̶n peeɓang. Ba mee mbii ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n gwar mi̶ni ɗi nin nle canshii nwuri kas.

Amma ngo ɗi wuri kwar ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo, ki̶ gwar mi̶ni ki̶ mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n peenkoo zak, ki̶ zak, ba wuri man peeɗi wurii so ɗi kas, mpeeɗi peenkoo ni kì̵ vum yit fi̶ri ni mo.
Wan ran nwun, jep ɗiiɗween mo, mpeeɗi Naan wuri kì̵ fwo shikbish fuu mo nwun mpee sum kì̵ Jesu Kristi.

Wan nkaa ran ni nwuwun puun mo, mpeeɗi wu man wuri, ɗi wuri ɗi pugyet ɗin nshee kì̵ yil ni. Wan nkaa ran nwun jepzi̶lang mo, mpeeɗi wun wuu se koghorong nkaa ngo ɗiibish ni. Wan nkaa ran ni wun njep mo, mpeeɗi wuu man puun ni.

Wan ran nwun puun mo, mpeeɗi wu man wuri, ɗi wuri ɗi pugyet ɗin nshee kì̵ yil ni. Wan ran nwun jepzi̶lang mo, mpeeɗi wun a ɗiiɓal, ki̶ mpeeɗi po kì̵ Naan ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fuu mo, ki̶ wuu se koghorong nkaa ngo ɗiibish ni.
Taji wu wal nyil ni kas, koo a mbii ɗi mo a mu yil ni. Katɗang mee gurum wal nyil ni, ɓe ba wal kì̵ Naan ni ndi̶ghi̶n gwar mi̶ni kas.
Mpeeɗi mbii ɗi mo a mu nan jir ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni, kaa kyaghar mu yit, ki̶ roghop mu seen ɗiiyaksi, ba mo a mu Naan puun kas, amma mo jir mo a mu yil ɗiisi.
Yil ɗiisi ni, ki̶ mbii ɗi gurum moo kyaghar ndi̶ghi̶n ni jir, ni nkaa ɗel so sí, amma jir ngo ɗi wuri c`in ɗyen kì̵ Naan, ɓe a gwar mi̶nin nkat seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa.

Jep fi̶na mo, pee ni kus ki̶ kyes kì̵ yil ni, kaaɗi wuu ki̶ling nee, ngo ɗi wuri kwar Kristi wurii j`i, koo ni a yaksi, ɓe nyem ɗi mo kwar Kristi mo kì̵ ten j`i. Mpeemi̶ni ɓe mu man nee, kyes kì̵ yil ni kus.

Mon nyaghal pwat a ndi̶ghi̶n mun, mpeeɗi ba jí tong ashak furu ki̶ mun ni azeen-nzeen kas. Mpeeɗi katɗang ɗi jí mo a ndi̶ghi̶n mun azeen-nzeen, ɓe ɗi mon nsat a nsekiyeen ndi̶ghi̶n tong ashak ki̶ mun vit ɗak. Amma mo pwat so, a mpeku gurum mo naa ɗi agaak nee, ba jí mo a munu kas.
Amma wuwun, ɓe Kristi wuri kì̵ ten ɗoo Riin fi̶ri Ɗiiɓang nkaa wun, mpeemi̶ni ɓe wun, wu man mbii ɗi mo azeen jir.
Wan ki̶n ran nwun, ba nee, wu nook a man zeen ni kas, amma a mpeeɗi wu man zeen ni. Wu man zak nee, ba mee ɗung kì̵ kyam put ndi̶ghi̶n zeen kas.
A we a nguɗung ye? Nguɗung ni a, jir ngo ɗi wuri cíipo nee, ba Jesu wuri a Kristi ɗi Naan lop kas. Ngo mi̶ni a shaarlek kì̵ Jesu, ki̶ a ngo mi̶ni kwar, ki̶ cíipo kì̵ Naan puun ki̶ Làa fi̶ri Jesu.
Jir ngo ɗi wuri kwar Làa ni, ɓe ba gwar mi̶ni wuri ki̶ Naan puun ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri kas. Jir ngo ɗi wuri lap Làa ni, ɓe gwar mi̶ni kì̵ lap Naan puun ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri mi̶ni zak.
Wu yit ku mbii ɗi gyet wu ki̶ling nin nshee, ni tong ndi̶ghi̶n wun. Katɗang mbii ɗi gyet wu ki̶ling nin nshee, ni tong ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɓe wun wu tong ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n Naan puun fi̶ri zak.
Naan wuri c`in seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa mmun, a ni a mbii ɗi Jesu wuri kì̵ ten sat nee, wuɗin ncín mmun.
Wan ki̶n ran ɗiisi nwun, a nkaa nyem ɗi moo riɓet num wun.

Amma mpeeɗi Kristi wuri kì̵ ten ɗoo Riin Ɗiiɓang nkaa wun, ki̶ zak, katɗang Riin fi̶ri ni tong ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ɓe ba ni ki̶ mee koghop ni ku mee ngo kám mee mbii nwun kas. Mpeeɗi Riin fi̶ri ni kì̵ kám mbii mo nwun jir, ki̶ zak, mbii ɗi Riin ni kám nwun, ɓe ni azeen-nzeen, ba a ɗung kas. Wu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n kám kì̵ Riin ni, ki̶ wu tong ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi zak.
Yaksi jep fi̶na mo, wu tong ndi̶ghi̶n wuri, mpeku parpuus ɗi wurin nj`i put ɗi agaak, ɓe taji mee yitluwaan koo ki̶i̶rmuut yaa mun parpuus ɗi wurin mbaaj`i kas.
Katɗang wu man nee, Kristi wuri a ngo ɗin ndi̶re, ɓe wu man azeen-nzeen nee, jir ngo ɗi wuri c`in mbii ɗiiret, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a làa kì̵ Naan.
Kai! wu naa wal ɗi Naan puun funu wuri wal mmun, har wuri pet mun a jep kì̵ Naan mo. Azeen mun a jep kì̵ Naan mo. Mbii ɗi ni le, ɗangɓe ba yil ni man mun kas, a mpeeɗi ba yil ni kì̵ man Naan kas.

Mun a jep kì̵ Naan mo yaksi. Ba mo kì̵ kám mmun yaksi, kaaɗi mun nyaghal mu ɗen ɗi si kas aku. Amma mu man nee, katɗang Kristi wurin mbaaj`i, ɓe mun nɗee a kaa wuri si, mpeeɗi parpuus mi̶ni, ɓe mun nnaa wuri ndi̶ghi̶n shin fi̶ri ki̶nɗing.
Jir ngo ɗi leyit nkaa Kristi, ɓe ni a ting gwar mi̶ni ɗee a ɗiiɓang kaaɗi Kristi wuri a ɗiiɓang si.
Jir ngo ɗi wuri c`in shikbish, ɓe gwar mi̶ni tep a Waar kì̵ Naan. Shikbish ni a tep Waar kì̵ Naan.
Wu man nee, gyet Kristi wuri sham ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, a mpeku wuri mang shikbish funu mo ɗi. Ba mee shikbish ndi̶ghi̶n wuri kas, koo diɓen.
Jir ngo ɗi wuri tong ndi̶ghi̶n Kristi, ɓe ba wurin nki̶i̶ sat a nc`in shikbish kas. Ngo ɗi wurii sat a nc`in shikbish ɗak, ɓe ba gwar mi̶ni ki̶ kyam naa Kristi, koo man wuri kas.
Jep fi̶na ɗiiɗween mo, taji wu le ku mee gurum num wun kas. Ngo ɗi wuri c`in mbii ɗiiret, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a ɗin ndi̶re, kaaɗi Kristi wuri a ngo ɗin ndi̶re si.

Ngo ɗi wuri c`in shikbish, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a mu Shetan, mpeeɗi gyet Shetan wuri c`in shikbish, pugyet ɗin nshee har yaksi. Mbii ɗi ni le ɗang gyet Làa kì̵ Naan wuri j`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, a mpeku wuri tu ɗak kì̵ Shetan mo ɗi jir.
Ba mee ngo ɗi wuri a mu Naan, wurin mmak tong ndi̶ghi̶n shikbish vit kas, mpeeɗi wuri a mu Naan.

Ni aasi zak, mu man nyem ɗi mo a jep kì̵ Naan mo agaak, ki̶ nyem ɗi mo a jep kì̵ Shetan mo zak. Jir ngo ɗi wuri c`in mbii ɗiibish, ɓe ba gwar mi̶ni a ngo kì̵ Naan kas, ki̶ zak, ngo ɗi wuri kwar ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe ba gwar mi̶ni a ngo kì̵ Naan kas.
Po ɗi wu ki̶ling nshee ni nɗiisi, ne mu walnshak.

Taji mu ɗee kaa Kein si kas, mpeeɗi gyet wuri a mu Shetan, har wuri tu ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri. Gyet a me le ɗangɓe wuri tu ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri ye? Mpeeɗi gyet pan fi̶ri ni mo a ɗiibish, amma gyet mu ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri mo a ɗiiret.
Taji ni ɗee nwun a mbii aapo kas ɗyemnaa mo, katɗang yil ɗiisi ni kwar wun.
Mu man nee, muu yaghal mu yit peemúut, ku mo ɗel ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa, mpeeɗi mu wal nɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu mo. Ngo ɗi ba wuri wal ngurum mo kas, ɓe wurii tong ɗi a ndi̶ghi̶n peemúut.
A ngo ɗi wuri kwar ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe ngo mi̶ni a ngutukáa, ki̶ wu man nee, ba seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa nin ntong ndi̶ghi̶n nyemtukáa mo kas.
Mu man wal ni aasi si, Jesu wuri cín seen fi̶ri mpee mun. Ni ret ku mu ɗak sun, mpeku mu cín seen funu ɗi mpee ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu mo.

Amma katɗang mee gwar ki̶ long mu yil ɗiisi, ɗangɓe gwar mi̶ni naa mee ɗyemni̶ghi̶n mɓut njeel, amma wuri kwar ɓam ngujeel ni. Ɓe c`in arang ɗang mun nsat nee, wal kì̵ Naan ki̶ tong ndi̶ghi̶n putughup kì̵ ngulong mi̶ni ye?
Jep fi̶na ɗiiɗween mo, taji wu walnshak a shi mi̶shpoo kas, amma mu walnshak ndi̶ghi̶n ɗak ɗiiret mo, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n zeen zak.
A ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiisi, ɗangɓe mu man nee, mun a mu zeen ni. Ni aasi, ɓe mun nɗar ntoghom kì̵ Naan, ba a shi yitluwaan kas.
Katɗang putughup funu mo tokɗiyeel ɗiibish mun, ɓe mu man nee, Naan wuri ɗes met mputughup funu mo, ki̶ wuri man mbii mo jir.
Wun ɗi wan wal nwun, katɗang ba putughup funu mo tokɗiyeel ɗiibish mmun kas, ɓe mun mmak ɗar pe Naan ɗi, nɗin naashoop.
Ki̶ zak, koo meye ɗi mu ɗang pu Naan, ɓe wurin ncín mmun, a mpeeɗi muu kiyeer Waar fi̶ri mo, ki̶ mu c`in mbii ɗi mo ret wurin nyit zak.
Mbii ɗi Naan wuri sat ne, mu c`in ni nɗiisi, nee; ni a ting ku mu cínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Làa fi̶ri Jesu Kristi, ki̶ zak, nee mu walnshak ntiit-ntiit ki̶ mbii ɗi wuri sat ne mu c`in mo.

Jir nyem ɗi moo tap ki̶ Waar kì̵ Naan, ɓe moo tong a ndi̶ghi̶n wuri, ki̶ wuri ndi̶ghi̶n mo zak. Mpee Riin Ɗiiɓang ɗi Naan wuri cín mmun, ɓe yaksi mu man nee, Naan wurii tong ndi̶ghi̶n putughup funu mo.

Wun ɗi wan wal nwun, taji wu cínzeen koo a riin ɗiiɗang ye kas, amma wu kyam riin ni mo, ku wu man ɗi nee, kyet mo a mu Naan wa? Koo mo a mu Shetan ye? Mpeeɗi nyemsatpo kì̵ Naan mu ɗung mo ɗi, koo pee ɗiiɗang ye.
Wun mman Riin ɗi ni a mu Naan ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiisi, koo a riin ɗiiɗang ye ɗi ni sat nee. Gyet Jesu Kristi wuri j`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi a ndi̶ghi̶n nan, ɓe riin mi̶ni a Riin kì̵ Naan.

Amma koo riin ɗiiɗang ye, ɗi ni cíipo nee, ba gyet Jesu Kristi wuri j`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi ni a ndi̶ghi̶n nan kas, ɓe ba riin mi̶ni a mu Naan kas. Riin mi̶ni a riin ɗi nii kwar Kristi; ɗi jí wu ki̶ling ne, nin nɗung j`i. Amma yaksi ni kì̵ ten j`i wul ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni jee.

Jep fi̶na ɗiiɗween mo, wun a mu Naan, wun kì̵ se koghorong nkaa riin ɗi mo kwar Jesu Kristi, mpeeɗi Riin kì̵ Naan ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n wun, ni ɓal met nriin ɗi mo kwar Jesu Kristi, ɗi mo ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni.
Mo a mu yil ɗiisi, mpeemi̶ni, ɓe mbii ɗi moo sat jir, ni a mu yil ɗiisi, ki̶ yil ɗiisi nii ki̶ling mo.

Amma wuwun, a mu Naan, koo a weye ɗi wuri man Naan, ɓe wurii lekom mpee ki̶ling mun. Ngo ɗi ba wuri man Naan kas, ɓe ba wurin nlekom mpee ki̶ling mun kas. A shi ɗiisi, ɗangɓe mu man riin ɗi ni azeen ki̶ riin ɗi ni a mu ɗung.
Wun ɗi wan wal nwun, wu yit ku mu walnshak, mpeeɗi wal ni put a pe Naan ɗi. Koo weye ɗi wuri wal ngurum mo, ɓe wuri a ngo kì̵ Naan, ki̶ wuri man Naan zak.
Ngo ɗi ba wuri wal ngurum mo kas, ɓe ba ngo mi̶ni man Naan kas, mpeeɗi Naan wuri a wal.
Naan wuri kám wal fi̶ri ni mmun, a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiisi. Wuri lop Làa fi̶ri ɗiimi̶ndong sham ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, mpeku mu kat seen ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n sum fi̶ri.
A wal ni nɗiisi nee, ba a mun shee wal nNaan kas, amma a Naan wuri shee wal mmun, har wuri lop Làa fi̶ri sham ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, mpeku wuri ɗee ɗi a ar ɗi Naan nfwo shikbish funu mo ɗi mmun.
Wun ɗi wan wal nwun, katɗang Naan wuri fes wal mmun aasi, ɓe ni ret ku mu walnshak aasi zak.
Ba mee gurum kì̵ kyam naa Naan kas, amma katɗang mu walnshak, ɓe Naan ki̶ tong ndi̶ghi̶n mun, ki̶ wal fi̶ri ni ɗee a ɗin ndi̶re ndi̶ghi̶n mun zak.
Mpeeɗi Naan wuri kì̵ cín Riin fi̶ri mmun, ɓe yaksi mu man nee, muu tong a ndi̶ghi̶n wuri zak.
Ki̶ zak, muu ten mu naa, ki̶ mu c`in langting ni nee, puun wuri kì̵ ten lop Làa fi̶ri sham, ku wuri ɗee ɗi a Nguɓam mu yil ɗiisi.
Koo a weye ɗi wuri wangpo ku wuri sat ɗi nee, Jesu a Làa kì̵ Naan, ɓe Naan ndi̶ghi̶n ngo mi̶ni, ki̶ ngo mi̶ni ndi̶ghi̶n Naan zak.

Mun shikáa funu mu man, ki̶ mu cínzeen nwal ɗi Naan wuri ki̶ ni mpee mun. Naan wuri a wal, koo a weye ɗi wurii mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n wal fi̶ri shidaar-shidaar, ɓe gwar mi̶nii tong a ndi̶ghi̶n Naan, ki̶ Naan ki̶ tong ndi̶ghi̶n putughup kì̵ gwar mi̶ni zak.
Wal ni ɗee ndi̶ghi̶n mun, a mpeku taji mu kat naashoop parpuus tokɗiyeel ni kas, mpeeɗi muu mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n shiimwaan kì̵ Daa Jesu ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi.

Ba mee ki̶i̶rmuut ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n wal kas. Wal ɗi ni azeen, nii ceen ki̶i̶rmuut jir. Ki̶i̶rmuut ki̶ j`i, a mpee kwat ɗiibish, mpee mbii ɗiibish ɗi gurum kì̵ c`in. Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶i̶rmuut, ɓe ba wal ni ɗar ndi̶re-ndi̶re ndi̶ghi̶n wuri kas.
Muu wal Naan, a mpeeɗi Naan wuri shee wal mmun.

Katɗang mee gurum sat nee, wuɗi wal nNaan, amma wurii kwar ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a nguɗung. Mpeeɗi katɗang ba gurum wal nɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri, ɗi wurii naa shi yit shidaar-shidaar kas, ɓe ba gwar mi̶ni mmak wal nNaan, ɗi ba wuri kì̵ kyam naa wuri kas.
A Waar ɗi mu lap pe Naan ɗi nɗiisi, nee gwar ɗi wuri wal nNaan, ɓe ni a ting ku gwar mi̶ni wal nɗyemni̶ghi̶n fi̶ri zak.
Koo ngo ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wuri cínzeen nee, Jesu wuri a Kristi ɗi Naan lop, ɓe ngo mi̶ni a gwar kì̵ Naan, ki̶ koo ngo ɗiiɗang ye ɗi wuri wal mpuun, ɓe ngo mi̶ni wal nLàa ni zak.
Katɗang mu wal nNaan ki̶ mu tap waar fi̶ri mo, ɓe mu man nee, muu wal nyem kì̵ Naan mo zak.
A wal funu ni pe Naan nɗiisi, mu tap ki̶ waar fi̶ri mo. Ba waar kì̵ Naan ni mo met mmun mɓal kas,
mpeeɗi koo a ngo kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗang ye, wurii mak se koghorong nkaa yil ɗiisi ni. Muu se koghorong nkaa yil ɗiisi ni, a mpeeɗi mu cínzeen nNaan.
A we mak se koghorong nkaa yil ni ye? See a ngo ɗi wuri cínzeen nee, Jesu wuri a Làa kì̵ Naan.

Jesu Kristi wuri a ngo ɗi gyet wuri j`i, ɓe mo c`in baptisma wuri shi am, ki̶ gyet wuri ɓeer toghom fi̶ri, kaaɗi gyet mo pwas wuri nkaa shiyeepyoghom si. Ba gyet mo c`in baptisma wuri a shi am ɓejee ɗak kas. Amma gyet wuri ɓeer toghom fi̶ri,
ki̶ Riin Ɗiiɓang wuri a langting kì̵ mi̶ni, ki̶ zak, Riin Ɗiiɓang wuri azeen.
Langting mo ɗi kun, Riin, ki̶ am, ki̶ toghom mo jir kun mo c`in langting a nkaa mbii ɗiimi̶ndong.
Muu lap langting ɗi gurum mo sat, amma langting kì̵ Naan ni nɗiisi. Naan wuri c`in langting nee, "Jesu Kristi wuri a Làa fi̶ri"

Mpeemi̶ni; koo a weye ɗi wuri cínzeen nLàa kì̵ Naan, ɓe gwar mi̶ni ki̶ langting kì̵ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri. Amma ngo ɗi ba wuri cínzeen nNaan kas, ɓe gwar mi̶ni le Naan a nguɗung, mpeeɗi ba gwar mi̶ni ncínzeen ndi̶ghi̶n langting ɗi Naan c`in nkaa Làa fi̶ri kas.
A langting ni nɗiisi, nee, Naan wuri cín seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa mmun, seen ɗiisi ni a ndi̶ghi̶n Làa fi̶ri.
Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ Làa kì̵ Naan, ɓe ngo mi̶ni ki̶ seen, amma ngo ɗi ba wuri ki̶ Làa kì̵ Naan kas, ɓe ba ngo mi̶ni ki̶ seen kas.
Wan ran po ɗiisi mo nwun, a mpeku wu man ɗi nee, wun ɗi wu cínzeen nLàa kì̵ Naan, ɓe wu kat seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa.
Ba mun ki̶ mee naashoop ntoghom kì̵ Naan kas, mpeeɗi mu cínzeen nee, wurii ki̶ling mun, katɗang mu ɗang mee mbii pu wuri, ɗi nin ntiit-ntiit ki̶ ɗyen fi̶ri.
Katɗang mu man nee, wurii ki̶ling mun, ndi̶ghi̶n koo meye ɗi mu ɗang pu wuri, ɓe mu man nee, wuri kì̵ ten c`in mun mbii ɗi mu ɗang pu wuri ni.

Katɗang mee ngo naa mee ɗyemni̶ghi̶n nkaa c`in mee shikbish ɗi ba nin nso ki̶ wuri a peemúut kas, ɓe gwar mi̶ni c`in aduwa nNaan, mpeku Naan cín seen ɗi ngo ɗi wuri kì̵ ten c`in shikbish ni. Muu sat ɗiisi ni a mpee shikbish ɗi ba ni wul ki̶ mo a peemúut kas. Mee shikbish ni ɗi, ɗi nin nso ki̶ gurum a peemúut, ba wan ki̶n sat nee, ɗi mee gurum nc`in aduwa a mpee mi̶ni kas.
Ɗak ɗiibish mo jir a shikbish, amma mee shikbish ɗi, ɗi ba ni mak so ki̶ gurum a peemúut kas.
Mu man nee, ngo ɗi wuri a gwar kì̵ Naan, ba wurin nsat a nc`in shikbish vit kas. Mpeeɗi Jesu Làa kì̵ Naan wurii tap fwang ngo mi̶ni, ki̶ ba Shetan mak cínjeel wuri kas.
Mu man nee, mun a mu Naan, koo ɗi yil ɗiisi ni a nder kì̵ Shetan.

Mu man nee, Làa kì̵ Naan wuri kì̵ ten j`i, ki̶ wuri jí cín man mmun zak, mpeku mu man Naan ɗi wuri azeen ɗi. Mun a ndi̶ghi̶n wuri, ɗi wuri azeen, ndi̶ghi̶n Làa fi̶ri Jesu Kristi. A wuri a Naan ɗi azeen, ki̶ seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa.
Jep ɗiiɗween mo, taji wu ɓàlkáa fuu mo ashak ki̶ k`um kas.
Wasika ɗiisi ni put a nsar fi̶na ngunan, so pe wii ɗi, mat ɗiibi̶bi̶lip, ki̶ jep fii mo. Wii ɗi wan ki̶n wal yi ndi̶ghi̶n zeen, ba a wan ɓejee ɗak kas, amma jir ki̶ nyem ɗi mo man zeen ni.
Mpeeɗi zeen ɗi ni tong ndi̶ghi̶n mun yaksi, nin ntong ndi̶ghi̶n mun har vit.
Daa Naan puun ki̶ Làa fi̶ri Jesu Kristi, mo c`in ɗiiret mmun, ki̶ mo naa mun shi yit naajeel, ki̶ tongriyang. Ɗiisi mon nɗee ashak ki̶ mun ndi̶ghi̶n zeen ki̶ wal zak.
Ni ret nwan nyit zam, mpeeɗi wan kat pak jep fii moo mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n zeen ni, ntiit ki̶ kaaɗi puun wuri sat ne, mu c`in si.
Yaksi wan ki̶n ɗang pu yi naa, yi yit ku mu walnshak. Ba ɗiisi ni a mee waar ɗiipoo ɗi wan ran ni nyi kas, amma a ɗi mun ki̶ ni pugyet ɗin nshee.
A wal ni nɗiisi, nee, mu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n waar fi̶ri mo. Ɗiisi ni a waar ni, kaaɗi wuu ki̶ling nshee si, nee, wu mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n wal.

Nyemnumpee mo ɗes, mo kì̵ ɗel ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni jir. Nyem ɗi mo cíipo nee, ba gyet Jesu wuri j`i ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi a ndi̶ghi̶n nan kas. Kiyeet kì̵ nyem mi̶ni mo a nyemnumpee mo, ki̶ a mo a shaarlek kì̵ Kristi.
Wu tap ki̶ káa fuu mo, mpeku taji wu vwet mbii ɗi gyet muu ten mu c`in ɗak mpee ni si kas, amma wu gung, ku wu lap kwat ni ɗi.

Koo a weye ɗi wuri so akiyeen, amma katɗang ba wuri mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n kám kì̵ Daa Jesu kas, ɓe ba wuri ki̶ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri kas. Amma jir ngo ɗi wuri mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n kám kì̵ Daa Jesu, ɓe gwar mi̶ni ki̶ Naan puun ki̶ Jesu Làa fi̶ri ndi̶ghi̶n putughup fi̶ri.
Katɗang mee gurum j`i pe wun ɗi, ɗang ba gwar mi̶ni j`i aa kám ɗiisi nwun kas, ɓe taji wu lap wuri wu le ntulu fuu mo, koo wu kaat gwar mi̶ni kas.
Mpeeɗi jir ngo ɗi wuri tok ki̶ gwar mi̶ni, ki̶ ngo ɗi wuri lap gwar mi̶ni zak, ɓe wurii ɓal a káa ashak ki̶ gwar mi̶ni ndi̶ghi̶n ɗak fi̶ri ɗiibish mo.

Koo ɗi wan ki̶ mbii mo ɗes mpee ran mo nwun, ɓe ba wan nran mo nwun shi haal mu takarda ki̶ ing kas, amma wan ki̶n lepan nee, wan nj`i kun naa wun ɗi, ku mu katpo ɗi ashak zak, mpeku retnyit funu ni gam ɗi.
Jep kì̵ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fii ɗiibi̶bi̶lip, moo tok ki̶ yi.
Wasika ɗiisi ni put a nsar fi̶na ngunan, so pe wugha Gayus ɗi, ɗi wan wal nwugha ndi̶ghi̶n zeen.
Shaar fi̶na, wan ki̶n c`in aduwa pe wugha, mpeku a kat ɗiiret ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n mbii mo jir, ki̶ zak, mpeku a tong ɗi nkagham, kaaɗi seen fugha ni kat ɗiiret si.
Ni ret nwan nyit zam, kaaɗi pak ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu mo j`i satpo ɗiiret nwan nkaa wugha nee, aa ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen ni, ki̶ kaaɗi wugha ki̶ mwaan ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen ni si zak.
Ba mee retnyit ɗi wan ki̶ ni waa met nɗiisi kas, ku wan ki̶ling nee, jep fi̶na moo mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen ni.
Shaar fi̶na, aa ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n ɗak ɗi aa c`in ni mpee ɗyemni̶ghi̶n funu nyemso ndang Jesu mo, har met jir ɓe a mpee mi̶zep mo.
Mo kì̵ satpo nyemso ndang Naan ɗin mpesi mo nkaa wal fugha ni. Nin nret zam katɗang wugha ɓam mo mɓut mwaan furu, ɓe nin nɗee a mbii ɗi nin nret Naan nyit.
Mpeeɗi mo yaghal yaa mwaan ni a mpee sum kì̵ Daa. Ba mon nwaa lap mee mbii pu nyemk`um mo kas.
Mpeemi̶ni, ni ret ku mumun nyemso ndang Jesu mo, mu lap nyem mi̶ni mo ndi̶ghi̶n lu funu mo, mpeku mu ɗee ɗi a shaar ɗak ashak ki̶ mo ndi̶ghi̶n zeen ni.
Wan ki̶n ran mee mbii nyemso ndang Naan ni mo, amma Diyoturifis ɗi wuri fes leshin a ɗiiɗes mɓut mmo, wuri kwar lappo funu.

Katɗang wan j`i, ɓe wan nsat nwuri mbii ɗi wurii c`in ni nkaa mun. Po ɗiibuu ɗi wurii naa nsat ni nkaa mun, ba mi̶ni mak wuri kas, har wuri kwar lap nyemso ndang Jesu mo ndi̶ghi̶n tulu fi̶ri zak, ki̶ wuri cíi nyem ɗi moo riɓet lap mo ndi̶ghi̶n tulu furu mo. Har wuri pwat ki̶ nyem ɗi moo riɓet kaat mi̶zep ni mo ndi̶ghi̶n nyemso ndang Naan ni mo!

Wugha ɗi wan wal nwugha si, taji a mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiibish mo kas, amma a mwaan ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiiret mo. Koo weye ɗi wurii c`in mbii ɗiiret, ɓe gwar mi̶ni a mu Naan. Amma jir ngo ɗi wurii c`in mbii ɗiibish, ɓe ba gwar mi̶ni man Naan kas koo diɓen.
Gurum mo jir mo satpo ɗiiret nkaa Dimitiriyus, har zeen ni shikáa fi̶ra ni kì̵ c`in langting ɗiiret nkaa wuri zak. Mumun zak, mun a langting fi̶ri, wugha man nee, mbii ɗi muu sat ni mo azeen.
Wan ki̶ mbii mo ɗes mpee ran mo nwugha, amma ba wan nran wugha a shi haal ki̶ ing kas.
Wan kì̵ lepan nee, kat mun nkaat, ɗangɓe mun nkatpo ki̶ shak yit ki̶ yit hakyeng.
Wu tongriyang. Shaar funu moo tok ki̶ wugha. A tok ki̶ shaar funu mo jir, koo weye ndi̶ghi̶n mo.
Juud ki̶rom mu Jesu Kristi, ɗyemni̶ghi̶n kì̵ Jemis so pe nyem ɗiipi̶pi̶rep mo, ɗi Naan puun wuri wal mmo, ki̶ mo ɗee a ɗi fufwang ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi.
Kussuk kì̵ Naan, ki̶ riyang, ki̶ wal fi̶ri, mo sat a nwurang ndi̶ghi̶n wun ɗak.

Wun ɗi wan wal nwun si mo, gyet wan ki̶n fes nlepan, mpeku wan ran ɗi nwun nkaa cínzeen ɗi mun ki̶ ni ashak. Amma mee pan le kun ran nwun, mpeku wan caa wun, ku wu sekiyeen ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n lek, mpee cínzeen ɗi Naan wuri kì̵ ten cín nyem fi̶ri mo, yit mi̶ndong ɓejee har mpee vit.

Mpeeɗi pak gurum mo ɗi, ɗi ba mo man Naan kas. Moo tap j`i ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n mun a si̶sok. Nyem ɗi mo cighi̶r ki̶ po kì̵ Naan ki̶ ɗiiret fi̶ri, mpeku mo katpee c`in mbii ɗiibish mu nan mo ɗi. Ki̶ zak, moo cíipo kì̵ Daa Jesu Kristi. Ki̶ mo kwar wuri ɗi wuri a Daa funu kì̵ Nguɓam funu. Pugyet mo kì̵ ten ran ndi̶ghi̶n takarda kì̵ Naan, po nkaa kwat furu ɗi mon nlap ni a muut.

Koo ɗi wuu ten wu man mbii ɗiisi mo jir, amma wan ki̶n riɓet le a pan nwun, kaaɗi gyet Naan wuri put ki̶ nyem Isreil mo nyil Ijip. Amma aɓwoon kì̵ mi̶ni, ɓe gyet Naan wuri twa nyem ɗi mo kwar cínzeen.

Ki̶ zak, wu man nee, nyemlop kì̵ Naan ɗi mo aɗeng, ɗi mo kwar peetong furu, mpeku mo tang peetong ɗi ni ɗes met ɗi Naan kì̵ cín mmo, ɓe mo ɓwaghat mo shi ti̶sek ɗii ngaa-ngaa ndi̶ghi̶n peeɗi ni nkoo ɗiirap shek-shek. Naan wuri le mo a peemi̶ni, har parpuus ɗiyeel nin nj`i wul. Parɗi Naan wurin ncanɗiyeel ɗiibish ɗi mmo.

Ni aasi zak, ɓe taji wu mander nyil nSodom ki̶ Gomora, ki̶ yil ɗi mo kus ki̶ mo kas. Gyet yil ɗiisi mo cín káa furu mo, mpee c`in ngaa ki̶ mbii ɗiibish mo. Mo lap kwat kì̵ shikbish mi̶ni mo a ndi̶ghi̶n wus ɗi ni so ngaa-ngaa. Ɗiisi ni ɗee a mbiikám ngurum mo jir.

Ni a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiisi, ɓe nyem ɗiisi mo naa sughun mo, ɗi ni le ku mo waa cighi̶r c`in shikbish nkaa sut furu mo. Mo kwar ɗiiɗes kì̵ Naan, ki̶ mo satpo ɗiibish nkaa nyem ɗiiret mo ɗi mo, ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan.

Mbii ɗi koo a Makiyel ɗi wuri a ngo ɗiiɗes mu nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo, ba wuri mak sat ni kas. Kaaɗi gyet Makiyel ki̶ Shetan mon njighi̶r nkaa kúm kì̵ Mosis, ɓe ba Makiyel mak wangpo, mpeku wuri kàss Shetan ɗi kas, amma wuri sat nee, "a Daa wurin ngwak wugha ɗak."
Amma nyem ɗiisi mo cínkáa nkaa mbii mo jir, ɗi ba mo man shii ni kas, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo man ni shi pan mu nan. Mo a kaa long mo si. A mbii mi̶ni moo waa cighi̶r twa mo.

Jeel mpee mo, mpeeɗi moo mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n ar kì̵ Kein, ki̶ mpee tang li̶ɓet mu shaghal, ɓe mo cínkáa furu, ku mo mwaan ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗi gyet Balam taa pal ɗi. Mo ɗee a nyemkáaɓál mo, nyemciishik mo, kaaɗi gyet Kora ɗee si. Mon mmurap a kaaɗi gyet Kora muut si.

Ɗiisi mo ɗee a kaa mi̶mer ɗi nii wat shin kì̵ gurum si, ki̶ mo ɗee a kaa pee ɗiirap si ndi̶ghi̶n wun, kaaɗi wun nkaa se tong ashak fuu. Moo tap aa káa furu mo ɓejee ɗak. Mo a kaa nluu fwan ɗi kut ki̶ mang ni so ki̶ ni si, ɗi ba ni mak kyam j`i ki̶ fwan kas. Mo a kaa ting ɗi ni kwar làa-làa har tar waap j`i mang si. Ting ɗi mo kì̵ ɓwan seen ni, ki̶ ni ɗee a ɗii mumuut.

Mo a kaa am ɗi kut ki̶ cut ni ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n bahar si. Moo woo ti̶fil mu mbii naashoop ɗi moo c`in mo zak. Mo a kaa zar ɗi moo mwaan si. Naan wuri tap ɗak mee pee ɗiijurung, ɗiirap shek-shek, le mpee mo.
Enok zak, ɗi wuri a dang ɗiipovul ndi̶ghi̶n cirem kì̵ Adam, wuri satpo nkaa mo nee, "Wu naa, Daa wurin nj`i ki̶ nyemlop fi̶ri ɗiiɓang mo ɗes.

Mpeku mo canɗiyeel ɗi ngurum mo jir, ki̶ mo woo ɗi agaak jir, ɗak ɗiibish ɗi nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ Naan ndi̶ghi̶n putughup furu mo kas; ɗi mo kì̵ ten c`in ni ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗi ba ni a mu Naan kas. Ki̶ jir po ɗiiɗeet ɗi nyemshikbish ɗiisi ni mo kì̵ ten sat nkaa Naan."

Nyem ɗiisi mo naa nkatpo nɗagham-nɗagham, nyemsatpo ɗiibuu nkaa gurum mo, nyemmwaan ndi̶ghi̶n kyaghar mu nan furu mo, nyemcanjagham mo shi po furu mo, nyemcaa gurum mo, ba a ndi̶ghi̶n ar ɗiiret kas, mpeku mo kat mee li̶ɓet ɗi.
Amma wun ɗi wan wal nwun si mo, taji wu mander mbii ɗi gyet jeplop kì̵ Daa funu Jesu Kristi mo sat nwun kas.
Mo kì̵ sat nwun nee, "Ndi̶ghi̶n teer mu peekyes ni mo, ɓe nyemɓákpee, mon nj`i put," mpeku mo nwangpo ɗi nwun. Nyem ɗi moo mwaan a ndi̶ghi̶n kyaghar mu nan furu mo, ɗi ba ni a ar mu Naan kas.
A nyem ɗiisi mo, moo j`i ki̶ yilangpee ndi̶ghi̶n gurum mo. A mo a nyem ɗi mo kyaghar mbii ɗiibish mu yil ɗiisi shi mi̶se furu mo. Ba mo ki̶ Riin kì̵ Naan kas.
Amma, wuwun, ɗi wan wal nwun si mo, wu ɗiksuk fuu mo ndi̶ghi̶n cínzeen fuu ɗiiɓang. Wu c`in aduwa ndi̶ghi̶n Riin Ɗiiɓang zak.
Wu sat a nlesuk fuu mo ndi̶ghi̶n wal kì̵ Naan, kaaɗi wuu leyit nkaa Daa Jesu si, mpeku shi naajeel fi̶ri, ɓe wurin ncín seen ɗiiso ngaa-ngaa nwun.
Wu naajeel kì̵ nyem ɗi mo ɗee mɓeetshik ki̶ wun.
Wu ɓam pak mo. Wu put ki̶ mo aku mɓut nwus, ki̶ mpee pak mo, ɓe wu naajeel kì̵ mo shi ki̶i̶rmuut. Amma wu kwar lée furu mo, mpeeɗi lée furu ni kì̵ ten ɗee a ɗiirap shi shikbish furu mo.
Pe wuri ɗi wuri mak fwang wun, mpeku taji wu táa wu pal kas, ki̶ wurin nj`i ki̶ wun ntoghom kì̵ ɗiiɗes mu Naan ndi̶ghi̶n retnyit, ba ki̶ mee rap kas.
Pe Naan ɗi wuri mmi̶shin, Nguɓam funu ndi̶ghi̶n Jesu Kristi, Daa funu ɗiiɗes, Ɗiihai fi̶ri, ki̶ mulki ɗiiɗes ki̶ iiko, mo ɗee a mu wuri, pugyet ɗi yam-yam, ki̶ har yaksi, ki̶ har ngaa-ngaa. Amin.

Ndi̶ghi̶n takarda ɗiisi, ɓe mo ran a mbii ɗi Jesu Kristi wuri woo nki̶rom kì̵ Naan nee. A Naan wuri shee le mbii ɗiisi ni mo, nsar kì̵ Jesu Kristi, mpee ku wuri woo ni ɗi nyem fi̶ri mo, mpeku mo man mbii ɗi mon ndung j`i, ki̶ ɗi mo ɗi yaksi. Ni aasi ɓe, Jesu Kristi wuri lop ngulop fi̶ri so pe ki̶rom fi̶ri Joon ɗi, mpeku wuri woo mbii ɗiisi mo ɗi nwuri.
Joon wuri kì̵ ten sat agaak mbii ɗi wuri kì̵ naa mo jir, ki̶ wuri ten ran po kì̵ Naan ɗi Jesu Kristi woo mo nwuri ne, ni azeen.

Koo a weye, ɗi wuri tang takarda ɗiisi ni, ɓe wurin nkat retnyit, ki̶ nyem ɗi mo lekom mpee ki̶lingpo ɗiisi ni ɗi Naan kì̵ woo ni, ki̶ moo c`in mbii ɗi ni sat, ɓe mon nkat retnyit, mpeeɗi pee ni kì̵ wul kus, mpeku mbii ɗiisi ni mon ngam ɗi.

Wan Joon ki̶n tok ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗiipovul si mo, ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil nEshiya. Naan wuri naa wun shi yit naajeel fi̶ri, ki̶ wuri cín tongriyang nwun zak. Naan ɗi wuri ɗi yaksi, ɗi pugyet wuri ɗi yam, ki̶ ɗi wurin ndung j`i, ki̶ Riin ɗiipovul ni mo, ɗi moo ɗar kus ki̶ Naan a peetong fi̶ri ɗiiɗes.

Ki̶ Jesu Kristi, ɗi wuri a langting ɗi azeen, wuri a ɗin nshee, ɗi mo shee yaghal ki̶ wuri a peemúut, ki̶ zak, a wuri a Mishkagham nkaa mishkagham ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi jir. Wuri wal mmun. A mpee toghom fi̶ri, ɓe wuri fwoon mun mɓut shikbish funu mo.
Wuri le mu ɗee a mishkagham mo ki̶ pris mo, mpeku mu seyil ɗi nNaan puun fi̶ri. Ɗiiɗes, ki̶ iiko, mo ɗee a mu wuri har ngaa-ngaa. Amin!
Wu naa wurin ndung j`i nkaa nluu. Gurum mon nnaa wuri jir, har ki̶ nyem ɗi gyet mo pwas wuri. Gurum ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi jir, mon nwal maap mpee wuri. Nin nɗee aasi! Amin.
Daa Naan ɗiiɗes wuri sat nee, "A wuɗi a Alfa, ki̶ Omega, shee kì̵ mbii mo, ki̶ kyes kì̵ mbii mo jir zak. Naan ɗi wuri ɗi yaksi, pugyet wuri ɗi yam, ki̶ a wurin ndung j`i zak."

A wan, Joon ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fuu nguso ndang Jesu, wan a memee ndi̶ghi̶n wun nyem ɗi wuu gung ki̶ shwaajeel, mpeeɗi wu le Kristi a kaa Mishkagham fuu si. Jí mo ɓwaghat wan, mo so ki̶ wan mee laayil, ɗi am neer ni cighi̶r kaat, ɗi moo pet ni a Patmos, mpeeɗi gyet wan ki̶n satpo Naan ni ngurum mo, ɗi Jesu wuri c`in langting ni.
Kaaɗi wan ɗi nyil mPatmos, parpuus kì̵ Daa, ɓe Riin kì̵ Naan wuri j`i ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n wan. Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo ɗiiɗes mɓwoon fi̶na, kaa wal kì̵ feer si.

Ni sat nwan nee, "A mang takarda, a ran mbii ɗi wugha nkaa naa ni, ku a lop so nEki̶lisya ɗiipovul, ɗi mon nyil Afisus ki̶ Simena, ki̶ Pagamum, ki̶ Tayati̶ra, ki̶ Sardis, ki̶ Filadalfiya, ki̶ Lodisiya."
Wan cighi̶r mpeku wan naa ngo ɗi wurii katpo ni ɗi. Kaaɗi wan cighi̶r, ɓe wan naa, peele fitila mo povul, ɗi mo ɗak mo a shi zinariya.

Nnaar kì̵ peele fitila ɗiipovul ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe wan naa mee gwar wurii ɗar ɗi, ɗi wuri lapshak ki̶ Làa Gurum. Wuri lop mee nli̶r ɗi ni sham wul wurin nkwakshii, ki̶ wuri ɓwaghat mee teng si cighi̶r nkaa tughur fi̶ri, ɗi mo ɗak mi̶ni a shi zinariya.
Shoopkáa fi̶ri ni mo piyaa kaa shuu si, ki̶ ni kaa ɗaghar si. Yit fi̶ri ni mo lapwus kaa liis kì̵ wus si.
Shii fi̶ri mo mi̶lep, kaa shaghal ɗiimi̶lep, ɗi mo tap ɗak shi wus mpeku ni ɗee a ɗiiret si. Ɗoo fi̶ri ni a kaa wal ki̶ am ɗi moo sham mputughul si.
Wuri ki̶ zar mo povul nsarse fi̶ri, ki̶ mee kwai ɗii se, ɗi ni se koghop weet mpo fi̶ri. Yit fi̶ri ni fes ɓangpee hakyeng kaa puus a naar si.

Kaaɗi wan naa wuri, ɓe wan taa nyil nder shii fi̶ri kaa wan ki̶n mumuut si. Ɓe wuri le sarse fi̶ri nkaa wan, ɗangɓe wuri sat nee, "Taji ki̶i̶rmuut yaa wugha kas. A wan a ɗin nshee, ki̶ a wan a kyes ni.
A wan a ɗin mmeen. Gyet wan ki̶n muut, amma yaksi, ɓe wan ki̶ seen. Wan ntong ɗi ki̶ seen har ngaa-ngaa. Wan ki̶ makuli mu wang peemúut, ki̶ peeso kì̵ nyem mumuut mo, a sar fi̶na.
"A ran mbii ɗi aa ten a naa mo yaksi, ki̶ mbii ɗi wugha nkaa naa mo, ki̶ mbii ɗi mon ndung j`i.

A ɗiisi ni a shii kì̵ zar ɗiisi̶sok ɗiipovul ɗi mon nsarse fi̶na, ki̶ peeɗar mu fitila ɗiipovul ɗi mo ɗak a shi zinariya. Zar ɗiipovul ni mo, a mo a nyemlop kì̵ Eki̶lisya ɗiipovul ni mo, ki̶ peeɗar kì̵ fitila ɗiipovul si mo, mo a Eki̶lisya ɗiipovul ni mo zak."

"A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil Afisus nee, Lop ɗiisi ni, a po ɗi ni put mpo kì̵ gwar ɗi wuri ki̶ zar mo povul nsarse fi̶ri si, ɗi wurii mwaan nnaar kì̵ peele fitila ɗiipovul si mo, ɗi mo ɗak mo a shi zinariya si.

Wan man ɗak ɗi wun kì̵ ten c`in ni, ki̶ jeel fuu, ki̶ gung fuu zak. Ba wuu shaar ki̶ nyemɗiibish mo kas. Wuu kyam shiimwaan kì̵ nyem ɗi mo sat nee, wuɗun a jeplop kì̵ Jesu mo, amma ba mo a jeplop kì̵ Kristi kas. Wuu ten wu man ne, moo c`in a ɗung.
Wu gung, koo ɗi wun nkaa shwaajeel mpee sum fi̶na, ɓe taji wu baa mɓwoon kas.
Amma wan ɗi ki̶ mee mbii mi̶ndong nkaa wun ɗi wan ki̶n riɓet sat ni nwun. Ba wu kuɗi wuu wal nwan kaa ɗi gyet wuu wal nwan nshee si kas.

Taji wu mander nshiimwaan fuu ɗi gyet yam, akuɗang wuu táa wu pal si kas. Wu tuwap, mpeku wu baa wu mwaan ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n ar ni, kaa gyet yam si. Katɗang ba wu tuwap kas, ɓe wan ndung j`i, kun mang peele fitila ni ɗi a peeɗar ki̶ni.
Amma mbii mi̶ndong ɗi wan ki̶n kwoop wun mpee ni a nɗiisi, wuu kwar ɗak kì̵ nyem Nikolaitan mo, kaaɗi wan ki̶n kwar si.

Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom, mpee ki̶lingpee ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin ni nkaa sat ni nyemso ɗang Naan mo. Ngo ɗi wuri se koghorong, ɓe wan ncín pee nwuri se laating ɗi ni a mu seen, ɗi ni kàa ndi̶ghi̶n bong kì̵ Naan."

"A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil nSimena nee, Lop ɗiisi ni a po ɗi ni put mpo kì̵ gwar ɗi wuri a ɗin nshee, ki̶ a wuri a kyes ki̶ mbii mo jir, ɗi gyet wuri kì̵ muut, amma yaksi wuri ki̶ seen.

Wan man jeel fuu, ki̶ zak, wan man nee, ba wun a nyemlong mo kas, amma shi zeen, ɓe wun a nyemlong. Wan man po ɗiibish mu nyem ɗi moo lesut a nyem Yahudi mo, amma shi zeen, ɓe ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas. Mo a nyem kì̵ Shetan mo.

Taji wu kat mee ki̶i̶rmuut nkaa jeel ɗi wun ndung shwaa ni kas. A ki̶ling! Shetan wurin nkyam wun. Wurin nle pak fuu mo ndi̶ghi̶n lushaghat, wun nshwaajeel mpee teer mo kaghapaat. Amma wu gung, taji wu kwar wan kas, koo ɗi mon nti̶twa wun, ɓe wu gung, mpeku wan cín zughum ɗiiɗes ɗi ni a seen ɗi nwun.
Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom, ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin wuri nkaa sat ni (Eki̶lisya) nyemso nɗang Naan mo. Ngo ɗi wuri se koghorong, ɓe ba muut ɗi vul nin ntung wuri kas."
"A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil Pagamum nee, Lop ɗiisi ni put a mpo kì̵ gwar ɗi wuri ki̶ kwai ɗi ni se koghop vul si.

Wan man nee, peeɗi wuu tong ɗi ni, ɓe Shetan wuri kì̵ le mbiitong mu mulki fi̶ri a mpee mi̶ni. Wuu yaa sum fi̶na ɓal-ɓal. Ba wu cíipo fi̶na kaaɗi gyet mo tu Antipas nguc`in langting fi̶na azeen-nzeen ndi̶ghi̶n peetong kì̵ Shetan si kas.

Amma wan ki̶ rep pak mbii mo lee nkaa wun. Wun ki̶ pak gurum mo nnaar fuu, ɗi moo so a ndang kám mu Balam. Gyet a Balam wuri kám mBalak, ku wuri num nyem Yahudi mo, har gyet mo c`in shikbish mpee se mbiise ɗi gyet mo kì̵ ten c`in nk`um, ki̶ c`in mbii ɗiibish mo kaa ngaa si.
Ki̶ zak, wun ki̶ nyem ɗi moo so ndang kám ki̶ Nikolaitan mo.
Wu tuwap, kasɓe wan nɗung j`i, kun c`in lek ɗi ki̶ wun, shi kwai fi̶na ɗi ni j`i put mpo fi̶na si.

Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom, mpee ki̶lingpee, ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin wuri nkaa sat ni (Eki̶lisya) nyemso nɗang Naan mo." Ngo ɗi wuri se koghorong, ɓe wan ncín pak manna ɗi ni a si̶sok nwuri. Ki̶ zak, wan ncín jwak ɗiipiyaa ngwar ni, ki̶ sum ɗiipoo a riran ɗiki̶ nkaa jwak ni. Gwar ɗi wurin nlap jwak ni, ɓe a wuri man mbii ɗi mo ran nkaa ni ɓejee ɗak.

"A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil nTayati̶ra nee, Lop ɗiisi ni put a mpo kì̵ Làa kì̵ Naan ɗi yit fi̶ri moo lapwus kaa mbi̶lem ki̶ wus si, ɗi shii fi̶ri moo mi̶lep kaa shaghal ɗi mo tap ɗak ni si.
Wan man ɗak fuu, ki̶ wal fuu, ki̶ cínzeen fuu, ki̶ ɗak ɓam ɗi wu c`in mo, ki̶ gung fuu, ki̶ zak, yaksi ɓe wun nkaa c`in ɗak ni met ɗi gyet wu shee c`in nin nshee.

Amma jir ki̶si, ɓe wan ki̶ mbii ɗiisi mo nkaa wun. Mpeeɗi wu tap wu kiyee mat ɗi moo pet wura a Jezebel sí, ɗi wuraa pet sat a mat satpo kì̵ Naan. A shi ar kám fi̶ra, ɓe wura le ku ki̶rom fi̶na mo c`in mbii ɗiibish mo kaa c`in ngaa, ki̶ se mbiise ɗi mo kì̵ ten cín nk`um.
Wan ki̶n cín pee nwura, mpeku wura tuwap ɗi, amma wura kwar tuwap mpee shikbish fi̶ra, ɗi ni a mu ngaa.
Wan nle ku shwal yaa wura, ki̶ wuran nshwaajeel a peesaam ki̶ nyem ɗi moo c`in ngaa ashak ki̶ wura, katɗang ba mo tuwap kas, ku mo nook c`in mbii ɗiibish mi̶ni mo kas, ɓe wan ncín jeel mmo.

Wan nle ku jep fi̶ra mo murap ki̶ shwal, mpeku Eki̶lisya mo jir mo man ɗi nee, wan a ngo ɗi wan ki̶n man pan ɗi ni ndi̶ghi̶n putughup kì̵ gurum mo, ki̶ zak, wan ki̶n leng putughup furu mo. Wan nkwat koo a weye ntiit ki̶ ɗak ɗi ngo ni kì̵ ten c`in.

Yaksi mpee kaghar wun nyem Tayati̶ra, ɗi ba wu lap kám kì̵ Jezebel ni kas, ba wu man mbii ɗiibish, ɗi gurum moo pet ni a jurung kì̵ mbii ɗi mo a mu Shetan kas, (ba wan ɗi ki̶ mee mbii mpee sat nwun ɗik mpeku wu c`in kas.)
See wu ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi wuu ten wu kám, har parɗi wan mbaaj`i zak.
Mpee nyem ɗi moo ɗar ɓal-ɓal har mo se koghorong, ki̶ mo c`in ɗyen fi̶na zak, har peekyes ni, ɓe wan ncín ɓal mmo nkaa yil ni mo, kaaɗi wan ki̶n kat ɓal nsar kì̵ puun fi̶na si.
Mon nc`in mulki nkaa yil ni mo, a shi kám shaghal, ɗang mon mpyan mo, a kaa tughulwan ɗi gurum ki̶ piin ni si.
Nyem ɗi mo ɗar ɓal-ɓal har mo se koghorong, ɓe wan ncín zar mangɓit mmo zak.
Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom, mpee ki̶lingpee, ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wuri nkaa sat ni (Eki̶lisya) nyemso ndang Naan mo."

"A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil nSardis nee, A lop ni nɗiisi, ɗi ni put a mpo kì̵ gwar ɗi wuri ki̶ Riin kì̵ Naan mo povul, ki̶ zar mo povul zak. Wan man ɗak fugha, wugha le ku gurum mo pan ne, wugha ɗi ki̶ seen, amma wugha a ɗiimumuut.
A yaghal ating, mpeku a fwang rep kaghar seen ɗi ni ɗee ni ɗi, mpeku taji ni si̶ghi̶t muut ki̶n ndi̶ng-ndi̶ng. Wan naa, ba shiimwaan fugha ni a ɗiiret nyit kì̵ Naan kas.

Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan ki̶n sat nwugha, a pan mbii ɗi gyet aa ten a ki̶ling mo, ɗi gyet har aa lap mo. A cínzeen mi̶ni mo ɓal-ɓal. A tuwap. Katɗang ba wugha yaghal kas, ɓe wan mbaaj`i a kaa wat si, ɗi ba wughan mman parpuus baaj`i fi̶na ni kas.

Amma rep pak gurum mo ɗi, nyil nSardis, ɗi mo tap le lée furu mo a ɗiiɓang. Nyem mi̶ni moo mwaan ashak ki̶ wan. Mon nlop lée ɗiipiyaa-piyaa mo, mpeeɗi shiimwaan furu ni mo ret, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo kì̵ ten c`in mo.

Nyem ɗi mo se koghorong, ɓe mon nlop lée ɗiipiyaa-piyaa mo zak. Ba wan nkyam tu sum furu ndi̶ghi̶n takarda mu nyemseen mo kas. Pe Naan puun fi̶na, ki̶ nyemlop fi̶ri mo, ɓe wan nsat agaak ne, mo a nyem fi̶na mo.
Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom mpee ki̶lingpee, ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wuri nkaa sat nin (Eki̶lisya) nyem so ndang Naan mo."

Gwar ni sat nwan zak nee, "A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil nFiladalfiya. "Lop ɗiisi ni put a mpo kì̵ gwar ɗi wuri a ɗiiɓang ki̶ wuri azeen. A wuri ki̶ makuli kì̵ Devid. Katɗang wuri wang polu ni, ɓe ba mee gurum mak shaghat ni kas, ki̶ zak, katɗang wuri shaghat pee ni, ɓe ba mee gurum mmak wang ni kas.

Wan man ɗak fugha. A naa, wan ki̶n ten wangpee nwugha, ɗi ba mee ngo mmak kyam shaghat ni kas. Wan man nee, koo ɗi ba ɓal fugha ni ɗes kas, ɓe wugha kì̵ ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n po fi̶na, ki̶ zak, ba wugha ki̶ cíipo nee a nook man wan kas.

A ki̶ling, wan nle nyem mu Shetan ɗi moo le sut a nyem Yahudi si mo, amma ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas, moo c`in a ɗung. Wan nle ku nyemɗung ɗiisi mo j`i kurum ntoghom fugha, ki̶ nder shii fugha, ku mo man ɗi zak nee, wan wal nwugha.

Kaaɗi wugha kì̵ ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n po fi̶na, ki̶ gung zak, mpeemi̶ni ɓe wan ntap ki̶ wugha, mpeku taji mee mbii tung wugha kas, ndi̶ghi̶n teer mu jeel ɗi nin ndung j`i nkaa yil ni, mpeku ni kyam gurum mo ɗi jir ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni.
Wan ndung j`i ki̶lak-ki̶lak. A yaa mbii ɗi wugha ki̶ ni ɓal-ɓal, mpeku taji, mee gurum yaa wugha ki̶ zughum mu koghorong ni kas.

Jir nyem ɗi mo se koghorong, ɓe wan nle ku mo ɗee a kaa ndwet mo si ndi̶ghi̶n Lu kì̵ Naan fi̶na, ɗi ba nin nkyam put ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n lu ni kas. Wan nran sum kì̵ Naan fi̶na nkaa pukiyeen furu, ki̶ sum mu yil kì̵ Naan fi̶na, ɗi moo pet ni a Jerusalem ɗiipoo, ɗi ni sham a pe Naan ɗi. Ki̶ zak, wan nran sum fi̶na ɗiipoo nkaa mo.
Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom mpee ki̶lingpee, ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wuri nkaa sat nin (Eki̶lisya) nyem so ndang Naan mo."

Gwar ni sat nwan nee, "A ran lop so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii tap ki̶ Eki̶lisya ɗi nin nyil nLodisiya. "Lop ɗiisi ni put a mpo kì̵ gwar ɗi moo pet wuri a Amin. Shii kì̵ mi̶ni nee, 'ni aasi'. Wuri a ngo ɗi azeen-nzeen, ki̶ wuri a langting ɗi azeen. A wuri a kuk kì̵ mbii ɗi Naan wuri le mo jir.
Wan man ɗak fugha, ba wugha a ɗiizughum koo ɗiital kas. Ngyal ɗi wugha a ɗiizughum, koo ɗiital.
Amma mpeeɗi wugha anaar-anaar, ba wugha a ɗiital kas, koo ɗiizughum kas, mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan ntus wugha put aku mɓut mpo fi̶na.

Wugha sat nee, wugha ki̶ long, ki̶ wugha ki̶ mbii ɗi aa riɓet mo jir! Amma ba wugha man nee, wugha a ngujeel, ɗi ni ret ku gurum mo naa wugha ki̶ yit mu ɓam kas. Wugha a kaa nyemvum mo si. Wugha a kaa nyemjeel ɗi moo mwaan ngum si.

Wan ki̶n satpo nwugha nee, a seet zinariya pe wan ɗi, zinariya ɗiiret, mpeku a ɗee ɗi a ngulong. A seet lée ɗiipiyaa mo pe wan ɗi, mpeku a paa sak fugha ni ɗi. A j`i a seet yen mu yit zak, mpeku a le ɗi nyit fugha mo, mpeku a naapee ɗi.
Nyem ɗi wan ki̶n wal mmo, a mo a nyem ɗi wan ki̶n gwak mo. Wan ki̶n cín kar mmo, mpeku mo kám seen ɗi. Mpeemi̶ni, a yaghal azeen-nzeen, mpeku a tuwap ɗi.

A naa, wan ki̶n ɗar mpolu mu putughup. Wan nkaa ɓwap polu ni, katɗang mee ngo ki̶ling ɗoo fi̶na, ki̶ har gwar mi̶ni wang polu ni, ɓe wan nɗel ndi̶ghi̶n lu ni, har wan se mbiise ashak ki̶ gwar mi̶ni, ki̶ gwar mi̶nin nse mbiise ashak ki̶ wan zak.

Nyem ɗi mo se koghorong, ɓe wan ncínpee mmo, mpeku mo tong ɗi ashak ki̶ wan nkaa mbiitong mu mulki fi̶na, kaaɗi gyet wan ki̶n se koghorong si. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe yaksi, wan ki̶n tong ashak ki̶ puun fi̶na nkaa mbiitong mu mulki fi̶ri.
Ngo ɗi wuri ki̶ kom mpee ki̶lingpee, ɓe wuri ki̶ling mbii ɗi Riin kì̵ Naan wuri nkaa sat nin (Eki̶lisya) nyem so ndang Naan mo."

Aɓwoon mi̶ni, ɓe wan ɗiyeep yit fi̶na. Ɓe wan naa mee polu ɗi ni a wuwang ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo ɗi ni wal ntiit ki̶ feer, ɗi jí ni katpo ki̶ wan nshee. Ni sat nwan nee, "A kàa mpesi. Wan nkám nwugha mbii ɗi yak mon nc`in akiyeen."
Nɗin mman, ɓe Riin kì̵ Naan wuri j`i ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n wan, ɗangɓe ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ɓe wan naa mee peetong mu mulki, ɗi mee gwar ki̶ tong nkaa ni.

Yit kì̵ gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa ni, nii lapwus kaa jwak ɗiiret ɗi moo pet mo a jaspa, ki̶ kaneliyan, ki̶ lilliu ɗi ni lapshak ki̶ mee jwak ɗi moo pet ni a emeral, mo tap neer peetong mu mulki ni cighi̶rkaat.

Mee peetong mu mulki mo laarvul baafeer, mo neer peetong mu mulki ɗiiɗes ni le nnaar. Nyemnan mo laarvul baafeer, moo tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ɗiisi ni mo. Nyemnan ɗiisi ni mo, moo lop a lée ɗiipiyaa-piyaa mo, ki̶ zak, mo lop a mbiikáa mu mulki, ɗi mo ɗak mo a shi zinariya.

Mi̶lep kì̵ pee ki̶ put ɗi ndi̶ghi̶n peetong mu mulki ɗiiɗes ni, ki̶ or ɗiiɗes ki̶ nluu pi̶rep. Akiyeen kì̵ peetong mu mulki ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe fitila mo povul mo nkaa lapwus. A ɗiisi ni mo a Riin kì̵ Naan ɗiipovul si mo.

Ki̶ zak, akiyeen kì̵ peetong mu mulki ɗiiɗes ni, ɓe wan naa mee mbii káa bahar si, ɗi ni mi̶lep kaa gi̶las si, ki̶ ni ɗong kyet-kyet. Mee mbii ɗi mo kì̵ seen, mo feer, moo ɗar mpeefeer, cighi̶r mɓwoon kì̵ peetong mu mulki ɗiiɗes ni, mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen ni mo, mo gam ki̶ yit nkoghop mɓwoon ki̶ nkoghop ndi̶ghi̶n.
Ɗin nshee ni, lapshak ki̶ mbwoor, ɗiivul ni lapshak ki̶ kus randong, ɗiikun ni, ɓe yit kì̵ ni ntiit ki̶ mu gurum, ɗiifeer ni lapshak ki̶ puul ɗi ni nkaa yaghal ncáap si.

Koo a ɗiiɗang ye ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗi mo ki̶ seen feer ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe ni ki̶ cáap mo peemee, ki̶ mo ki̶ yit nkoghop mɓwoon ki̶ nkoghop ndi̶ghi̶n zak. Ba moo mee nookɗi kas, mpeeɗi mpar ki̶ puus, ɓe mo nkaa sat nee: "Ɗiiɓang, ɗiiɓang, ɗiiɓang! A Daa Naan wuri ɓal met mbii mo jir. A wuri ɗi yam, ki̶ a wuri ɗi yaksi, ki̶ a wuri ɗi akiyeen zak."
Kaaɗi mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen ɗiisi mo, mo kwoop, ki̶ mo cín ɗiiɗes mu pi̶lang, pe gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ni, a wuri ɗi wuri ki̶ seen har ngaa-ngaa.

Nyemnan ɗii laarvul baafeer si mo, mo zum ntoghom kì̵ gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ni, mo seyil nwuri. Wuri ɗi wurin mmeen har ngaa-ngaa. Nyemnan ɗiisi ni mo shwat mbiikáa ɗi mu mulki furu mo ntoghom fi̶ri, ɗang mo nkaa sat nee:
"Daa Naan funu a wugha mak lap ɗiiɗes, ki̶ kwoop, ki̶ ɓal. A wugha le mbii mo ɗi jir. A shi pan fugha ɓe wugha le mo ɗi, ki̶ zak. A wugha cín nseen mo."

Wan naa mee takarda ɗi ni a ciciɓet ndi̶ghi̶n sarse kì̵ gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ni. Mo ran-ran nkaa takarda ɗiisi ni, nkoghop mɓwoon ki̶ nkoghop ndi̶ghi̶n zak. Mo lus ni mpee mo povul shi stam.
Ɗangɓe wan naa mee ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes, ɗi wuri nkaa satpo ɓal-ɓal nee: "A we mmak fi̶lap káa kì̵ stam ɗiipovul ni mo, har ku wuri wang takarda ɗiiciciɓet ni ɗi ye?"
Amma ba mee gurum ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, koo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, koo nder kì̵ yil ni, ɗi wuri mak wang takarda ɗiisi ni, ku wuri mak naa ɗi̶ghi̶n ni ɗi kas.
Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe wan wal hakyeng, mpeeɗi ba mo kat mee gurum ɗi wuri mak wang takarda ni, koo naa ɗi̶ghi̶n ni kas.

Ɗangɓe memee ndi̶ghi̶n nyemnan ni mo, sat nee: "Taji a wal kas, a naa mbwoor mu dang kì̵ Juda, ki̶ mu dang kì̵ Devid wuri kì̵ se koghorong nkaa mbii mo jir. Wurin mmak fi̶lap stam ni, ki̶ wuri wang takarda ni, ki̶ stam ɗiipovul ni mo."

Ɗangɓe wan naa mee Laatum ki̶ ɗar, nnaar kì̵ peetong mu mulki ni mo, ki̶ mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, ki̶ nyemnan ɗii laarvul baafeer si mo, mo neer ni le nnaar. Laatum ɗiisi ni lapshak ki̶ ɗi gurum mo kì̵ fet ni. Laatum ɗiisi ni ki̶ soghom mo povul, ki̶ yit mo povul zak. Ɗiisi ni mo a Riin kì̵ Naan ɗiipovul si mo, ɗi Naan wurii lop mo koo a pee ɗiiɗang ye ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi.
Laatum ɗiisi ni yaghal so lap takarda ɗiiciciɓet ɗi ni nsarse kì̵ gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ni.

Kaaɗi wuri lap takarda ɗiisi ni nsar kì̵ gwar ɗi wurii tong a peetong mu mulki ni, ɓe mbii ɗi mo ki̶ seen feer sí mo, ki̶ nyemnan ɗii laarvul baafeer sí mo, mo kurum nyil, ntoghom kì̵ Laatum ni. Koo a weye ndi̶ghi̶n nyemnan ɗii laarvul baafeer si mo, ɓe mo ki̶ nɗeng-nɗeng, ki̶ ɗaa mo nsar, ɗi mo ɗak mo a shi zinariya, ɗi ni gam ki̶ mee mwoor ɗiiɗu shang-shang. Mwoor ɗiisi ni a aduwa kì̵ nyem kì̵ Naan mo.

Mo c`in mee kook ɗiipoo nee: "A wugha mak, har a mang takarda ni, ku a wang stam ni mo, mpeku takarda ni ɗee ɗi a wuwang. Gyet mo kì̵ tu wugha, ki̶ a shi toghom fugha, ɓe a wugha can gurum mo ɗes, ki̶ a j`i ki̶ mo nDaa Naan. Nyem ɗi wugha can ni mo, mo put a ndi̶ghi̶n koo a kiyeet ɗiiɗang ye. ki̶ koo a ndi̶ghi̶n liispo ɗiiɗang ye, ki̶ koo a ndi̶ghi̶n gurum ɗiiɗang mo ye, ki̶ koo a ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiiɗang ye zak.
Wugha le mo ɗee a mishkagham mo, ki̶ mo ɗee a pris ɗi moo c`in ɗak nNaan funu, ki̶ zak, mo se mulki nkaa mishkagham mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni."

Kaaɗi wan naapee, ɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo kì̵ nyemlop mo ɗes, ɗi mo duɓu kaghapaat nkaa duɓu kaghapaat, ɗi mo neer peetong mu mulki ni cighi̶rkaat, ki̶ mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, mo neer mbiitong mu mulki ni cighi̶r. Nyemnan si mo neer peetong mu mulki ni cighi̶r zak.
Mo c`in kook shi ɗoo ɗiiɗes nee: "Laatum ɗi gyet mo kì̵ tu ni, a wuri mak lap ɗiiɗes, ki̶ long, ki̶ seen, ki̶ iiko. Wu yit ku gurum mo cín ɗiiɗes nwuri, ki̶ mo kwoop wuri zak."

Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mbii ɗi mo ki̶ seen jir, ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ki̶ ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil, ki̶ ɗi mon nder kì̵ yil, ki̶ ɗi mo nkaa am, ki̶ ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n am zak, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n mo jir, mo c`in kook nee: "Mpee wuri ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki, kì̵ Laatum, wu yit ku mu kwoop wuri, ki̶ cín ɗiiɗes nwuri, ki̶ iiko mo har ngaa-ngaa."
Ɗangɓe mbii ɗi mo ki̶ seen feer si mo sat nee, "Amin." Nyemnan sí mo nkurum furum, ku mo seyil ɗi nwuri.
Wan naa kaaɗi Laatum ni, wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗin nshee. Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo ki̶ memee mɓut mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si. Wuri petpee shi ɗoo ɗiiɓal kaa k`oot kì̵ nluu si nee, "J`i!"

Kaaɗi wan naapee zak, ɓe wan naa mee bi̶ring ɗiipiyaa ki̶ j`i. Gwar ɗi wuri lang bi̶ring ɗiisi, wuri ki̶ mbuka nsar fi̶ri. Mo c`in mbiikáa ɗi ni a mu koghorong nwuri zak, wuri j`i put kaa gwar ɗi wurii naa nse koghorong a peelek si. Wuri ɗel so, mpeku wuri so se mee lek ni ɗi zak.
Kaaɗi Laatum ni wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗiivul ni, ɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo ki̶ mbii ɗiivul ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, wuri petpee nee, "j`i!"

Ɗangɓe wan naa mee bi̶ring ɗiivul j`i put, ni a naat kaa wus si. Gwar ɗi wuri lang bi̶ring ɗiinaat ɗiisi ni, mo cín iiko nwuri mpeku wuri mang tongriyang baa ki̶ ni aku ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, mpeku gurum mo ɗoghom twa shak ɗi, mo cín mee kwai ɗiiɗes nwuri zak.

Kaaɗi Laatum ni wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗiikun ni, ɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo kì̵ mbii ɗiikun, memee mɓut mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, wuri petpee nee, "J`i!" Kaaɗi wan naapee zak, ɓe wan naa bi̶ring ɗiitup ki̶ j`i. Gwar ɗi wurii lang bi̶ring ɗiitup ni, wuri ki̶ ɗaa mu kám mbii mo kaa muudu si ndi̶ghi̶n sar fi̶ri.

Ni ɗee kaa wan ki̶ling a rep mee ɗoo si, ndi̶ghi̶n mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, ɗoo ni sat nee, "Gurum mmang shaghal ɗak fi̶ri, mu puus mi̶ndong, ku wuri seet muudu mu alkama ɗi mi̶ndong, ki̶ zak, gurum mang shaghal ɗak fi̶ri, mu puus mi̶ndong, ku wuri seet muudu mo kun mu parpi̶ra ɗi. Amma taji a wat mwoor ni ki̶ am anab ni kas."
Kaaɗi Laatum ni wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗiifeer ni, ɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo kì̵ ɗiifeer mɓut mbii ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo, wuri sat nee, "J`i!"

Ɗangɓe wan naa mee bi̶ring si, ni a vuun, akiyeen fi̶na, moo pet gwar ɗi wuri lang bi̶ring ɗiisi a muut, ki̶ peetong mu nyemmuut mo nwurin mɓwoon. Mo cín iiko mmo nkaa mi̶ndong mɓut feer ki̶ yil ni, mpeku mo twa gurum mo shi kwai, ki̶ shi neen, ki̶ shi shwal, ki̶ shi luwayil mo zak.

Kaaɗi Laatum ni wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗiipaat ni, ɓe wan naa seen kì̵ gurum mo nder kì̵ peewus mbiizughum. A seen kì̵ nyem ɗi gyet mo twa mo, mpeeɗi gyet mo satpo Naan ni, ki̶ zak, mpeeɗi gyet mo sat agaak nee, wuɗun cínzeen, ki̶ gyet mo ɗar ɓal-ɓal ndi̶ghi̶n satpo ni zak.
Mo petpee shi ɗoo ɗiiɗes nee: "Daa Naan ɗiiɗes, ɗiiɓang, ki̶ ɗi wugha azeen, a pi̶rang ɗang wughan ntokɗiyeel nyemyil ni mo ye? Nyem ɗi gyet mo twa mun si mo, mpeku wugha kwat mo ɗi ye?"
Mo cín lée ɗiipiyaa mo jwal jir. Ɗang mo waa sat mmo nee, "Wu gung, ɗiilee aku, see ɗuu kì̵ shaar ɗak fuu mo, ki̶ ɗyemni̶ghi̶n fuu ɗi mon ntwa mo, kaaɗi mo twa wun si wul akuɗang."
Kaaɗi Laatum ni wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗiipeemee ni, ɓe wan naa yil ni yoghon ɗes zam, ɗangɓe puus ni cighi̶r ɗee a tup kaa lée ɗiitup shek-shek si, ki̶ tar ni cighi̶r ɗee a naat kaa toghom si.
Zar mo pwat ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, har mo sham ɗyong nyil, kaaɗi laating ɗiinung moo ɗyong nyil, katɗang kut cutpee ɓal-ɓal si.
Ɗengnaan ni ɗel lagham kaa ɗi gurum ki̶ ciɓet ti̶barna si, ki̶ mo hi̶r jwak mo, ki̶ jepyil ɗi am neer mo le nnaar, mo hi̶r mo jir aku a pee furu.

Ɗangɓe mishkagham mu yil ni mo, ki̶ nyem ɗi mo se mulki mo, ki̶ ɗiinan-nan mu sooja mo, ki̶ nyemlong mo, ki̶ nyem ɗi mo ki̶ iiko mo, ki̶ kaghar gurum mo jir, ki̶rom mo, ki̶ jeplu mo, mo so lagham ndi̶ghi̶n goghot mo, ki̶ gaghap ɗin njwak mo.
Mo ɗang pu jwak ni mo nee, "Wu j`i wu taa nkaa mun, mpeku taji mu naa yit kì̵ gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki si, ki̶ zak, mpeku taji tughup mu ɗiyeel kì̵ Laatum ni kat mun."
Mpeeɗi puus tughup furu ɗiiɗes nii j`i wul. A we mmak ɓamkáa fi̶ri mpuus mi̶ni ye?

Aɓwoon ɗi mbii ɗiisi moo kyes, ɓe wan naa nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo feer, moo ɗar nkoghop kwang ɗiifeer mu yil ni, mo yaa kut ɗin nkwang ɗiifeer mu yil ni mo ɗar ki̶ ni, mpeku taji mee kut cutpee nkaa yil ni, koo nkaa bahar, koo nkaa ting mo kas.

Ɗangɓe wan naa mee ngulop kì̵ Naan, ɗi wuri put a nkoghop puus ki̶kàa, wuri ki̶ ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗi ni a mu Naan ɗi mmeen nsar fi̶ri. Wuri pet nyemlop ɗiifeer ɗi mo cín iiko mmo, mpeku mo wat yil ki̶ am, shi ɗoo ɗiiɓal.
Ɓe wuri sat nee, "Taji wu wat yil ni, koo bahar ni, koo ting mo kas. Wu ɗar akuɗang, see mu le alama mu stam mu Naan nkaa pukiyeen ki̶ ki̶rom fi̶ri mo akuɗang."
Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling ɗuu kì̵ nyem ɗi mo le alama ni mmo mpukiyeen furu mo, mo wul duɓu ɗari mi̶ndong ki̶ laarfeer baafeer. Nyem ɗiisi ni mo pwat a ndi̶ghi̶n koo a saghan ɗiiɗang ye mu nyem Yahudi mo.

Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Juda mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Ruben mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Gad mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul.
Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Asher mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Naftali mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul.

Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Simiyon mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Livai mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Isakar mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul.

Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu nyem Zebulun mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Josep mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul. Ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mu Benjami mo, ɓe mo le alama ni nkaa gurum mo duɓu kaghapaat baavul.

Aɓwoon ɗiisi, ɓe wan naa ɗuu gurum mo ɗes, ɗi ba mee gurum mak tang mo kas. Nyem ɗiisi ni mo pwat a ndi̶ghi̶n yil mo shini-shini ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n saghan mo shini-shini, ki̶ liispo mo shini-shini, ki̶ ndi̶ghi̶n koo a pee ɗiiɗang ye ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi. Moo ɗar ntoghom ki̶ peetong mu mulki, ki̶ ntoghom kì̵ Laatum. Mo jwallée ɗiipiyaa mo, ki̶ mo ki̶ kom kí̵kar nsar furu mo zak.
Mo ɗiyeep ɗoo furu mo ashak shiɓal, nee, "Ɓam funu ni a pe Naan funu, ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki si, ki̶ Laatum ni wuri zak."

Nyemlop mo jir, moo ɗar ating neer peetong mu mulki ni, ki̶ nyemnan si mo, ki̶ mbii ɗiifeer ɗi mo ki̶ seen si mo zak. Nyemlop ni mo zum káa furu nyil ntoghom kì̵ peetong mu mulki ni, ki̶ mo seyil nNaan zak.
Mo sat nee, "Amin, kwoop, ki̶ ɗiihai, ki̶ seen, ki̶ pi̶lang, ki̶ ɗiiɗes, ki̶ iiko, ki̶ ɓal, mo ɗee a mu Naan funu har ngaa-ngaa, Amin."
Ɗangɓe memee mɓut nyemnan ni mo wuri cighi̶r pe wan ɗi, ɓe wuri sat nee, "A man nyem ɗi mo jwallée ɗiipiyaa-piyaa si mo me? A man peeɗi mo pwat ɗi me?"

Wan lap nwuri nee, "Daa fi̶na, ba wan man kas, a wugha man." Ɗangɓe wuri sat nee, "Nyem ɗiisi mo, a nyem ɗi mo pwat ndi̶ghi̶n jeel ɗiiɗes si mo, mo ki̶ vwang lée furu mo, ku mo ɗee a ɗiipiyaa mo, ndi̶ghi̶n toghom kì̵ Laatum.
A mpeemi̶ni, ɓe moo ɗar ntoghom kì̵ peetong mu mulki kì̵ Naan, ki̶ moo seyil nNaan ndi̶ghi̶n Lu fi̶ri, mpar ki̶ puus. Gwar ɗi wurii tong nkaa peetong mu mulki ni, wurin ntong ashak ki̶ mo.
Ba neen nkyam láa mmo kas, ki̶ zak, ba neen am nkyam tu mo kas. Ba puus, koo tal kì̵ puus nin nkyam mo kas.
Laatum ɗi wurin nnaar kì̵ mo, wurin nɗee a ngukiyeer furu. Wurii so ki̶ mo a pee tuɓut ɗi ni a mu seen ɗi. Naan wurin mpwos yitmwaan ɗi nin nyit furu mo jir."
Aɓwoon ɗi mbii ɗiisi moo kyes, ɓe Laatum ni wuri fi̶lap ndiɓen ki̶ stam ɗiipovul ni. Kaaɗi wuri wang, ɓe gurum mo ɗok titik ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, har ni kus ki̶ kaghar mu awa mi̶ndong.
Wan naa nyemlop kì̵ Naan mo povul, ɗi moo ɗar ntoghom kì̵ Naan, ɓe mo cín feer, nkoo a ɗiiɗang ye, mɓut mmo povul ni.

Mee ngulop kì̵ Naan wuri j`i ɗar kus ki̶ peewus mbiizughum, wuri ki̶ mee ɗaa wus mbiizughum, ɗi mo ɗak ni a shi zinariya. Mo cín mwoor ɗiiɗu shang-shang mu wus mbiizughum nwuri ɗes, mpeku wuri cín mo ɗi ashak ki̶ aduwa mu nyem ɗiiɓang mo ɗi nkaa peewus mbiizughum ɗi mo ɗak ni a shi zinariya, ɗi ni ntoghom ki̶ peetong mu mulki ni.
Ɗangɓe ɗiyeel mu mwoor wus mbiizughum ɗiiɗu shang-shang ni, ki̶ aduwa mu nyem kì̵ Naan mo, ɗi nin nsar kì̵ ngulop kì̵ Naan ni, ni kàa wul pe Naan ɗi.

Ɗangɓe ngulop ni wuri mang ɗaa mu wus mbiizughum ni, wuri gam ɗaa ni shi wus, ɗi ni nkaa peewus mbiizughum ni, ɓe wuri vwet nkaa yil ni. Kaaɗi wuri vwet wus ɗiisi ni nkaa yil ni, ɓe nluupet, ki̶ ɗoo mo, ki̶ pee mi̶lep ɗes, ki̶ yil ni yoghon zak.
Aɓwoon ɗiisi, ɓe nyemlop kì̵ Naan ɗiipovul, ɗi mo ki̶ feer mo povul si, mo ɗak sut, mpeku mo ɗoghom taa feer ni mo ɗi.

Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗin nshee, wuri taa feer fi̶ri, ɓe ɗaghar, ki̶ wus, riyeep ki̶ toghom, mo sham ɓeer nkaa yil ni. Mi̶ndong nkaa kun, mu yil ni caan, ki̶ mi̶ndong nkaa kun, mu ting mo caan zak, ki̶ shit mo caan jir zak.
Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiivul, wuri taa feer fi̶ri, ɓe mee mbii kaa kus jwak ɗiiɗes si, nii lapwus, ɓe mo vwet ni ndi̶ghi̶n bahar.
Nɗin mman, ɓe mi̶ndong nkaa kun, mu bahar ni cighi̶r ɗee a toghom. Mi̶ndong nkaa kun, mu mbii ɗi mo ki̶ seen jir, ɗi moo tong ndi̶ghi̶n bahar, mo murap. Mi̶ndong nkaa kun, mu jirgi am mo lagham.
Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiikun, wuri taa feer fi̶ri, ɓe mee zar ɗiiɗes, ɗi ni lap wus hi̶lak-hi̶lak, ni put aɗeng har ni sham táa nkaa mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu dung mo, ki̶ tuɓut am mo.
Sum kì̵ zar ɗiisi ni a, Ɗeet. Ɓe mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu am, mo cighi̶r ɗee a ɗiiɗeet, gurum mo ɗes mo murap, mpeeɗi mo shwaa am ɗiiɗeet ɗiisi ni.

Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiifeer, wuri taa feer fi̶ri, ɓe mo cut mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu puus, ki̶ mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu tar, ki̶ mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu zar mo. Mpeemi̶ni, ɓe mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu peeɓang furu, ba mo kuɗi kì̵ ɓangpee kas. Mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu wet, ba ni kuɗi ki̶ peeɓang kas, ki̶ mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu mpar, ba ni kuɗi ki̶ peeɓang kas zak.

Kaaɗi wan naapee, ɓe wan ki̶ling mee puul, ɗi nii mwaan aɗeng, nii petpee shi ɗoo ɗiiɓal, nee, "Jeel! Jeel Jeel. Mpee gurum ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni, mpeeɗi nyemlop kì̵ Naan ɗi mo kuɗi kun sí, mo kus kì̵ taa feer furu mo."
Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiipaat wuri taa feer fi̶ri, ɓe wan naa mee zar ɗi ni put ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, har ni sham taa nyil ɗiisi. Mo cín makuli mu wang po tughun ɗiijurung, ɗi ba ni ki̶ peeɗar kas si nwuri.
Kaaɗi wuri wang po tughun ɗiijurung ɗiisi ni, ɓe ɗiyeel kàa put ndi̶ghi̶n tughun ni, kaa ɗiyeel kì̵ wus ɗi nii se lu si. Ɗiyeel ɗiisi ni kàa paa puus, ki̶ ɗengnaan, har pee ni rap kaa par si.
Ndi̶ghi̶n ɗiyeel ɗiisi ni, ɓe ciɓel mo sham nkaa yil ni, mo cínɓal mu nungpee nciɓel ɗiisi ni mo, kaa mu ɗi̶ghi̶r mo si.
Mo sat mmo nee, taji lejeel nshit koo ting ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni kas, amma mo cínjeel a nyem ɗi ba mo ki̶ mbii aapo ndiɓen stam mu Naan nkaa pukiyeen furu kas.

Ba mo cín iiko ni mo a mpeku mo tutwa nyem ɗiisi ni mo kas, amma mo cín iiko mmo, a mpeku mo cínjeel ɗi nyem ɗiisi ni mo mpee tar mo paat. Jeel ɗi mo shwaa ni, ni shwal kaa shwal ɗi gurum ki̶ ki̶ling, katɗang ɗi̶ghi̶r nung wuri si.
Ndi̶ghi̶n tar ɗiipaat ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe nyem ɗiisi ni mo tang muut, amma ba mo kat kas. Mo riɓet muut, amma muut ni so jong ki̶ mo.
Ciɓel ɗiisi ni mo lapshak ki̶ bi̶ring ɗi mo tap ɗak mo mpee so nlek. Mo jwal mee mbii mo nkáa furu, kaa mbiikáa ɗi mo ɗak mo shi zinariya si, ki̶ zak, yit furu mo lapshak ki̶ yit kì̵ gurum mo.
Shoopkáa furu, mo shwal kaa mu shirop mo si, ki̶ zak, aghas furu ni a kaa aghas mu mbwoor mo si.
Mo paa tughur kì̵ mo ni mo, shi shaghal, ki̶ cáap furu mo wal ntiit ki̶ wal mu shii kì̵ bi̶ring ɗi moo ɗul keke bi̶ring mo mpee so nlek.
Mo ki̶ dang ɗi nii nung gurum mo kaa ɗi̶ghi̶r mo si. A shi dang ɗiisi mo, ɓe mo kat ɓal mpee cínjeel ngurum mo, mpee tar mo paat.

Mishkagham furu ni a ngulop mu tughun ɗiijurung, ɗi ba ni ki̶ peeɗar kas si, sum fi̶ri shi liispo mu nyem Yahudi mo, ɓe ni a Abaddon, ɗangɓe sum fi̶ri shi liispo kì̵ nyem Heleni mo, ɓe ni a Apoliyon. Shii kì̵ mi̶ni nee, "Nguwat mbii mo."
Jeel ɗiiɗes ɗin nshee ni ɗel mmi̶ni. Ɗee jeel ɗiiɗes mo ɗi vul, ɗi mon ndung j`i.
Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiipeemee ni wuri taa feer fi̶ri, ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo ni j`i put ndi̶ghi̶n kwang ɗiifeer mu peewus mbiizughum ɗi mo ɗak ni a shi zinariya, ɗi nii ɗar ntoghom kì̵ Naan.
Ɗoo ni katpo ki̶ ngulop ɗiipeemee ni nee, "A fwoon nyemlop ɗiifeer si mo, ɗi gyet mo ɓwaghat mo le ndung Yufiretus ɗiiɗes si."

Nyemlop ɗiifeer ɗiisi mo, gyet mo ɓwaghat mo le ɗi, a mpeku mo gong wul kì̵ pee, ki̶ teer, ki̶ tar, ki̶ ɓit ni, mpeku mo ɓwot mo, ku mo so twa gurum mo ɗi. Kaaɗi mo fwoon mo, ɓe mo so twa mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu gurum ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi.
Wan ki̶ling nee, ɗuu kì̵ sooja ɗi mo lang bi̶ring ni mo, mo a miliyon ɗari vul.

Bi̶ring ni mo ki̶ nyemlang ni mo, ɗi wan naa mo ndi̶ghi̶n sughun fi̶na ni, mo lapshak zam. Mo jwal mee shaghal nkaa tughur furu mo, ɗi ni naat kaa wus si, ki̶ ni pan a tup kaa ɗengnaan si, ki̶ zak, ni a kaa yara si. Káa kì̵ bi̶ring ni mo lap ki̶ mu mbwoor mo. Wus ki̶ ɗiyeel, ki̶ fwat mu pus binti̶ka, mo j`i put mpo kì̵ bi̶ring ni mo.
A shi jeel ɗi nii wus, ki̶ ɗiyeel, ki̶ fwat mu pus binti̶ka, ɗi mo j`i pwat ndi̶ghi̶n po kì̵ bi̶ring ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe mo twa mi̶ndong mɓut nkun, mu gurum ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni.
Ɓal kì̵ bi̶ring ɗiisi ni mo, a ndi̶ghi̶n po furu, ki̶ dang furu mo. Dang furu ni mo a kaa nw`oo mo si, ɗi mo ki̶ káa. A shi dang ɗiisi ni mo, ɓe bi̶ring ɗiisi mo cínjeel ngurum mo.

Kaghar gurum ɗi ba mo murap nsar kì̵ jeel ɗiisi mo kas, ɓe ba mo tuwap kas, mo sat a nseyil nriin ɗiibish mo, ki̶ k`um ɗi mo ɗak shi zinariya, ki̶ azurfa, ki̶ mu boong ɗiinaat, ki̶ mu jwak, ki̶ mu yoghom mo. K`um ɗiisi mo, ba moo naapee, koo ki̶lingpee, koo mee mwaan kas.
Ba mo waa tuwap mpee tukáa ɗi moo c`in ni kas, ki̶ nyem mu numpee mo ki̶ c`in ngaa, ki̶ wat kas.

Ɗangɓe wan naa mee ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes, wurii tong a ɗengnaan sham. Nluu paa wuri kaa nli̶r si, ki̶ zak, lilliu neer káa fi̶ri cighi̶rkaat. Yit fi̶ri ni a kaa puus si, ki̶ shii fi̶ri ni mo a kaa ndwet ɗiinan-nan mu wus si.
Wuri ki̶ mee làa takarda, ɗi ni a wuwang nsar fi̶ri, wuri leshii fi̶ri ɗin nsarse ni nkaa bahar, ki̶ wuri ten yil ni ki̶ shii fi̶ri ɗin nsarkul.
Ɗangɓe wuri petpee shi ɗoo ɗiiɓal ɗi ni lap shak ki̶ or mu mbwoor. Kaaɗi wuri kì̵ petpee ni, ɓe nluupet, ki̶ pee mo povul mo lap nwuri.
Kaaɗi pee ɗiipovul ni mo lap, ɓe wan ki̶n riɓet ran ni, amma wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan sat nee, "A paa mbii ɗi nluu ɗi mo petpee povul ni mo sat. Taji a ran mbii ɗi mo sat ni kas."
Ɗangɓe ngulop kì̵ Naan, ɗi mee shii fi̶ri ni nkaa bahar, ki̶ mee shii fi̶ri nkaa yil sí, wuri ɗiyeep sarse fi̶ri kàa aɗeng.

Wuri tuwoorpo ndi̶ghi̶n sum kì̵ Naan ɗi har ngaa-ngaa. Wuri ɗi wuri le ɗengnaan, ki̶ mbii ɗi mon ndi̶ghi̶n ni jir. A wuri leyil, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil ni jir zak, ki̶ a wuri le bahar, ki̶ mbii ɗi mo ndi̶ghi̶n ni jir. Ngulop ni wuri sat nee, "Ba mee ɓes kuɗi kas, pee ni wul."
Katɗang teer ni wul, mpeku ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiipovul wuri taa feer fi̶ri ni, ɓe mbii ɗiisi̶sok mu Naan mon ngam, kaaɗi gyet wuri kì̵ ten sat nki̶rom fi̶ri mo, nyemsatpo fi̶ri mo mmi̶ni.
Ɗangɓe wan ki̶ling mee ɗoo si ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, ni katpo ki̶ wan zak nee, "A so, a mang takarda ɗi ni a wuwang, nsar kì̵ ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗi wurii ɗar nkaa yil ni ki̶ bahar sí."

Ni aasi, ɓe wan so pe ngulop kì̵ Naan ni wuri ɗi, wan sat nwuri nee, "A cín làa takarda ni nwan." Ɓe wuri sat nwan nee, "A mang, a se. Nin nɗeet ɓut nwugha, amma nin nshang mpo fugha, kaa am nshii si."
Wan lap làa takarda ɗin nsar kì̵ ngulop kì̵ Naan ni, ɓe wan se làa takarda ni. Ni shang ndi̶ghi̶n po fi̶na kaa am nshii si, amma aɓwoon ɗi wan ki̶n ten nse ni, ɓe ni le ku ɓut fi̶na ni ɗeet.
Ɗangɓe mo sat nwan nee, "Ni ating a baa a satpo kì̵ Naan ɗi nkaa gurum ɗi mon nyil mo shini-shini, ki̶ liispo mo shini-shini, ki̶ nkaa mishkagham furu mo shini-shini zak."
Mo cín mee kam nwan, mpee kám mbii mo, ɗangɓe mo sat nwan nee, "A so a kám Lu kì̵ Naan ɗiiɗes ni, ki̶ peewus mbiizughum ni, ki̶ zak, a tang ɗuu kì̵ nyem ɗi mo nkaa seyil nNaan ɗi nlu ni.
Amma taji a kám pee ɗiineer cighi̶r mɓwoon ni kas, mpeeɗi mo kì̵ ten cín mi̶ni, nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem Yahudi mo kas. Nyem ɗiisi mon mmwaan nkaa birni mu Naan ni, mpee tar mo laarfeer baavul.
Wan ncín iiko fi̶na nlangting mo vul, mpeku mo satpo ɗi Naan ki̶ riɓet ku mo sat ɗi akiyeen, mpee teer mo duɓu mi̶ndong ki̶ ɗari vul ki̶ laarpeemee, ki̶ zak, mon njwal a leemaap mo."
Nyemlangting ɗiivul ɗiisi ni mo, a mo a tingpaat ɗiivul si mo, ki̶ fitila ɗiivul si mo zak, ɗi moo ɗar ntoghom kì̵ Daa ɗi mu yil ɗiisi ni.
Katɗang mee gurum ki̶ riɓet wat mo, ɓe wus nj`i put mpo furu, har ni se shaarlek furu. A ɗiisi ni, a ar muut kì̵ jir nyem ɗi moo tang wat mo.

Nyem ɗiisi ni mo ki̶ iiko, mpeku mo shaghat ɗengnaan, mpeku taji fwan j`i kas, ndi̶ghi̶n teer ɗi mon nkaa satpo ɗi Naan ki̶ riɓet ku mo sat akiyeen. Ki̶ zak, mo ki̶ iiko, mpeku mo le am mo jir, mo ɗee a toghom. Moo mak cut yil ni shi shwal mo shini-shini, kaaɗi mo naa ni ret mmo nyit si.

Aɓwoon ɗi mon nkyes sat langting furu ni mo, ɓe mee luwa ɗi ni kàa put ndi̶ghi̶n tughun ɗi ba ni ki̶ peeɗar kas si. Luwa ɗiisi nin mɓwot lek nkaa mo, har nin nse koghorong nkaa mo, ɗangɓe nin ntwa mo zak.

Kúm kì̵ das ɗiivul ɗiisi ni mon ngi̶rang ndi̶ghi̶n birni ɗiinan-nan si mo, ɗi moo pet mo a Sodom ki̶ Ijip, yil ɗiivul si mo ɗee a mbiikám. A ndi̶ghi̶n birni ɗiiɗes ɗiisi, ɓe gyet mo pwas Daa furu ɗi.

Gurum mo ndi̶ghi̶n yil mo shini-shini, liispo mo shini-shini, dang mo shini-shini, ki̶ jep gurum mo shini-shini, mon nnaa kúm kì̵ mo ni, mpee teer mo kun ki̶ kaghar, ki̶ gurum mon nkwar wum kúm kì̵ mo ni.

Nyem ɗi moo tong ndi̶ghi̶n yil ɗiisi, mon nc`in retnyit mpee murap kì̵ das ɗiivul ɗiisi ni mo. Mon mmi̶reppee, ki̶ zak, mon nlop mbiizughum mon nshak, mpeeɗi po kì̵ Naan ɗi jí langting ɗiivul ni mo sat, ni le ku gurum ɗi mon nyil ɗiisi mo shwaajeel ɗes.
Aɓwoon kì̵ teer mo kun ki̶ kaghar, ɓe Naan wuri le ku nook mu seen ɗel ndi̶ghi̶n mo, har mo yaghal ɗar nkaa shii furu mo, ɗangɓe mee ki̶i̶rmuut ɗiiɗes ni yaa nyem ɗi mo naa mo.
Ɗangɓe mo ki̶ling mee ɗoo ɗiiɗes ɗi ni put ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan ni sat mmo nee, "Wu kàa si." Ɓe mo yaghal kàa ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan mɓut nluu, ki̶ shaarlek furu mo naa pe moo kàa ɗi.

Nɗin mman, nnaar kì̵ mi̶ni, ɓe yil ni yoghon ɓal-ɓal. Mi̶ndong mɓut nkaghapaat mu birni ni pyan, ki̶ gurum mo duɓu povul, mo murap ndi̶ghi̶n yoghon kì̵ yil mi̶ni. Ki̶i̶rmuut ɗiiɗes yaa kaghar nyem ɗi moo seen mo, har mo cín ɗiiɗes nNaan ɗi wuri ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan.
Aɓwoon kì̵ mbii ɗiisi mo, ɓe jeel ɗiivul ni ɗel, amma jeel ɗiikun nin nj`i ki̶lak-ki̶lak.

Ngulop kì̵ Naan ɗiipovul ni wuri taa feer ɗiipovul ni, ɓe wan ki̶ling ɗoo ɗiiɓal-ɓal mo ɗes ndi̶ghi̶n ɗengnaan, mo sat nee, "Mulki mu yil ɗiisi ni, ni ɗee a mulki mu Daa funu, ki̶ mu Làa fi̶ri Kristi, wurin nc`in mulki ni a har ngaa-ngaa."
Ɗangɓe nyemnan ɗii Laarvul baafeer si mo, ɗi moo tong nkaa mbiitong mu mulki furu mo ntoghom kì̵ Naan si, mo kurum nyil, ku mo seyil ɗi nNaan.

Mo sat nee: "Mu pi̶lang wugha, Daa Naan ɗiiɓal met jir, wugha ɗi wugha a shee kì̵ mbii mo jir, ki̶ zak, wugha ɗi yaksi, mu pi̶lang wugha, mpeeɗi aa mang ɓal fugha ɗiiɗes ni nsar fugha, ku a yaa se mulki ɗi nkaa yil ɗiisi.

Nyem ɗi ba mo a nyem kì̵ Naan mo kas, ndi̶ghi̶n yil mo shini-shini, ni làa mmo mɓut, mpeeɗi tughup kì̵ Naan ni j`i wul. Mpeeɗi pee ni wul, mpeku wugha woo tughup fugha ɗi nkaa mo. Pee ni wul, mpeku wugha tokɗiyeel ɗi nyem ɗi gyet mo kì̵ ten murap mo, ki̶ mpeku a cín kwat ɗiiret ɗi nki̶rom fugha mo.
